SA01yabhkvyu:1046_1: iti vacanāt. tasmād iti vistaraḥ. avasthāvyavasthita eva sabhāgahetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1046_2: avasthāyāṃ vyavasthitaḥ. atītāvasthaḥ pratyutpannāvasthaś ca sabhāgahetur nānāgatāvasthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1046_4: lakṣaṇena vyavasthitas triṣv api kāleṣu yathoktalakṣaṇa ity anāgato 'pi vipākahetur na vāryate na pratiṣidhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:1046_5: idam iha vicāryate. kim anāgate 'dhvani sadṛśā dharmā viprakīrṇā iti na śakyate paricchetuṃ ayaṃ hetur idam idam asya niṣyandaphalam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1046_7: āhosvit yo dharmo yasya dharmasya sabhāgahetur bhavet.
SA01yabhkvyu:1046_8: sa dharmas tasya hetupratyayavaśān niṣyandaphalaṃ bhaved iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1046_11: mama tu pūrvaka evāyaṃ pakṣaḥ pratibhātīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1047_0: kim eṣa niyama iti. kiṃ svabhūmika evety avadhāryate. nānyathāpy astīty abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1049_0: iti. tuśabdo viśeṣaṇe. mārga iti mārgasatyaṃ vivakṣitaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1049_2: sāsravo hi dharmaḥ svabhūmika eva sabhāgahetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1049_6: 190a] ata āha. yat sāsravāṇāṃ mārgasya ca tulye bhūmibhede mārga eva navabhūmiko 'nyonyaṃ sabhāgahetur na sāsrava iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1049_7: kuta ity āha. āgantuko hy asau tāsu bhūmiṣu na taddhātupatitaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1049_9: na hi kāmarūpārūpya(navabhūmisaṃniśrayādhigamyatvāt navabhūmiko na tadbhūmisaṃgṛhītatvāt) caryas tṛṣṇāḥ sāsravān ivānāsravān dharmān svīkurvanti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1049_10: yadā tarhi nirvāṇaṃ mārgaṃ vābhilaṣati kuśalo 'sau dharmacchandaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1049_11: na rāgaḥ. tasya varjyatvād iti vacanāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:1049_13: evaṃ tarhi sarvaḥ sarvasya sabhāgahetuḥ prāpnoti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_0: grahaṇaṃ tarhi kim arthaṃ. ūrdhvabhūmikādharabhūmikayor anyonyam ity evam arthaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_3: tadyatheti vistaraḥ. duḥkhe dharmajñānakśāntis tasyā evānāgatāyāḥ sameti kṛtvā sabhāgahetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_4: viśiṣṭasya ca duḥkhe dharmajñānasya duḥkhe 'nbvayajñānakṣānter yāvad anutpādajñānasya [Abhidh-k-vy_204].
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_5: na tu nyūnasya. na hi duḥkhe dharmajñānam anāgatāyāḥ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānteḥ sabhāgahetur bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_7: darśanamārgo darśanamārgāntarasya bhāvanāmārgasyāśaikṣamārgasya ca sabhāgahetur iti trayāṇāṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_9: na darśanamārgasyeti [Tib. 190b] dvayoḥ. aśaikṣamārgo 'śaikṣamārgāntarasya na darśanamārgabhāvanāmārgayor ity ekasya sabhāgahetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_10: tatrāpīti. tatra darśanamārgādiṣu mṛdvindriyamārgo darśanamārgasvabhāvo mṛdutīkṣṇendriyamārgasya tatsvabhāvasyaiva.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_14: tad darśayann āha. tadyatheti vistaraḥ. ekasyāpi mṛdvindriyasya pudgalasya ṣaṇmārgāḥ santi.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_17: dharmānusārimārgasya cātmīyasyānāgatāvasthasya śraddhādhimuktadṛṣṭiprāptasamayavimuktāsamayavimuktamārgāṇāṃ cātmīyāṇāṃ yathāyogam utpattyanutpattidharmāṇāṃ ceti ṣaṇṇāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_18: śraddhādhimuktamārgaḥ śraddhādhimuktamārgāntarasya dṛṣṭiprāptasamayavimuktāsamayavimuktamārgāṇāṃ cāpareṣām api trayāṇām iti caturṇāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_20: na tu śraddhādhimuktamārgaḥ śraddhānusāridharmānusārimārgayor hetuḥ pūrvakālīnatvāt darśanamārgasya.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_22: evam anyatrāpi yojyaṃ. [Tib. 191a] dharmānusārimārgaḥ dharmānusārimārgāntarasya dṛṣṭiprāptāsamayavimuktamārgayoś ceti trayāṇāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_29: samayavimuktamārgas tarhīndriyato viśiṣṭasya dṛṣṭiprāptamārgasya sabhāgahetuḥ prāpnoti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_30: na prāpnoti. aśaikṣamārgasaṃgṛhītatvāt. na hi pūrvakālīnaṃ phalaṃ paścātkālīno hetur iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_31: dṛṣṭiprāptamārgaḥ punaḥ samayavimuktamārgasya na sabhāgahetur indriyato nyūnatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_32: kathaṃ punar iti vistaraḥ. kathaṃ punar ūrdhvabkūmikasya dvitīyadhyānāt prabhṛti yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanabhūmikasya darśanamārgasya bhāvanāmārgasya vā aśaikṣamārgasya vā yathāyogam adhobhūmiko mārgo vijñānānamtyāyatanāt [Abhidh-k-vy_205] prabhṛti yāvad anāgamyabhūmiko yathāyogaṃ darśanamārgo bhāvanāmārgo vā aśaikṣamārgo vā samo vā viśiṣṭo vā bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_33: kathaṃcana bhavitavyaṃ. hīnatvād adharāyā bhūmeḥ. [Tib. 191b] indriyato hetūpacayataś ca.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_34: indriyatas tāvat samo bhavati viśiṣṭo vā.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_35: darśanamārge śraddhānusārimārgaś caturthadhyānabhūmiko 'dharabhūmikasya tasyaiva śraddhānusārimārgasya samaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_37: tīkṣṇendriyatvāt. tathā dharmānusārimārgaś caturthadhyānabhūmiko 'dharabhūmikasya dharmānusārimārgasya samaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_38: evam etāv eva śraddhānusāridharmānusārimārgau caturthadhyānabhūmikāv adharabhūmikayor bhāvanāśaikṣamārgayoḥ pratyekaṃ bhūmīndriyabhedabhinnayoḥ samau vā viśiṣṭau veti saṃbhavato yojyau.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_39: tathā bhāvanāmārge ākiṃcanyāyatanabhūmikasya śraddhādhimuktamārgasyādharabhūmikaḥ śraddhādhimuktamārgaḥ samaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_43: tīkṣṇendriyatvāt. evam aśaikṣamārge ākiṃcanyāyatanabhūmikasyāśaikṣamārgasyādharabhūmikaḥ samo viśiṣṭo veti yathāyogaṃ yojyam.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_44: anayā diśā sarvabhūmayo yojyāḥ kathaṃ hetūpacayataḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_45: ūrdhvabhūmikasyādharabhūmiko mārgaḥ samo viśiṣṭo vā bhavatīty ata idam ucyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_48: ūrdhvabhūmikāyā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānteḥ adhobhūmikaṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ hetūpacayato viśiṣṭaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_49: duḥkhe dharmajñānād apy ūrdhvabhūmikād adharabhūmikā duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntir yāvad ūrdhvabhūmikān mārge dharmajñānād adharabhūmikā mārge 'nvayajñānakṣāntir hetūpacayato viśiṣṭā bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_51: darśanamārgād ūrdhvabhūmikād adhobhūmiko bhāvanāmārgo hetūpacayato viśiṣṭo bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_52: darśanamārgo hi darśanamārgahetūpacito bhāvanāmārgas tu darśanabhāvanāmārgahetūpacitaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_53: ūrdhvabhūmikābhyāṃ darśanabhāvanāmārgābhyām adharabhūmiko 'śaikṣamārgo hetūpacayato viśiṣṭo bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_55: ūrdhvabhūmikasya darśanamārgasyādhobhūmiko darśanamārgo hetūpacayataḥ samānakṣaṇāpekṣayā samo bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_57: tad evaṃ kaścid indriyataḥ samo bhavati hetūpacayato viśiṣṭaḥ saty apy adharabhūmikatve.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_59: kaścid dhetūpacayataḥ samo bhavati indriyato viśiṣṭaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_65: tatra mṛdumṛdoḥ prakārād ūrdhvabhūmikād adharabhūmiko 'pi mṛdumadhyo yāvad adhimātramadhyād adhimātrādhimātraḥ samānāsamānakṣaṇāpekṣayā hetūpacayataḥ samo viśiṣṭo vā bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_67: yad uktaṃ śraddhānusārimārgaḥ ṣaṇṇāṃ sabhāgahetur iti kathaṃ śraddhānusārimārgo dharmānusārimārgasya sabhāgahetur bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_69: tenāha. yady apy ekasaṃtāne śraddhādharmānusārimārgayor asaṃbhavaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_72: na tv abhāvaḥ. santi hi mṛdvindriyāṇāṃ mṛdvindriyamārgavad ātmīyās tīkṣṇendriyamārgā api.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_73: dṛṣṭiprāptasamayavimuktamārgās tu tatsaṃtāne saṃmukhībhaveyur api yadīndriyasaṃcāraḥ kriyeta.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_74: tasmād utpannaḥ śraddhānusārimārgo 'nutpattidharmiṇo dharmānusārimārgasya śraddhādhimuktadṛṣṭiprāptasamayavimuktāsamayavimuktamārgāṇāṃ ca yathāyogam anāgatānām utpattidharmāṇām anutpattidharmāṇāṃ vā samaviśiṣṭānāṃ sabhāgahetur iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_75: ācāryavasumitras tv āha. [Tib. 193a] utpannaḥ śraddhānusārimārgo 'nutpannasya dharmānusārimārgasya dṛṣṭiprāptamārgasya vā hetur yadā śraddhānusāryādaya indriyāṇi saṃcaranto dharmānusārimārgādīn saṃmukhīkurvanti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1053_76: tad ayuktaṃ. na hi śraddhānusārīndriyāṇi saṃcarati.
SA01yabhkvyu:1054_2: kāmāvacarāḥ śrutamayā iti. ye buddhavacanaśrutena niryātāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1054_3: te śrutamayāḥ. cintāmayāś cintāmayānām iti. cintāmayānām eva na śrutamayānāṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_0: iti vacanāt. bhāvanāmayabhāvād iti. kāmadhātor asamāhitatvāt bhāvanāmayā na santi.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_1: cintāmayābhāvād iti. yadā hi cintayitum ārabhante.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_3: teṣām apīti. śrutamayādīnāṃ. mṛdumṛdavaḥ sarveṣām iti. mṛdumṛdavo mṛdumṛdvantarāṇāṃ samānāṃ mṛdumadhyādīnāṃ cānyeṣām aṣṭānāṃ viśiṣṭānām iti sarveṣāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_6: tadyathā mṛdvadhimātrāḥ saptānāṃ madhyamṛdavaḥ saṇṇāṃ yāvad adhimātrādhimātrā adhimātrādhimātrāntarāṇāṃ ekarūpāṇāṃ sabhāgahetur iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_7: pūrvān pūrvān apāsya teṣāṃ teṣāṃ nyūnatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_11: ata iniṭhanāv iti ṭhan. sarve te nava prakārāḥ parasparaṃ sabhāgahetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_14: na samaviśiṣṭānām eva. anābhisaṃskārikatvāt. ābhisaṃskārikasya hi sabhāgahetor nyūnaṃ phalaṃ neṣyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_15: nānābhisaṃskārikasya. kliṣṭā apy evam iti. sarve navaprakārāḥ parasparaṃ sabhāgahetur aprāyatnikatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_16: pūrvotpannāḥ sarve samānabhūmikānāṃ paścādvartināṃ sarveṣāṃ sabhāgahetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_26: caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ phalaṃ prathamadvitīyatṛtīyacaturthadhyānaphalam iti catuṣprakāraṃ kāmāvacaraṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_27: tad yathākramaṃ catustridvyekeṣāṃ ca sabhāgahetur iti vartate.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_32: kā punar atra yuktir yayaivaṃ niyama iti tāṃ yuktiṃ nirdikṣur āha.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_34: na caturthadhyānaphalaṃ kāmāvacaraṃ nirmāṇacittaṃ prathamadhyānaphalasya kāmāvacarasya nirmāṇacittasya yāvat tṛtīyadhyānadhyānaphalasya kāmāvacarasya nirmāṇacittasya sabhāgahetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_35: kasmād ity āha. na hy ābhisaṃskārikasya mahāyatnasādhyasya sabhāgahetor hīyamānam amahāyatnasādhyaṃ phalaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_36: yādṛśena hi yatnaviśeṣeṇa prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yāvat tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ niṣpādyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_39: tasmāt phalam asyotkṛṣṭatareṇaiva yatnaviśeṣeṇa niṣpādyate ity avagamyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_44: ata evāhur iti. yasmād ābhisaṃskārikasya sabhāgahetor hīyamānaṃ phalaṃ na bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_45: tasmād āhur ity arthaḥ. kim āhur ity āhuḥ. syād utpanna iti vistaraḥ. duḥkhe dharmajñānam anāsravam utpannam anutpattidharmāṇām anāsravāṇāṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntināṃ na hetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_47: evaṃ hi tad viśiṣṭaṃ. yat kleśavisaṃyogaprāptyā saha utpadyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_49: tadyathārhattvāt parihīṇasya aśaikṣo mārgaḥ pūrvotpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmyanāgāmimārgayoḥ paścādutpadyamānayor na sabhāgahetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_51: anāgatā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntayaḥ prathama eva kṣaṇe pratilabdhā ekasaṃtānagatāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_53: tasya tā na hetuḥ. [Tib. 195a] yasmān na pūrvataraṃ phalaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_54: pūrvataraṃ hi duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntibhyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_55: tasyotpannatvāt. tāsāṃ cānutpannatvāt. anāgato vā dharmaḥ yasmān na sabhāgahetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_56: anāgatā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntayaḥ aparimitāḥ pratilabdhā eva na tūtpannāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_58: pūrvaṃ pratilabdhamātro dharmaḥ pṛṣṭo na tūtpannaḥ anutpannaś ca na sabhāgahetur bhavatīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_59: idānīṃ pūrvotpanno 'pi kim asti na sabhāgahetur iti atiśayarūpeṇa pṛcchyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_60: adhimātro nyūnasyeti. viśiṣṭo nyūnasyety arthaḥ. tadyathottaraphalaparihīṇasya arhattvaphalaparihīṇasyānāgāmiphalaparihīṇasya
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_63: sa paścādutpannasyānāgāmiphalasya sakṛdāgāmiphalasya vā na sabhāgahetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_65: sa pūrvotpannaḥ paścādutpannasya sakṛdāgāmiphalasya na sabhāgahetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_68: sā uttarakṣaṇasahotpannānāṃ uttaraiḥ kṣaṇair duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntikṣaṇādibhir ā mārge 'nvayajñānakṣānteḥ sahotpannānāṃ duḥkhe [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_70: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. tāsāṃ nyūnatvāt. tasyāś ca viśiṣṭatvāt. kathaṃ punas tāsāṃ nyūnatvaṃ tasyāś ca viśiṣṭatvaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_71: duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣānter duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ tadvadhyakleśaprāpter vimuktatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_72: hetūpacitataratvāc ca. tasmād dhetūpacitatarābhyo 'pi duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāniprāptibhyo duḥkhe dharmajñānaprāptir viśiṣṭā tāś ca nyūnās tatprāptitvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_73: kiṃ ca prathamakṣaṇotpannāyā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiprāpter duḥkhe dharmajñānaprāptis tasmād eva hetudvayād [Abhidh-k-vy_209] viśiṣṭā.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_75: atas tatpūrvikā apy anyā uttarakṣaṇasahotpannā duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiprāptayo hetūpacitataratve 'pi nyūnā eveti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1056_76: tasmān na sā tāsāṃ sabhāgahetur iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1058_2: evaṃ satīti vistaraḥ. yadi cittacaittā eva saṃprayuktasahetur ity etāvad ucyate bhinnakālajā api bhinnakālajaiḥ saha bhinnasaṃtānajā api ca bhinnasaṃtānajaiḥ saha saṃprayuktakahetuḥ [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:1058_3: 196a] saṃprasajyate. na hi te kālasaṃtānabhinnā na cittacaittā bhavanti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1058_4: ekākārālambanās tarhīti. yadi cittacaittā ekākārā ekanīlādyākārā ekālambanāś ca ekanīlādyālambanā evaṃ te saṃprayuktakahetur nānyatheti.
SA01yabhkvyu:1058_5: evaṃ bhinnakālajatvaṃ bhinnasaṃtānajatvaṃ ca vyāvartitaṃ bhavatīty abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1058_6: evam api sa eva prasaṃgaḥ. bhinnakālasaṃtānajānāṃ anyonyaṃ saṃprayuktakahetutvaprasaṃga iti arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1058_7: saṃbhavati hi bhinnakālasaṃtānajānām api cittacaittānām ekākārālambanatvaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1058_10: navacandrādīni hi paśyatāṃ bahūnāṃ ekākārālambanāś cittacaittā vartante.
SA01yabhkvyu:1060_0: iti. samaḥ abhinna āśraya eṣām iti
SA01yabhkvyu:1062_0: tulyārthe samaśabdagrahaṇe hi jātitulyatvāt sa eva prasaṃgaḥ syāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:1063_3: caitto 'pi cittasyety anyonyaphalam iti tenārthena sahabhūhetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1063_4: paṃcabhir iti vistaraḥ. paṃcabhis samatābhiḥ. āśrayālambanākārakāladravyasamatābhir ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1063_6: yathā teṣām eva sārthikānām anyonyabalena mārgaṃ gacchatāṃ samo 'nnapānasnānaśayanādiparibhogakriyāyāṃ prayogaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:1063_8: ata evāha. ekenāpi hi vinā na sarve saṃprayujyanta iti.

SA01yabhkvyu:2434_6: upācāreṇa tu prāptau. tasyānuśayahetubhāvāt. tadyathā duḥkhavedanāhetutvāt agnir duḥkha ity ucyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2434_9: 104a] lākṣaṇikaḥ. lākṣaṇika ity āha. kleśa eveti. ālaṃbnasaṃprayogataś cānuśerata ity anuśayā iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2436_0: iti. cittakleśakaratvād iti. asya vivaraṇaṃ. yasmād anuśayaiḥ kliṣṭaṃ cittaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2436_2: āvaraṇatvād iti. asya padasya vivaraṇaṃ. apūrvaṃ kuśalaṃ notpadyata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2436_4: śubhair viruddhatvād iti. asya padasya vivaraṇaṃ. utpannāc ca parihīyata iti. anuśayāḥ śubhair viruddhāḥ. yasmād utpannāt kuśalāt parihīyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2436_6: tasmān na viprayuktā iti. yasmāc cetasy avidyamānais tair yathoktakliṣṭādi na saṃbhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2436_7: saṃprayuktaiḥ punaḥ sarvam etad yujyata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2436_8: atha viprayuktair apy evaṃ syād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2436_10: apūrvaṃ kuśalaṃ notpadyate. utpannāc ca parihīyata iti. yady evaṃ kuśalaṃ na kadācid apy upalabhyeta.
SA01yabhkvyu:2436_12: [Tib. 104b] yasmāt kliṣṭāvasthāyāṃ kuśalāvasthāyāṃ anyasyāṃ vā te viprayuktā vartaṃta iti upalabhyeta ca kuśalam.
SA01yabhkvyu:2438_2: ācārya āha: tad idam ajñāpakaṃ. yad idaṃ vaibhāṣikair uktaṃ. cittakleśakaratvād ityādi. yo hi viprayuktam anuśayam icchatīti vātsīputrīyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2438_3: sarvam etad iti. cittakleśādi. kleśakṛtam evecchatīti. paryavasthānakṛtam evety arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2438_4: paryavasthānaṃ ca na nityasaṃnihitaṃ bhavatīti kuśalopalaṃbhasiddhiḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2438_5: kāmarāgasyānuśaya iti pakṣaparigrahe sānuśayaṃ prahīyata iti nāsti sūtravirodhaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2438_7: ata āha. na cānuśayaḥ saṃprayukto na viprayukta iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2438_8: katham ity āha. tasyādravyāntaratvād iti. śaktirūpasya bījasya rāgādibhyo 'narthāṃtaratvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2438_12: tadvat. smṛtyutpādanahetur dravyāṃtarabhūtaḥ kaścid viprayukta ity āśaṃkya dṛṣṭāntāṃtaram upanyasyati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2438_14: yathā cāṃkurādīnāṃ pūrvotpannā śāliphalajā śāliphalāṃtarotpādanāya śaktir na dravyāṃtarabhūtā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2438_15: tadvat. yas tv iti. vātsīputrīyaḥ. yadi kleśasyānuśaya itīsyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2438_16: yat tarhi sūtra eva kleśo 'nuśaya uktaḥ ṣaṭṣaṭke sūtre.
SA01yabhkvyu:2438_17: 'sya pudgalasya bhavati sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ rāgānuśaya iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2438_18: rāga evānuśayaḥ. sukhavedanāvasthāyāṃ hi rāgaḥ samudācaraṃn evam uktaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2438_19: na tu tasya bījam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2438_22: na rāgaḥ. bhavatīti vacanāt. tasyām avasthāyām utpadyamānasya rāgasyānuśayo bhavatīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2438_23: bījam utpadyate. na tūtpannam iti. bījaprakṛtāvasthātra kathyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2438_24: kadā tarhi bhavatīti. kadānuśayo 'stīty arthaḥ. yadā prasupto bhavati. yadoparato bhavatīty arthaḥ. hetau vā tadupacāra iti. hetau rāge anuśayopacāraḥ. rāgo hi rāgānuśayasya hetuḥ. tathā hi [Tib. 105b] rāgajā rāgotpādanaśaktī rāgānuśaya ity uktam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2438_25: tad idam uktaṃ bhavati. kvacid anuśayaśabdena bījam ucyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2439_2: vimānādiṣv api teṣāṃ rāgo 'stīty ataḥ prāyeṇeti grahaṇaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2439_5: tadvicchandanārthaṃ bhagavān deśayāmāsa kāmarāgo bhavarāga ity evamādi.
SA01yabhkvyu:2439_7: naiṣa mokṣe. mokṣe kuśalo dharmacchanda iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2439_8: ātmabhāva eva tu bhava ity ācāryamataṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2439_9: samāpattiṃ sāśrayām iti. samāpāttiṃ sātmabhāvām. āsvādayanta ātmabhāvam evāsvādayaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2439_10: na kāmaguṇān. kāmavītarāgatvāt. ataḥ sa rāgo bhavarāga ity ukto na kāmarāga iti darśayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2440_0: (V.3) abhidharma iti. na sūtra ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2441_1: satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ phalabhūtān paṃcopādānaskandhān ālaṃbata iti duḥkhadarśanaheyaiva.
SA01yabhkvyu:2441_2: evam aṃtagrāhadṛṣṭiḥ [Tib. 106a] teṣām eva skandhānāṃ śāśvatocchedāṃtagrahaṇāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2441_3: śīlavrataparāmarśo 'pi tān eva skandhāṃ śuddhito muktito nairyāṇikataś cālaṃbata iti na samudayadarśanaheyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2441_5: aṣṭau mārgadarśanaheyā iti. śīlavrataparāmarśam adhikaṃ prakṣipya.
SA01yabhkvyu:2441_6: mārgeṇa śudhyati. tam apāsyānyena śīlavratena śuddhiṃ pratyetīti vipratipannatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2441_8: yo hi kleśo yasya satyasyāpavādāya pravṛttaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2441_9: sa tasmin dṛṣṭe prahīyate. sarpabhrāṃtir iva rajjudarśanāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2441_14: tad evam abhyāso bhāvanā punaḥpunarutpādanam ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2441_15: satkāyadṛṣṭir ekaprakāreti. ātmātmīyākāreṇa duḥkhe vipratipannatvāt duḥkhadarśanaheyaiva.
SA01yabhkvyu:2441_16: evam aṃtagrāhadṛṣṭir iti. asāv apy ātmābhimatasya vastunaḥ śāśvatocchedāṃtāropād duḥkha eva vipratipanneti duḥkhadarśanaheyaiva.
SA01yabhkvyu:2441_19: sa hi hīne 'gradarśanaṃ. tatra samudayanirodhamārgapraheyālaṃbanaḥ samudayanirodhamārgadarśanaheyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2441_20: śeṣo duḥkhadarśanaheyaḥ. evaṃ vicikitsā sarvatrasaṃśayākāreti sarvatravipratipannatvāc catuḥsatyadarśanaheyā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2441_22: īśvarādiṣv ahetuṣu hetugraho nityātmaviparyāsāt pravartata iti duḥkhadarśanaheyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2442_0: kīdṛśā eta iti. rāgādayaś catvāraḥ kleśāḥ. paryanuyujyaṃte hi rāgapratighamānāvidyā ity anaṃtarādhikṛtāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2442_1: te ceme darśanaheyāḥ. ime bhāvanāheyā iti duḥparicchedāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2442_4: te duḥkhadarśanaheyā iti. evaṃ yāvad ye mārgasatyavipratipannāḥ te mārgadarśanaheyā iti [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:2442_5: 106b] suparicchedam etat. tatra [Abhidh-k-vy_446] ya iti rāgādayaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2442_7: yaddarśanena heyāḥ. ta ālaṃbanam eṣāṃ. ta ime yaddarśanaheyālaṃbanāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2442_8: te taddarśanaheyāḥ. te rāgādayaḥ. tasya satyasya darśanaṃ taddarśanaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2442_10: etad uktaṃ bhavati. ye rāgādayo duḥkhadarśanaheyaṃ yāvan mārgadarśanaheyaṃ kleśam ālaṃbaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:2442_11: te taddarśanaheyā iti. yadālaṃbanā yaddarśanaheyālaṃbanāś ceti vaktavyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2442_13: na vaktavyaṃ. ekaśeṣavidhānasiddheḥ. yac ca satyaṃ yaddaraśanaheyāś ca kleśā ālaṃbanam eṣāṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2442_14: ta ime yaddarśaheyālaṃbanāḥ. te taddarśanaheyā iti. nanu ca samudayadarśanaprahātavyaḥ sarvatrago 'vidyānuśayo duḥkhanirodhādisatyadarśanaheyādyālaṃbano 'pi bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2442_16: na doṣaḥ. yady api hi sa paṃcanikāyālaṃbanaḥ samudayarūpākāratas [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:2442_18: tena tathālaṃbanataḥ samudayadarśanaprahātavya eva sa iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2442_21: ye yaddarśanaheyālaṃbanā iti sarva eva darśanaheyā adhikriyaṃte na kevalā rāgādaya iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2442_22: teṣām api vyākhyāne imāv eva codyaparihārau vaktavyau.
SA01yabhkvyu:2443_2: sā copari nāstīti. dveṣaś ca rūkṣo vātavyādhivat.
SA01yabhkvyu:2443_4: vipākābhāvāc ca. aniṣṭo hy asya vipākaḥ. tau dhātau vigatāniṣṭavipākau.
SA01yabhkvyu:2443_5: āghātavastvabhāvāc ca. na hi tatra bāhyāḥ kuśakṣārakaṇṭakādayo nādhyātmikā tāpāpasmārādayaḥ saṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2445_0: ity evamādikaḥ. prakārabhedo duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyo nikāyo yāvad bhāvanāprahātavya iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2445_1: dhātubhedaḥ kāmāvacaraḥ. rūpāvacaraḥ. ārūpyāvacara iti. tatra rāgānuśayaḥ prakāradhātubhedābhyāṃ paṃcadaśavidha iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2445_3: sarvo hi rāgaḥ saktyākāraḥ. tasmān nākārabhedena vyavasthāpyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2445_6: sarvasya pratighākāratvāt. dhātubhedo 'pi nāsti. rūpārūpyadhātvos tadabhāvāt. mānānuśayaḥ prakāradhātubhedābhyāṃ paṃcadaśavidhaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2445_7: nākārabhedo 'sti. sarvasyonnatyākāratvāt. tathā avidyā paṃcadaśavidhā. tābhyām [Tib. 107b] eva. nākārabhedo 'sti. sarvasyā asaṃprakhyānākāratvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2445_8: vicikitsā dvādaśavidhā. tābhyām eva. nākārabhedaḥ. sarvasyāḥ saṃśayākāratvāt. dṛṣṭyanuśaya ākāraprakāradhātubhedaiḥ ṣaṭtriṃśadvidhaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2447_2: na hi laukiko 'sti bhavāgrapratipakṣabhūto bhāvanāmārga iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2447_3: śeṣāsu bhūmiṣv iti. kāmadhātau yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanabhūmau.
SA01yabhkvyu:2447_6: ta ete āryāṇāṃ darśanaheyās ta eva ca pṛthagjanānāṃ bhāvanāheyāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2447_7: dvividho hi bhāvanāmārgaḥ. laukiko lokottaraś ca. tathā hi śāstra uktaṃ. bhagavataḥ śrāvako darśanena jahāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2449_1: sarvāsu bhūmiṣu. kāmadhātau yāvad bhavāgre. ye rāgapratighamānāvidyānuśayā yathāyogaṃ bhavaṃti akṣāṃtivadhyā jñānavadhyāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2449_2: [Tib. 108a] te ubhayeṣām āryāṇāṃ pṛthagjanānām ca nityaṃ bhāvanāheyā eva.
SA01yabhkvyu:2449_4: bhavāgre tu lokottareṇaiva. ūrdhvabhūmikasya laukikasya mārgasyābhāvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_0: naiva hi bāhyakānāṃ darśanaprahātavyāḥ prahīyaṃta iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_2: darśanaheyās tu sarvāsv api bhūmiṣu lokottaramārgavadhyā eva.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_6: yāvan mithyādṛṣṭeḥ. ihācārataḥ prativirataḥ. kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipātanarakeṣūpapadyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_7: tam evaṃ yaḥ paśyati śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā bāhyatīrthika ṛddhimān divyacakṣuḥ paracittavit.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_8: tasyaivaṃ bhavati. nāsti kāyasucaritaṃ nāsti kāyasucaritasya vipākaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_9: nāsti vāṅmanaḥsucaritaṃ. nāsti vāṅmanaḥsucaritasya vipāka [Abhidh-k-vy_448] iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_14: [Tib. 108b] brahmajālasūtre vītarāgāṇāṃ kāmadhātvālaṃbanānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ samudācāra uktaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_18: ihaikatyaḥ śramaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vāraṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūla gato vā śūnyāgāragato vā ātaptānvayāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_21: yathā samāhite citte viṃśatiṃ saṃvartavivartakalpān samanusmarati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_22: tasyaivaṃ bhavati. śāśvato 'yam ātmā lokaś ceti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_23: tad evaṃ sarva eva ete pūrvāṃtakalpakāḥ śāśvatavādinaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_24: anayā śāśvatadṛṣṭyātmānaṃ lokaṃ cālaṃbamānāḥ kāmadhātum apy ālaṃbaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_25: ity evaṃ kāmadhātvālaṃbanānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ samudācāra uktaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_26: tathā tasminn eva brahmajālasūtre pūrvāṃtakalpakānāṃ ekatyaśāśvatikānāṃ vītarāgāṇāṃ kāmadhātvālaṃbanānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ samudācāra uktaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_27: kathaṃ. bhavati bhikṣavaḥ sa samayo yad ayaṃ lokaḥ saṃvartate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_28: saṃvartamāne loke yadbhūyasā sattvā ābhāsvare devanikāya upapadyaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_29: te tatra bhavaṃti rūpiṇo manomayā avikalā ahīnendriyāḥ sarvāṃgapratyaṃgopetāḥ śubhā varṇasthāyinaḥ [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_30: 109a] svayaṃprabhā vihāyasaṃgamāḥ prītibhakṣāḥb prītyāhārā dīrghāyuṣā dīrgham adhvānaṃ tiṣṭhaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_31: bhavati bhikṣavaḥ sa samayo yad ayaṃ loko vivartate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_32: vivartamāne loke ākāśe śūnyaṃ brāhmaṃ vimānam abhinirvartate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_33: athānyataraḥ sattva āyuḥkṣayāt puṇyakṣayāt karmakṣayāt ābhāsvarād devanikāyāc cyutvā śūnye brāhme vimāna upapadyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_34: sa tatraikāky advitīyo 'nupasthāyako dīrghāyur dīrgham adhvānaṃ tiṣṭhati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_35: atha tasya sattvasya dīrghasyādhvano 'tyayāt tṛṣṇotpannā aratiḥ saṃjātā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_36: aho batānye 'pi sattvā ihopapadyeran mama sabhāgatāyāṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_38: anye ca sattvā āyuḥkṣayāt puṇyakṣayāt karmakṣayāt ābhāsvarād devanikāyāc cyutvā tasya sattvasya sabhāgatāyām upapannaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_40: aham asmy ekāky advitīyo 'nupasthāyako dīrghāyur yāvad anye 'pi sattvā ihopapadyeran mama sabhāgatāyām.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_41: evaṃ cetaḥpraṇidhiḥ. ime ca sattvā ihopapannā mama sabhāgatāyāṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_42: mayaite sattvā nirmitāḥ. aham eṣāṃ sattvānām īśvaraḥ kartā nirmātā sraṣṭā sṛjaḥ pitṛbhūto bhāvānām iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_44: imaṃ vayaṃ [Abhidh-k-vy_449] sattvam adrākṣma ekākinam advitīyam [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_46: tasyāsya sattvasya dīrghasyādhvano 'tyayāt tṛṣṇotpannā aratiḥ saṃjātā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_47: aho batānye 'pi sattvā ihopapadyeran mama sabhāgatāyām.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_51: eṣo 'smākaṃ sattva īśvaro yāvat pitṛbhūto bhāvānāṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_53: karmakṣayāt tasmāt sthānāc cyutvā teṣām itthaṃtvam āgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyāṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_54: sa vṛddher anvayād indriyāṇāṃ paripākāt keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyaga eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajyāṃ pravrajati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_55: so 'raṇyagato vā vṛkṣamūlagato vā vistareṇa yāvat tadrūpaṃ śāṃtaṃ cetaḥsamādhiṃ spṛśati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_56: yathā samāhite citte pūrvakam ātmabhāvaṃ samanusmarati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_57: tasyaivaṃ bhavati. yo 'sau brahmā yena vayaṃ nirmitāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_59: ye tu vayaṃ tena brahmaṇā nirmitāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_60: te vayaṃ anityā adhruvā āśāśvatā vipariṇāmadharmāṇa iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_61: tad evaṃ kāmadhātur api tayāṃtagrāhadṛṣṭyālaṃbito bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_63: [Tib. 110a] tathā tatraiva brahmajālasūtre ahetusamutpattikānāṃ pūrvāntakalpānām iti prakṛtaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_65: kathaṃ. saṃti rūpadhātāv asaṃjñisattvā nāma devāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_66: saṃjñotpādāt teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tasmāt sthānāt cyutir bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_67: ato 'nyatamaḥ sattvas tasmāt sthānāc cyutvā itthaṃtvam āgacchati manuṣyāṇāṃ sabhāgatāyāṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_69: tasyaivaṃ bhavati. ahetusamutpanna ātmā lokaś ca.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_70: tad anenaivam eva bhavati. ahetusamutpanna ātmā lokaś ca.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_71: aham asmi pūrvaṃ nābhūvan so 'smy etarhi saṃbhūta ity ahetusamutpanna ātmā lokaś ca.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_72: ity evam ātmānaṃ lokaṃ cālaṃbamānās tayā mithyādṛṣṭyā kāmadhātum apy ālambanta ity eteṣāṃ kāmadhātvālaṃbānāṃ dṛṣṭīnāṃ samudācāra uktaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_73: kathaṃ ca punar eṣām ātmā lokaś cāhetusamutpanna ity evaṃ mithyādṛṣṭir bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_74: pūrvakṛtaṃ kuśalasāsravam akuśalaṃ vā na hetur ātmano lokasyety evam apavadati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_75: iti kāmadhātuvītarāgāṇāṃ teṣāṃ rūpāvacaryas tā dṛṣṭayo bhaviṣyaṃtīti vacanāvakāśaṃ matvāha.
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_76: na ca rūpāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ kāmadhātur ālaṃbanaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:2450_77: vītarāgatvād [Tib. 110b] iti. naitāḥ kāmāvacaryo dṛṣṭayaḥ. mithyājñānāni punar etāni. iti kecit pariharaṃti tad eṣāṃ ayuktaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2451_1: parihīṇāḥ [kathaṃ tarhi vītarāgāṇāṃ kāmālaṃbanadṛṣṭisamudācāra ity āha.
SA01yabhkvyu:2451_3: yathā devadatto bhagavato 'lpotsukavihāritāśayasya bhikṣusaṃghaparikarṣaṇāya pāpakecchāsamutpādād ṛddheḥ parihīṇaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2451_4: sūtre vacanāt. evaṃ hi sūtre paṭhyate. atha devadattasya lābhasatkāreṇābhibhūtasya idam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakam icchāgataṃ utpannam aho bata me bhagavān bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pratiniḥsṛjet.
SA01yabhkvyu:2451_5: ahaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ parikarṣayaṃ bhagavān alpotsuko viharet dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārayogam anuyuktaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2451_6: sahacittotpādād devadattas tasyā ṛddheḥ parihīṇa iti vistaraḥ.

SA01yabhkvyu:2453_1: anyās tu samāropikā iti. katham ucchedadṛṣṭiḥ samāropikā.

SA01yabhkvyu:2453_3: ādiśabdalopaḥ kṛta iti. dṛṣṭyādīnām upādānaskaṃdhānāṃ paratvena pradhānatvenāmarśo dṛṣṭiparāmarśa iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2453_7: amārge ca mārgadṛṣṭir iti. mārgadarśanaprahātavyaḥ. śīlavratamātrakam iti. śīlavratam api bauddhānāṃ mokṣaprāptaye bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2453_8: na tu tanmātrakam ity atas tadanyeṣāṃ dṛṣṭiḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2453_9: atrāpi kila ādiśabda iti. śīlavratādiparāmarśaḥ. śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. śīlavrataṃ hi rūpaskaṃdhasaṃgṛhītam.
SA01yabhkvyu:2454_4: tata eva prahīyata iti. duḥkhadarśanād eva prahīyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2454_6: śīlavratena vā śuddhim iti. nāyaṃ tatkṛtaḥ kāraṇābhiniveśaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2454_9: vaibhāṣika āha. so 'pi duḥkhadarśanaprahātavya iti vistaraḥ duḥkhe vipratipannatvād iti vaibhāṣikāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2454_13: sarveṣāṃ sāsravālaṃbanānāṃ adṛṣṭisvabhāvānāṃ ca duḥkhādidarśanaprahātavyānāṃ [Abhidh-k-vy_451] duḥkhe vipratipannatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2454_14: sarvaṃ hi sāsravaṃ vastu duḥkham iti duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaprasaṃgaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2454_15: tathā ca sati na kaścit samudayādidarśanaprahātavyaḥ syāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2454_16: idaṃ cāparaṃ vaktavyaṃ. kīdṛśo vānyaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo mārgadarśanaprahātavyaḥ sa vaktavyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2454_17: yo 'pi hi gośīlādinā śudhyati yāvat sukhaduḥkhavyatikramaṃ cānuprāpnotīti paśyati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2454_18: tasyāpy ayam akāraṇaṃ kāraṇataḥ pratyetīti duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśa iti paṭhyeta.
SA01yabhkvyu:2454_22: so 'pi hi nāma duḥkhe vipratipanna ity ācāryaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2454_23: mithyādṛṣṭyādayo hi mārgadarśanaprahātavyā aṣṭāv anuśayaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśasyālambanaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2454_27: 112a] ity abhiprāyaḥ. yasya ceti vistaraḥ. yasya ca pudgalasya nāsti mārga iti mārgālaṃbanā mithyādṛṣṭirasti vicikitsā vā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2454_28: sa pudgalo nāsti mokṣamārga iti paśyan.
SA01yabhkvyu:2454_29: vicikitsan vā. kim asti mārgaḥ. nāstīti saṃdihyan. kathaṃ tayā mithyādṛṣṭyā śuddhiṃ pratyeṣyati pratipatsyate etayā mithyādṛṣṭyā etayā vā vicikitsayeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2454_30: mithyādṛṣṭivicikitsāyogād eva hi tasya śuddhipratipattir nāsti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2454_31: athānyam iti vistaraḥ. athānyaṃ sāṃkhyādiparikalpitaṃ mokṣamārgaṃ parāmṛśya gṛhītvā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2454_33: so 'pīti. tīrthikaḥ. tenaivānyena sāṃkhyādiparikalpitena śuddhiṃ pratyeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2454_35: tasyāpy asau śīlavrataparāmarśo mārgadarśanaprahātavyālaṃbano na sidhyati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2454_36: kiṃ tarhi. sāṃkhyādiparikalpitamārgālaṃbana eveti ayaṃ cānyo doṣaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2454_37: yaś cāpīti vistaraḥ. yaś cāpi mithyādṛṣṭikaḥ samudayanirodhadarśanaprahātavyayā mithyādṛṣṭyā śuddhiṃ pratyeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2454_39: sa śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ kasmān na samudayanirodhadarśanaheya ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2454_41: yasmād ayaṃ duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyaḥ śīlavrataparāmarśo na saṃbhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2454_42: mārgadarśanaprahātavyaś ca. atiprasaṃgādidoṣāt [Tib. 112b] tasmāt parīkṣya eṣo 'rthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2455_2: yathaiva hi duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyā ime daśānuśayā bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2455_4: vicikitsā. rāgaḥ. pratighaḥ. mānaḥ. avidyā ceti. tathaiveme daśa samudayadarśanaprahātavyāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2455_8: bhāvanāheyās tu ṣaṭ. akalpikā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ. ucchedadṛṣṭiḥ. sahajo rāgaḥ. pratighaḥ. mānaḥ. avidyā ceti. ṣaṭcatvāriṃśat kāmavācarā anuśayā bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2455_9: rūpāvacarās tv ekacatvāriṃśad eta eva pratighavarjyāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2456_0: atra kaścit samādhim āha. yad uktam atiprasaṃgaḥ sarveṣāṃ sāsravālaṃbanānāṃ duḥkhe vipratipannatvād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2456_8: te duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyāḥ. śīlavrataparāmarśaś ca duḥkhamukhena duḥkhe vipratipanno nityātmagrahaṇāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2456_11: tadyathā sāṃkhyanirgraṃthādayaḥ svaparikalpitaṃ mārgaṃ gṛhītvā nāsti bauddhānāṃ mokṣamārga iti mithyādṛṣṭim utpādayaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2456_15: nāsti tu sa śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ yaḥ samudayamukhena vipratipadyeta.
SA01yabhkvyu:2456_20: taccharīrānupapatteḥ. akāraṇe hi kāraṇabhiniveśaḥ. amārge ca mārgābhiniveśeḥ. śīlavrataparāmarśaśarīraṃ. samudayāpavādikāyāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyāṃ śuddhyabhiniveśe nanv ākasmikāj janmadarśanam asya syāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2456_24: nirodhāpavādikāyāṃ tu mithyādṛṣṭau śuddhipratyāgamanān nirodhopāyakalpanaiva na saṃbhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2456_25: kathaṃ nāsti nirodha iti taddarśanapṛṣṭhena tadupāyakalpanā vyarthā bhavet.
SA01yabhkvyu:2456_29: yasya hi mārgālaṃbanā mithyādṛṣṭir vicikitsā vāsti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2456_30: sa nāsti mokṣamārga iti paśyan vicikitsan vā kathaṃ tayā śuddhiṃ pratyeṣyatīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2456_32: nyāyatas tatgrahaṇāt. anyā hi tena mokṣamārgo hṛdi niveśito bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2456_34: eṣa nyāyo yad anyo mokṣamārgo nāsti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2456_35: yac ca syān na vety anyaṃ mokṣamārgaṃ vicikitsatīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2456_37: yaś cāsāv anyo mokṣamārgas tena hṛdi niveśitaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2456_38: [Tib. 114a] sa naiva tasya mārgadarśanaheyasya śīlavrataparāmarśasya viṣayaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2456_41: tatkalpanāsāmarthyāt. anyad dhi tena mokṣasthānaṃ hṛdi niveśitaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2456_43: ataḥ samānam etad iti. tan na. nityaśāṃtagrahaṇasāmānyena tadapavāde śuddhyabhiniveśānupapatteḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2456_49: tatra yathehadhārmikāṇāṃ nivāṇe dravyādravyasaṃpratipattibhedo 'pi nityaśāṃtagrahaṇasāmānyāt tadapavāde doṣo darśanam eva.
SA01yabhkvyu:2456_50: yenapi kiṃcin mokṣasthānaṃ hṛdi niveśitaṃ syāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2456_52: bhinnā hi śīlavratādayaḥ svabhāvataś cākārataś cāryamārgāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2456_54: nāsti kalpanāsāmānyaṃ. ato mārgadarśanaprahātavya eva śīlavrataparāmarśaḥ saṃbhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2456_63: sa mārgadarśanaprahātavyaḥ. yaḥ śīlavratādyālaṃbanaḥ. sa na mārgavipratipattiḥ. tathā na bādhate. yathā mārgavipratipattyālaṃbanaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2459_0: sakalety apara iti. sakalā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ ātmadṛṣṭir ātmīyadṛṣṭiś cātmaviparyāsa ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2460_0: vaibhāṣika āha. katham ātmīyadṛṣṭir viparyāsa iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2460_2: kathaṃ ca na bhavitavyam iti paraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2460_5: na punar ātmīya iti. asty evaṃ sūtranirdeśaḥ. na punar asāv ātmadṛṣṭer arthāṃtarabhūtā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2460_6: kathaṃ kṛtvā. ātmānam eva tatra paṃcopādānaskaṃdheṣu vāśinaṃ paśyann ātmīyaṃ paśyatīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2460_7: na kevalam ātmānaṃ paśyaty ātmīyam api paśyatīty arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2460_10: athāham ity etasmāt prathamanirdiṣṭān mameti ṣāṣṭhīnirdiṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭyaṃtaraṃ syāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2460_11: mayā mahyam ity etad api syāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2460_12: dṛṣṭyaṃtaram iti prakṛtaṃ. mayeti tṛtīyānirdeśān mahyam ity ca caturthīnirdeśāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2461_0: kasmād anye kleśā na viparyāsā iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2463_0: viparyāsānāṃ vyavasthānaṃ. yatraitāni samastāni kāraṇāni saṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2463_1: te viparyāsāḥ sthāpitāḥ. yatra tu na samastāni. te na viparyāsā ity uktaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2463_3: 115b] iti. yasmāc chīlavratamātreṇa śuddhir ity ālaṃbate nitīrayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2463_5: na hi śīlavrataṃ śuddhikāraṇaṃ na bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2463_6: kevalaṃ tu na bhavatīti. katham asya samāropakatvaṃ. tanmātreṇa śuddhikāraṇabhāvasamāropāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2463_7: yady asaṃtīrako na viparyāsaḥ yat tarhi sūtra uktaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2463_8: tat kathaṃ. na hi saṃjñā saṃtīrikā nāpi cittaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2464_0: dvādaśa viparyāsā iti. caturṣu viparyāseṣu pratyekaṃ saṃjñācittadṛṣṭiviparyāsā iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2464_1: katham ity ucyate. anitye nityam iti vistaraḥ evaṃ yāvad anātmany ātmeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2464_4: yāvad anātmany ātmeti eta eva traya iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2464_10: catvāro bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ. katama ity āha. daḥkhe ca [Abhidh-k-vy_455] saṃjñācittaviparyāsāv aśucau ceti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2464_12: aśucau śucīti saṃjñācittaviparyāsāv aparau dvāv iti catvāraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2465_3: ātmaviparyāsāv api kiṃ neṣyete ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2465_4: kiṃ kāraṇam ity āhuḥ. na hi striyām ātmani ca vinā sattvasāṃjñayā kāmarāgo yukta iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2465_5: tasmād etāv apy anātmany ātmeti saṃjñācittaviparyāsau bhāvanāprahātavyāv iti prāptaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2465_7: duḥkhe sukham iti aśucau śucīti yāvad anātmany ātmeti saṃjñāviparyāsaś cittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāsaḥ prahīyata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2465_8: tāsmād dṛṣṭisamutthe eva dṛṣṭisaṃprayukte eva saṃjñācitte viparyāsau nānye.
SA01yabhkvyu:2465_10: etad uktaṃ bhavati. asty asau saṃjñācittavibhramaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2465_11: na tu viparyāsaḥ. yasmād asau dṛṣṭisamuttho na bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2465_12: kasmād ity āha. tatkālabhrāṃtimātratvād iti. strīdarśanakāle bhrāṃtimātratvād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2465_13: yasmāt tatkālam eva darśanakālam evāryāṇāṃ bhrāṃtiḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2465_15: [Tib. 116b] yathā alāta āśu bhramyamāṇe tatkālamātraṃ cakram iti bhrāṃtir utpadyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2465_16: na paścāt. citralikhitaṃ ca yakṣaṃ dṛṣṭvā tatkālaṃ bhrāṃtir utpadyate yakṣa iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2465_17: tadvat. āryasyātra paridhyānān muhūrtaṃ sukhaśucibhrāṃtiḥ sattvabhrāṃtir vā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2465_18: na tv asau viparyāsaḥ. uktaṃ hi bhagavatā dhandhāḥ khalu bhikṣavaḥ śrutavata āryaśrāvakasya smṛtisaṃpramoṣā utpadyaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:2465_19: atha ca punaḥ kṣipram evāstaṃ parikṣayaṃ paryādānaṃ gacchaṃtīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2466_0: yady asau saṃjñācittabhramo na viparyāso yat tarhi sthavirānandeneti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2467_1: aṃga me gautama brūhi śāṃtitvam anukampayeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2469_0: iti. sa hi srotaāpannaḥ. tasya cānayā gāthayā viparyāsāstitvaṃ paridīpitam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2469_1: tasmād iti vistaraḥ. yasmān nikāyāṃtarīyamataṃ vaibhāṣikair āgamena virudhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2469_3: tasmāt sarva evāṣṭau saṃjñācittaviparyāsāḥ [Abhidh-k-vy_456] śaikṣasyāprahīṇā ity apare.
SA01yabhkvyu:2469_5: katarasya sūtrasya. yad idaṃ vaibhāṣikaiḥ sūtram [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:2469_6: 117a] ānītaṃ. yaś ca śrutavān āryaśrāvaka iti vistareṇa yāvat prahīyata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2469_8: te 'pi cāṣṭau saṃjñācittaviparyāsā āryasatyānāṃ duḥkhādīnāṃ yathābhūtajñānāt prahīyaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:2469_10: ity upāyasamākhyānād upāyapravartanān nāsti tasya sūtrasya virodhaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2469_11: yad idam uktam idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayo 'yaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2469_13: kiṃ tarhi. bhāvanāmārgam apīti. bhāvanāmārgo 'pi hy anāsravaś caturāryasatyālaṃbana eveti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2470_0: (V.10) pravṛttibhedād iti. ākārabhedād ity arthaḥ. aprāpte viśeṣādhigama iti. samādhisaṃniśritāḥ sāsravāś cānāsravāś ca dharmā viśeṣās tasyādhigamaḥ sākṣātkaraṇaṃ viśeṣādhigamaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2470_3: aguṇavato guṇavān aham iti. aguṇānvitasya guṇavān aham asmīti viparītaviṣayo māno mithyāmānaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2470_6: mithyāmānas tu nirguṇasya sato guṇavān aham asmīti nirvastukaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2470_7: mānavidhā iti. mānaprakārāḥ. sadṛśo hīno 'stīti mānavidhā saḍṛśo 'smīti mānavidhā hīno 'smīti mānavidheti vaktavyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2470_8: dṛṣṭisaṃniśritās traya iti. pṛthagjanam adhikṛtya dṛṣṭisaṃniśritā ity ucyaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:2470_9: ātmadṛṣṭiḥ pūrvam aham iti. paścād anaṃtaram ime mānāḥ. atimānamānonamānā yathākramaṃ ete bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2470_10: kathaṃ śreyān aham asmīti mānavidhā dṛṣṭisaṃniśrito 'timānaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2470_11: 'sadṛśo 'smīti mānavidhā dṛṣṭisaṃniśrito mānaḥ hīno 'smīti mānavidhā dṛṣṭisaṃniśrita ūnamānaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2470_13: asti me śreyān asti me sadṛśaḥ asti me hīna iti dṛṣṭisaṃniśritā ūnamānamānātimānāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2470_14: tṛtīyaṃ nāsti me śreyān nāsti me sadṛśo nāsti me hīna iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2470_17: prakaraṇapādanirdeśaḥ. ko 'sau. yo 'sau pūrvam uktaḥ. hīnād viśiṣṭo 'smi [Tib. 118a] samena vetyādinirdeśaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2471_1: na kevalaṃ śeṣāḥ. śeṣā api darśanaprahātavyāḥ. na kevalam asmimāna iti pradarśānārthaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2471_2: nāvaśyam iti. prahīṇaṃ na samudācaratīti niyamaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2471_3: tathā hi śraddhādimiddhaduḥkhendriyacakṣur ādayaḥ prahīṇā api saṃudācaraṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2473_2: bhāvanāheyā vadhādikasattvādayaḥ eva dharmā asyālaṃbanam iti kṛtvā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2473_3: satkāyadṛṣṭyādayo 'pi hi yady api bhāvanāheyān dharmān ālaṃbaṃte na tu kevalaṃ bhāvanāheyā ity ato na te bhāvanāheyāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2473_4: tatra prārthaneti. tatra traidhātukyām anityatāyāṃ prārthanā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2473_6: [Tib. 118a] bhavatīty āha. yathoktaṃ sūtre. yāvad ayam ātmā jīvati tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2473_7: tāvat sarogaḥ sagaṇḍaḥ saśalyaḥ sajvaraḥ saparidāhakaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2473_8: yataś cāyam ātmā ucchidyate vinaśyati na bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2473_11: aho batāham airāvaṇo nāgarājaḥ syām ity evamādikā bhavatṛṣṇā na samudācarati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2473_12: ādiśabdena kuveraḥ syāṃ strī syām ity evamādikā gṛhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2473_13: prādeśagrahaṇād indraḥ syām ity evamādikā samudācaratīti darśitaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2474_0: (V.11) mānavidhā api bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ santīty uktam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2480_0: ity anena granthena. saṃprati teṣāṃ vidhādīnāṃ āryasyāsamudācāra ucyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2482_2: vadhādiparyavasthānasya vibhavatṛṣṇāyāḥ pradeśasya bhavatṛṣṇāyāś ca grahaṇam ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_2: paṃcānām api nikāyānāṃ hetubhāvenāvatiṣṭhanta ity apare.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_3: vakṣyati hi eṣāṃ prabhāvenānyanaikāyikā api kleśā upajāyaṃta iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_4: ekādaśānuśayā iti vistaraḥ. sapta dṛṣṭayo duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyāḥ satkāyadṛṣṭyādayaḥ paṃca.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_5: samudayadarśanaprahātavye dve dṛṣṭī mithyādṛṣṭiparāmarśadṛṣṭī iti sapta.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_8: ekadeśato na sākalyataḥ. ye hy avidye etatsarvatragasaṃprayukte.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_9: āveṇikyau ca. te eva sarvatrage bhavato na rāgādisaṃprayukte.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_11: navānuśayāḥ sākalyataḥ. dvāv ekadeśata iti kṛtvā. dhātubhedena tu trayastriṃśat.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_12: āveṇikīti ko 'rthaḥ. evam āhuḥ. saṃparko veṇir ity ucyate na veṇir aveṇiḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_13: pṛthagbhāva ity arthaḥ. evaṃ hy uktam aveṇir bhagavān aveṇir bhikṣusaṃgha [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_14: 119b] iti. pṛthag bhagavān pṛthag bhikṣusaṃgha ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_19: kaḥ sakaleneti vistaraḥ. kaḥ sakalena kāmadhātunā śuddhiṃ pratyeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_20: akāraṇaṃ vā kāraṇataḥ sakalaṃ kāmadhātuṃ pratyetīty adhikṛtaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_21: tasmāc chīlavrataparāmarśo na sarvatraga ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_22: nocyate sakalaṃ niravaśeṣam anekaṃ bhedabhinnaṃ svadhātuṃ yugapad ālaṃbaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_23: api tu paṃcaprakāram api sarvayugapad ālaṃbaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_25: prakārasarvatāyāṃ sarvaśabdo 'yaṃ draṣṭavya ity eṣa vaibhāṣikāṇāṃ parihāraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_26: yātrātmadṛṣṭir iti. paṃcasūpādānaskandheṣu. tatrātmatṛṣṇā teṣām ātmābhiniveśavastutvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_31: tatra vastuni tasya [Abhidh-k-vy_459] pudgalasya prārthanā tatprārthanety arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_32: tena ca māna iti. tena ca vastunā mānaḥ. taddvāreṇonnatir ity arthaḥ. evaṃ satīti. evaṃ tṛṣṇāmānayoḥ sarvatragatve sati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_33: [Tib. 120a] satkāyadṛṣṭyādivad darśanabhāvanāheyālaṃbanatvāt etad ubhayaṃ tṛṣṇāmānalakṣaṇaṃ kiṃ prahātavyaṃ kena prahātavyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_35: ye yaddarśanaheyālaṃbanāḥ. te taddarśanaheyā iti niyamaṃ manasikṛtvā pṛcchati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_36: anyathā hi satkāyadṛṣṭyādivad evaitad ubhayaṃ darśanaprahātavyam eva syād iti kim atra praṣṭavyaṃ syāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_38: na ca te na darśanaheyā bhavaṃtīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_39: atrācāryaḥ samādhim āha. bhāvanāprahātavyaṃ vyāmiśrālaṃbanatvād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_40: yadi tṛṣṇāmānau darśanaprahātavyālaṃbanāv eva syātāṃ darśanaprahātavyau.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_41: na tu evam. ato vyāmiśrālaṃbanatvād bhāvanāprahātavyau.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_43: atha veti. sa evācāryaḥ parāvṛtya punar bravīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_45: kim. etad ubhayam iti vartate. kasmād ity āha. dṛṣṭibalādhānavartitvād iti. dṛṣṭer balādhānam sāmarthyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_46: dṛṣṭibalādhānena vartituṃ śīlam asyeti dṛṣṭibalādhānavarti tadubhayaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_47: tadbhāvaḥ. tasmāt. tadubhayaṃ [Tib. 120b] darśanaprahātavyam astv iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_50: tasmān na sarvatragāv iti. yatrātmadṛṣṭiḥ. tatra tṛṣṇāmānau. na tu yugapat sarvasmin. svalakṣaṇakleśatvāt. ekadeśālaṃbanau hi tau. tasmān na sarvatragau. na cet sarvatragau. tena yau yaddarśanaheyālaṃbanau.
SA01yabhkvyu:2486_51: tau taddarśanaheyau. pariśiṣṭau bhāvanāheyāv iti siddhaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2487_1: kadācid dvāv iti. kadācit trīṃ dhātūn iti noktam etat.
SA01yabhkvyu:2487_2: kāmadhātusthās tu kadācid visabhāgam ekarūpadhātum ārūpyadhātuṇ vālaṃbaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:2488_0: ātmātmīyatvenāgrahaṇād iti. yasmāt taṃ brahmāṇaṃ ātmatvenātmīyatvena na gṛhṇāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2488_1: ataḥ satkāyadṛṣṭir na bhavati brahmaṇi sattvadṛṣṭiḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2488_3: ato nityadṛṣṭir api tasmin brahmaṇi nāṃtagrāhadṛṣṭir iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2488_4: kā tarhīyaṃ dṛṣṭir iti. yeyaṃ brahmaṇi sattvadṛṣṭiḥ. nityadṛṣṭiś ca. neyaṃ dṛṣṭiḥ mithyājñānaṃ punar etad iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2488_6: na hi sarvā viparītālaṃbanā prajñā dṛṣṭir iṣyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2488_11: saiva satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ. mahābrahmaṇi ca sattvadṛṣṭir aham ity ahaṃkārasya na saṃniśrayībhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2490_0: iti. vedanādayaḥ. prāptayas tu naivam anekaphalatvād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2490_3: ata eveti. yasmāt sahabhuvo 'pi sarvatragā avasthāpyaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:2490_4: tasmāc catuṣkoṭikaṃ kriyate. prathamā koṭir anāgatāḥ sarvatragā anuśayā iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2492_0: iti. ṣaḍ evety avadhāraṇaṃ. tasmān na rāgādayo 'nāsravālaṃbanā yujyante.
SA01yabhkvyu:2493_0: na rāgas tasya varjyatvān na dveṣo 'napakārata
SA01yabhkvyu:2494_0: ityādivacanāt. avidyā ca tābhyām iti. mithyādṛṣṭivicikitsābhyāṃ yā saṃprayuktā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2494_1: yā cāveṇiky avidyā. sa eko 'vidyānuśaya iti. trayo nirodhadarśanapraghātavyā anāsravālaṃbanāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2494_2: evaṃ mārgadarśanaprahātavyā apy eta eva traya iti ṣaḍ bhūmaubhūmau bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2500_0: tu dharmajñānapakṣyaḥ ṣaḍbhūmiko 'nvayajñānapakṣyo navabhūmiko mārgagocarāṇām apareṣāṃ trayāṇām anuśayānām ālaṃbanaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2500_1: kathaṃ kṛtvā. nirodhālaṃbanā ete trayānuśayā navabhūmikā bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2500_8: sa sarva eva kāmāvacarāṇāṃ eṣāṃ trayāṇām anuśayānām ālaṃbanaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2500_11: sa sarva eva prathamadhyānabhūmikānām eṣāṃ trayāṇām anuśayānām ālaṃbanam.
SA01yabhkvyu:2500_14: mārgas tu ṣaḍbhūmiko 'pi navabhūmiko 'pi vā teṣām ālaṃbanam ity atra hetuṃ darśayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2500_15: mārgo hy anyonyahetuka iti. katham anyonyahetukaḥ. ṣaḍbhūmiko dharmajñānapakṣyo mārgo 'dharabhūmikasyordhvabhūmikasya vā samasya viśiṣṭasya vā dharmajñānapakṣyāṃtarasyānvayajñānapakṣyasyāpi ca mārgasya hetur bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2500_16: so 'pi tasyānvayajñānapakṣo navabhūmiko yojyaḥ vistareṇaitad vyākhyātaṃ
SA01yabhkvyu:2502_0: ity atra. tad evaṃ kāmāvacarānāṃ mārgālaṃbanānām anāgamyabhūmiko dharmajñānapakṣyo yāvac caturthadhyānabhūmika ālaṃbanaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2502_1: anvayajñānapakṣyo 'pi mārgo 'nāgamyabhūmiko yāvad ākikṃcanyāyatanabhūmikaḥ prathamadhyānabhūmikānām eṣāṃ mārgālaṃbanānām ālaṃbanam.
SA01yabhkvyu:2502_3: yadi [Tib. 122b] kāmāvacarā mārgālaṃbanā mithyādṛṣṭyādayo rūpārūpyapratipakṣam api nirodhamārgākhyaṃ dharmajñānam ālambaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:2502_5: kasmāt ta eva mithyādṛṣṭyādayo 'nvayajñānapakṣyam api mārgaṃ nālaṃbaṃte dharmajñānānvayajñānayor anyonyahetukatvād ity āha.
SA01yabhkvyu:2502_8: na te tad ālaṃbaṃte. dharmajñānaṃ tu kāmadhātupratipakṣa iti rūpārūpyapratipakṣam apy ālambate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2503_0: dharmajñānaṃ nirodhe yan mārge vā bhāvanāpathe
SA01yabhkvyu:2504_0: iti siddhāntād dharmajñānaṃ rūpārūpyapratipakṣaḥ tadbhāvāt tadbhūmikānāṃ rūpārūpyabhūmikānāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyādīnām ālaṃbanaṃ bhaviṣyati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2504_1: na tat sakalam iti vistaraḥ. na tad dharmajñānaṃ sakalaṃ pratipakṣo rūpārūpyadhātvoḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2504_2: kiṃ tarhi kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. duḥkhasamudayadharmajñānayor bhāvanāmārgasaṃgṛhītayor etadapratipakṣatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2504_4: ato na rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyādīnāṃ taddharmajñānam [Abhidh-k-vy_462] ālaṃbanaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2504_5: [Tib. 123a] kiṃ ca nāpi sakalayor iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2505_0: dharmajñānaṃ nirodhe yan mārge vā bhāvanāpatha
SA01yabhkvyu:2506_0: iti vacanāt. atra nigamanaṃ karoti ity ādyābhāvān na bhavaty ālaṃbanam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2506_1: duḥkhasamudayanirodhamārgāṇām ādyayor duḥkhasamudayadharmajñānayor yathoktarūpārūpyapratipakṣatvaṃ praty abhāvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2506_2: rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ darśanabhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ cādyeṣu darśanaprahātavyeṣu pratipakṣatvaṃ prati tasya dharmajñānasyābhāvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2506_3: na tadbhūmikānāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyādīnāṃ mārgālaṃbanānāṃ rūpārūpyabhūmikānāṃ dharmajñānam ālaṃbanaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2506_4: tad eva traidhātukān aṣṭādaśānāsravālaṃbanān apāsya śeṣā aśītir anuśayāḥ sāsravālaṃbanā iti sthāpitaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2507_0: na varjyanīyaḥ syād iti. na prāpticchedena praheyaḥ syād ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2507_1: yathā kuśalo dharmacchando 'bhilāṣarūpaḥ samyagdṛṣṭir iti na prāpticchedena praheyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2509_2: kleśamalaprahīṇatvāt. mārgo 'pi paramārthaśuddhiḥ paramārthena śudhyaty anayeti kṛtvā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2509_3: yas tayoḥ śuddhir iti grāho na śīlavrataparāmarśa iti yujyate vyavasthāpayituṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2509_4: agrau ca tāv iti. bhūtārthaśuddhitvāt tau nirodhamārgau agrau.
SA01yabhkvyu:2509_5: api ca parāmarśau yady anāsravālaṃbanau syātāṃ samyagdṛṣṭilakṣaṇaṃ bhajetāṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2509_7: ataś ca na darśanaheyau syātāṃ agrau hīne ca vastuny agra iti grāho dṛṣṭiparāmarśo yujyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2509_8: na caivaṃ nirodhamārgāv iti. na tayor agragrāho dṛṣṭiparāmarśo bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2510_1: kati saṃprayogata eveti. katy ālaṃbanata eveti nāvadhāraṇena pṛcchati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2511_0: ānuguṇyartho 'trānuśayārthaḥ. na tadbhūmikāḥ pratyayās tadupapattaye ānuguṇyena vartanta iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2511_1: na ca te tadanuguṇā iti. na ca te nirodhādayaḥ teṣāṃ mithyādṛṣṭyādīnāṃ anuguṇāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2511_3: yathā vātikasya rūkṣaṃ nānuśeta ity ukte na kāyasyānuguṇyena vartata iti gamyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2511_4: [Abhidh-k-vy_463] pūrvasmiṃs tu pakṣe pratiṣṭhālābhārtho na teṣu pratiṣṭhāṃ labhata iti vacanāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2513_0: (V.19) tac ca tayor nāstīti. tac ca duḥkhaṃ tayoḥ rūpārūpyadhātvor nāsti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2513_2: tasyābhāvāt. etad agraṃ dṛṣṭigatānām iti. etad viśiṣṭaṃ dṛṣṭiprakārebhyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2513_3: nātisāvadyam ity arthaḥ. mokṣo mārgopaniṣat ucchedas tu nirhetuko 'bhipreta iti bhrāṃteḥ sāvadyam ucchedadarśanam iti viśeṣaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2513_4: svadravyasaṃmūḍhatvād iti. svasaṃtatipatitānām upādānaskaṃdhānām ātmātmīyatvena grahaṇāt svadravyasaṃmūḍhā satkāyadṛṣṭiḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2513_6: yathā ca te dṛṣṭī. tathā tatsaṃprayoginy apy avidyeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2513_7: aparapīḍāpravṛttatvāc ca. kim. avyākṭe satkāyāṃtagrāhadṛṣṭī iti prakṛtaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2513_8: te hi na kācid api parapīḍāṃ kurutaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2513_10: svargatṛṣṇāyā asmimānasya ca dānādibhir avirodhāt svadravyasaṃmūḍhātvād aparapīḍāpravṛttatvāc cāvyākṛtatvaprasaṃgaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2513_11: na ceṣyate. tasmān naibhiḥ kāraṇair anayor avyākṛtatvam ity anenābhiprāyeṇa pūrvācāryamatam [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:2513_12: 124b] upanyasyati. sahajā satkāyadṛṣṭir ityādi. vikalpitā tv akuśaleti. yātmavādibhiḥ kapilolūkādibhir vikalpitā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2513_13: sā nāvyākṛtā. kiṃ tarhi. akuśaleti. antagrāhadṛṣṭir api. yā tair vikalpitā. sāpy akuśalā. tatpūrvakatvāt tu sā tulyavārttety anuktāpi gamyata eva.
SA01yabhkvyu:2515_1: kāmadhātau satkāyadṛṣṭyādiśeṣāḥ kleśā akuśalā evety avadhāryate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2516_1: eṣām aṣṭānavater anuśayānām ity anuvṛttatvenaivaṃ vivarjanaṃ kriyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2518_1: te sarva eva paṃca prakārā apy akuśalamūlāni.
SA01yabhkvyu:2518_3: nānye 'nuśayā iti. mūḍhir iti mohaparyāyaḥ. sarvo mohaḥ anyatra satkāyāṃtagrāhadṛṣṭisaṃprayuktān mohād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2520_1: ata evocyate. yady akuśalaṃ cākuśalasyaiva ca mūlam iṣṭam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2520_2: eta evety avadhāraṇāc cheṣā anuśayā mithyādṛṣṭyādayo [Abhidh-k-vy_464] nākuśalamūlānīti siddhaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2524_1: trīṇy eva na catvārīti darśitaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2526_0: seti avyākṛtatāṃ darśayatīti. avyākṛtamūlānīti. anenāvyākṛtaśabdena kevalena tṛṣṇāvidyāmatayo viśeṣitā iti darśayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2526_1: atra ca matir akleśasvabhāvāpy avyākṛtamūlam itīṣyate vaibhāṣikaiḥ.

SA01yabhkvyu:2526_3: yā kācid avidyā rūpārūpyadhātvoḥ kāmadhātau ca satkāyāṃtagrāhadṛṣṭisaṃprayogiṇīti.

SA01yabhkvyu:2723_26: srotaāpattiphalakāle sakṛdāgāmiphalakāle 'nāgāmiphalakāle 'rhattvaphalakāle indriyasaṃcārakāle ceti ṣaṭsu kāleṣu visaṃyogalābhaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2723_29: tasyaiva mṛdvindriyasya rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ mārgadarśanaheyānāṃ mārgānvayajñānakāle pratipakṣodayakāla iti vā phalaprāptikāla iti vā gṛhīte prathamato visaṃyogalābhaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2723_30: punaḥ sakṛdāgāmiphalaprāptikāle [Abhidh-k-vy_503] yāvad indriyasaṃcārakāla iti paṃcasu kāleṣu.
SA01yabhkvyu:2723_31: bhāvanāheyānām api tasyaive kāmāvacarāṇāṃ paṃcaprakārāṇāṃ adhimātrādhimātrasya yāvan madhyamadhyasya.
SA01yabhkvyu:2723_32: [Tib. 164a] teṣv eva srotaāpattiphalakālavarjyeṣu paṃcasu kāleṣu visaṃyogalābhaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2723_33: madhyamṛdos tu ṣaṣṭhasya prakārasya tasyaiva caturṣu kāleṣu.
SA01yabhkvyu:2723_35: tasminn anyatarasmin. anāgāmiphalakāle. arhattvaphalaprāptikāle. indriyasaṃcārakāle ceti. tasyaiva mṛdvadhimātrasya mṛdumadhyasya ca saptamāṣṭamayoḥ prakārayoḥ pratipakṣodayakāle 'nāgāmiphalakāle yāvad indriyasaṃcārakāle veti caturṣv eva kāleṣu visaṃyogalābhaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2723_36: tasyaiva mṛdumṛdor aṃtyasya prakārasya pratipakṣodayakāla iti vā phalaprāptikāla iti vaikatarasmin.
SA01yabhkvyu:2723_37: arhattvaphalakāle. indriyasaṃcārakāle ceti triṣu kāleṣu visaṃyogalābhaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2723_38: tasyaivārhattvaphalaṃ prāpnuvato ye navaprakārā rūpārūpyāvacarāḥ kleśā bhāvanāprahātavyāḥ prahīṇāḥ adhimātradhimātro yāvan mṛdumṛdur iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2723_39: teṣāṃ bhāvāgrikaṃ mṛdumṛduprakāram aṃtyaṃ hitvā sarveṣāṃ triṣv eva kāleṣu visaṃyogalābhaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2723_41: ceti. yas tv asyaivārūpyāvacaro mṛdumṛdur aṃtyaḥ kleśaprakāraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2723_43: pratipakṣodayakāla iti vārhattvaphalakāla iti vā anyatarasminn indriyasaṃcārakāle ceti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2723_46: tīkṣṇendriyasya punaḥ keṣāṃcit kleśānāṃ paṃcasu kāleṣu.
SA01yabhkvyu:2723_52: sa tu punarlābho na bhavatīti na vaktavya iti paśyāmaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2724_0: (V.63, 64) phale hetūpacārād iti. prahāṇaṃ phalaṃ parijñā jñānasvabhāvo hetuḥ tasmin prahāṇe.
SA01yabhkvyu:2724_1: phale hetūpacāraḥ. prahāṇaṃ parijñeti. tadyathā ṣaḍ imāni sparśāyatanāni pūrvam abhisaṃskṛtāny abhisaṃcetitāni paurāṇaṃ karma veditavyaṃ iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2724_3: sūtre evaṃ hi paṭhyate. parijñeyāṃś ca vo bhikṣavo dharmān deśayiṣyāmi.
SA01yabhkvyu:2724_5: parijñeyā dharmāḥ katame. paṃcopādānaskandhāḥ. parijñā katamā. yad atra cchandarāgaprahāṇaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2728_2: iyam eva cāsyāḥ saṃjñā. rūpāsravaprahāṇam iti. rūpadhātvāsravaprahāṇam ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2728_4: yady apy anyeṣāṃ kleśopakleśānāṃ mānādīnāṃ rūpāvacarāṇāṃ prahāṇam iyaṃ parijñā vyavasthāpyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2728_5: rāgasya tu tatra prādhānyād ūrdhvabhāgīyasya saṃyojanasya prahāṇaṃ rūparāgakṣayaparijñety uktaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2728_6: sarvasaṃyojanaparyādāna [kun tu sbyor ba thams cad yoṅs su grugs paḥi] yoṅs su śes paḥo.
SA01yabhkvyu:2728_7: ṣes bya ba ḥdi ni zag pa thams cad spaṅs paḥi miṅ yin no.
SA01yabhkvyu:2728_8: yoṅs su śes pa ni tha dad par bstan la.
SA01yabhkvyu:2728_9: ṣes bya ba ni bsgroms pas spaṅ bar bya ba gzugs na spyod pa rnams spaṅs pa ni gzugs kyi ḥdod chags zad paḥi yoṅs su śes pa yin no.
SA01yabhkvyu:2728_10: gzugs med par nams kyi ni kun tu sbyor ba thams cad yoṅs su grugs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa yin no.
SA01yabhkvyu:2728_11: ṣes ḥbyuṅ baḥi phyir ro. mthoṅ baḥi spaṅ bar bya bar nams kyi ni ma yin te.
SA01yabhkvyu:2728_12: ṣes bya ba ni ciḥi phyir gzugs daṅ gzugs med pa na spyod paḥi mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya bar nams kyi yoṇs su śes pa so sor mi bstan te.
SA01yabhkvyu:2728_13: de bṣin du gzugs daṅ gzugs med pa na spyod pa mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya bar nams spaṅs pa yaṅ yoṅs su śes pa gsum yin te.
SA01yabhkvyu:2728_14: ṣe ḥbyuṅ baḥi phyir ro. bsgom pa spaṅ bar bya bar nams kyi gñen po mi ḥdra baḥi phyir ro ṣes bya ba ni ḥdi ltar sa daṅ sa na gzugs na spyod [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:2728_15: 165b] paḥi bsgom pas spaṅ bar bya ba rnam pa dguḥi gñen po bar chad med pa daṅ rnam par grol baḥi lam zag pa med pa mi lcogs pa med pa la sogs paḥi sa daṅ zag pa daṅ bcas pa bsam gtan gñis paḥi ñer ba stogs kyis bsdus pa nas nam mkhaḥ mthaḥ yas skye mched kyi ñer bsdogs kyis bsdus paḥi bar rnam pa dgu yod la gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams kyi gñen po bar chad med paḥi lam daṅ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2728_16: rnam par grol baḥi lam in ci rigs par zug pa med paḥi sa ḥog ma pa ḥam.
SA01yabhkvyu:2728_17: ci rigs par zag pa daṅ bcas pa goṅ maḥi ñer bsdogs kyis bsdus pa dag yod de.
SA01yabhkvyu:2728_18: gṣan kho na yin pas gñen po mi ḥdra baḥi phyir ḥdi dag gis yoṅs su 'śes pa tha dad par stan to.
SA01yabhkvyu:2728_19: mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba rnams kyi gñen po ni ḥdra ste.
SA01yabhkvyu:2728_20: rjes su śes paḥi bzod pa la sogs pa gzugs na spyod par nams kyi gñen po de dag ñid gzugs med par nams kyi yaṅ yin pas yoṅs su śes pa tha tad du rnam par mi bṣag go.
SA01yabhkvyu:2729_1: (V.64-66) tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs pa la sogs pa yoṅs su śes pa ste ṣes bya ba ni tha maḥi cha daṅ ṃthun pa spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa daṅ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2729_2: gzugs kyi ḥdod chags zad paḥi yoṅs su śes pa daṅ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2729_3: kuntu sbyor ba thams cad yoṅs su gtugs paḥi yoṅs su śes paḥo.
SA01yabhkvyu:2729_4: ḥdi dag ni bsgom paḥi lam gyi ḥbras bu yin paḥi phyir śes paḥi ḥbras bu yin te.
SA01yabhkvyu:2729_5: bsgom paḥi lam la bzod pa dag ni med do.
SA01yabhkvyu:2730_0: ji ltar yoṅs su śes pa bzod paḥi ḥbras bu yin ṣes bya ba ni yoṅs su śes pa daṅ śes pa ṣes bya ba don gcig ste.
SA01yabhkvyu:2730_1: śes pa daṅ yoṅs su śes pa ni zag pa med paḥi ye śes yin no ṣes ḥbyuṅ baḥi phyir ro.
SA01yabhkvyu:2731_0: dri med bzod rnams śes pa med.
SA01yabhkvyu:2732_0: ṣas ḥbyuṅ bas bzod pa ni śes paḥi ṅo bo [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:2732_1: 166a] ñid yin par yaṅ mi ruṅ na.
SA01yabhkvyu:2732_2: de ji ltar yoṅs su śes pa bzod paḥi ḥbras bu yin te.
SA01yabhkvyu:2732_3: ḥbras bu la rgyu btags byas na yaṅ mi ruṅ ṅo sñam du bsam pa yin no.
SA01yabhkvyu:2732_4: ḥdir bzod pa rnams ni śes paḥi ḥkhor can yin paḥi phyir ṣes bya ba smos te.
SA01yabhkvyu:2732_5: ḥdi dag la ḥkhor śes pa yod pas na śes paḥi ḥkhor can te.
SA01yabhkvyu:2732_6: bzod par nams so. deḥi phyir śes paḥi ḥbras bu yaṅ bzod par nams kyi ḥbras bu ṣes byaḥo.
SA01yabhkvyu:2732_7: rgyal baḥi ḥkhor la rgyal po ñe bar btags pa bṣin te dper na rgyal poḥi ḥkhor la rgyal po ñe bar btags paḥi phyir ḥkhor gyis byas pa la yaṅ rgyal pos byas pa ṣes byaa daṅ ḥdra ḥo.
SA01yabhkvyu:2732_8: śes pa daṅ ḥbras bu gcig phyir ro ṣes bya ba ni bzod pa dag ni śes pa daṅ lhan cig ḥbras bu gcig pa yin te.
SA01yabhkvyu:2732_9: bzod pa dag gi ḥbras bu gaṅ yin pa de ñid śes rnams kyi yin pas bzod paḥi ḥbras bu yaṅ yoṅs su śes par ruṅ ṅo.
SA01yabhkvyu:2733_0: mi lcogs med ḥbras thams cad do
SA01yabhkvyu:2734_0: ṣes bya ba ni ḥdi ltar mi lcogs paḥi sa paḥi lam gyis khams gsum paḥi mthoṅ ba daṅ bsgom pas spaṅ bar bya baḥi zag pa rnams spaṅ ba srid de.
SA01yabhkvyu:2735_0: zag med mi lcogs med pa yis. thams cad las ni ḥdod chags bral.
SA01yabhkvyu:2736_0: ṣes ḥbyuṅ baḥi phyir ro. gzugs daṅ gzugs med pa na ñon moṅs pa spaṅs paḥi raṅ bṣin gaṅ dag yin paḥo.
SA01yabhkvyu:2736_1: ṣes bya ba ni bye brag tu smra ba rnams na re gzugs daṅ gzugs med pa na spyod paḥi mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba rnams spaṅs pa ji skad bśad paḥi yoṅs su śes pa gsum daṅ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2736_2: bsgom pas spaṅ bar bya ba gzugs na spyod pa rnams spaṅs pa gzugs kyi ḥdod chags zad paḥi yoṅs su śes pa daṅ gzugs med pa na spyod pa rnams spaṅs pa kun tu sbyor ba thams cad yoṅs su gtugs paḥi [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:2736_3: 166b] yoṅs su śes pa ṣes bya ba lṅa ste.
SA01yabhkvyu:2736_4: bsam gtan gyi dṅos gṣi la brten nas gzugs daṅ gzugs med pa na spyod paḥi ñon moṅs pa spoṅ ba srid paḥi phyir ro.
SA01yabhkvyu:2736_5: ḥdod pa na spyod paḥi ñon moṅs pa spaṅs pa ni bsam gtan gi dṅos gṣiḥi ḥbras bu ma yin te.
SA01yabhkvyu:2736_6: bsam gtan gyi dṅos gṣi rnams ni ḥdod paḥi [Abhidh-k-vy_506] khams kyi gñen po ma yin paḥi phyir ro.
SA01yabhkvyu:2736_7: de lta bas na ḥdod chags daṅ bral ba rnams la bral baḥi thob pa zag pa med pa yod du zin kyaṅ tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa bṣin du ḥdod pa na spyod pa mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba spaṅs pa ni bsam gtan gyi dṅos gṣiḥi ḥbras bu ma yin no ṣes zer ro.
SA01yabhkvyu:2736_8: btsun pa dbyaṅs sgrogs kyi lugs kyis ni brgyad de.
SA01yabhkvyu:2736_9: ṣes bya ba ni btsun pa dbyaṅs sgrogs de ni ḥdod paḥi ḥdod chags daṅ bral baḥi gaṅ zag gi yaṅ ḥdod pa na spyod pa mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba rnams spaṅ spa yoṅs su śes pa gsum gyi ṅo bo ñid ḥphag paḥi lam gyi ḥbras bu yin par ḥdod do.
SA01yabhkvyu:2736_10: ciḥi phyir ṣe na. bral baḥi thob pa zag pa med pa rñed paḥi phyir te.
SA01yabhkvyu:2736_11: bsam gtan gyi dṅos gṣi la rten nas ṅes pa ḥjug pa na yaṅ ma thoṅ bas spaṅ bas spaṅ bar bya baḥi zag pa sṅon ḥjig rten paḥi lam gyis spaṅs pa rnams kyis bral baḥi thob pa zag pa med pa yaṅ ḥthob la de la na mthoṅ baḥi lam gyis nus pa yod pas gzugs daṅ gzugs med pa ba spyod paḥi mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba spaṅs pa bṣin du.
SA01yabhkvyu:2736_12: ḥdod pa na spyod paḥi mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba sṅon spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa yaṅ dṅos gṣi bsam gtan gyi ḥbras buḥo ṣes bya bar rnam pa bṣag go.
SA01yabhkvyu:2736_13: de lta ba sna ḥdod pa na spyod paḥi mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa gsum po ḥdi dga daṅ sṅar bśad pa gzugs daṅ gzugs med paḥi yoṅs su śes pa daṅ bcas pa yoṅs su śes pa brgyad bsam gtan gyi ḥbras bu yin [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:2736_14: 167a] no. śes bya ba ni btsun pa dbyaṅs sgrogs kyi gṣuṅ lugs yin no.
SA01yabhkvyu:2736_15: tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa ni mi lcogs pa med paḥi ḥbras bu kho na yin no.
SA01yabhkvyu:2736_16: ṣes bya ba ni ḥdod pa las ḥdod chags ma bral ba ni mi lcogs pa med pa kho nas tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spoṅ bar byed kyi dṅos gṣis ni ma yin te.
SA01yabhkvyu:2736_17: de na ma thob paḥi phyir ro. ḥdod chags daṅ bral ba ston du ḥgro ba yaṅ gaṅ gi tshe bsam gtan la brten nas ñes pa la des kyaṅ so soḥi skye boḥi snas skabs na ḥjig rten paḥi lam gyis ḥdod pa na spyad paḥi ñon moṅs pa thams cad spaṅs pas de bsam gtan gyi dṅos gṣiḥi ḥbras bu ma yin no.
SA01yabhkvyu:2736_18: sems kyi skad cig ma bcu drug la deḥi tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs pa yoṅs su śes pa bsam gtan gyi dṅos gṣi la brten par yaṅ rnam par bṣag mod kyi deḥi ḥbras bu ṣes bya bar rnam par bṣag pa ni ma yin no.
SA01yabhkvyu:2736_19: ḥo na ci ṣe na. gnas skabs de na tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs pa ḥjig rten paḥi lam gyis thob paḥi bral baḥi thob pa zag pa med pa yaṅ ḥthob pas de spaṅ spaḥi yoṅs su śes par rnam par bṣag ste.
SA01yabhkvyu:2736_20: deḥi tshe ni mthoṅ bas spaṅ bar bya ba sṅa ma spaṅs pas sṅar mthoṅ baḥi lam gyis spaṅ bar bya ba spaṅs pa gaṅ yin pa daṅ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2736_21: sṅar spaṅs pa tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs pa bsdoms nas tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa gcig tu rnam par bṣag ste.
SA01yabhkvyu:2737_1: khams las ḥdod chags bral ba daṅ ḥbras bu thob phyir de dag bsdoms ṣes thams cad bsdoms paḥi gtan tshigs yod paḥi phyir ro.
SA01yabhkvyu:2737_2: de lta bas na tha maḥi cha daṅ mthun pa spaṅs paḥi yoṅs su śes pa de ni mi lcogs pa med paḥi ḥbras bu kho nar rnam pa bṣag gi.
SA01yabhkvyu:2737_3: dṅos gṣiḥi ḥbras bu ni ma [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:2737_4: 167b] yin te. ḥdi la ni bye brag tu smra ba daṅ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2737_5: btsun pa dbyaṅs sgrogs kyi gṣuṅ lugs mthun no.
SA01yabhkvyu:2738_0: bsam gtan khyad par can yaṅ bsams bṣin du blta bar byaḥo ṣes bya ba ni bsam gtan khyad par can gyi zag pa med pas kyaṅ ñon moṅs pa spoṅ bar ḥgyur te.
SA01yabhkvyu:2738_1: de lta bas na mi lcogs pa med pa daṅ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2738_2: dṅos gṣiḥi bsam gtan rnams kho naḥi ḥbras bu kho na bśad kyi.
SA01yabhkvyu:2738_3: bsam gtan khyad par can gyi ni ma yin no.
SA01yabhkvyu:2738_4: deḥi phyir bsam gtan khyad par can yaṅ bsam gtan bṣin du blta bar byaḥo ṣes bya ba smos te.
SA01yabhkvyu:2738_5: bsam gtan khyad par can ni bsam gtan daṅ po kho na rtog pa daṅ bral bas khyad par du ḥphags paḥi phyir ro.
SA01yabhkvyu:2738_6: [nam mkhaḥ mthaḥ yas skye mched kyi ñer bsdogs kyi ṣes ba ba ni.
SA01yabhkvyu:2746_0: dharmajñānaṃ nirodhe yan mārge vā bhāvanāpathe
SA01yabhkvyu:2749_1: ṣaṭ paṃca ca yathāyogaṃ pakṣagrahaṇena kṣāṃtijñānayor grahaṇaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2749_4: dharmajñānakṣāṃtīnāṃ kāmāvacaradarśanaheyaprahāṇasvabhāvā yathoktas tisraḥ parijñāḥ phalaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2749_10: tāś ca rūpārūpyāvacaradarśanaheyaprahāṇasvabhāvā yathoktās tisraḥ parijñāḥ dve ca paścime iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2750_1: duḥkhadarśanaheyaprahāṇasamudayadarśanaheyaprahāṇaṃ vistareṇa yāvad bhāvāgrikasya mṛdumṛdoḥ prakārasya prahāṇam iti kasmān na gṛhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2758_0: ebhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ prakṛṣṭaṃ tatprahāṇam ity atra parijñeti vyavasthāpyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2758_2: samudayadharmajñānam ārabhya yāvat kṣayajñānam ity eteṣu dharmajñānānvayajñāneṣu.
SA01yabhkvyu:2760_0: iti. caśabdo luptanirdiṣṭaḥ. dhātvatikramāc ceti. ata eva vivriyate caturthāc ceti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2760_1: yadā dhātuṃ samatikrāmatīti. kāmadhātuṃ rūpadhātum ārūpyadhātuṃ vā samatikrāmati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2760_3: kasmāt. kṛtsnadhātuvairāgyāt. kṛtsnasya dhātor vairāgyāt. na vikalīkaraṇamātratvāt. tadā hi suṣṭhu prahāṇam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2761_3: [Tib. 169a] anena ca kāraṇena prahāṇaṃ parijñety ucyata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2761_4: yaḥ prakāraḥ prahīṇa iti duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyo yāvaṃ mārgadarśanaprahātavyo bhāvanāprahātavyaś ca.
SA01yabhkvyu:2761_5: yadi tatra prahīṇe [Abhidh-k-vy_509] prakāre anyena tadālaṃbanena kleśena darśanaprahātavyena bhāvanāprahātavyena visaṃyukto bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2761_6: evam idam api paṃcamaṃ kāraṇaṃ prahāṇasya parijñāvidhāne āhur apare.
SA01yabhkvyu:2761_7: sa tu nānyad iti vistaraḥ. sa tūbhayasaṃyoga ubhayahetusamudghātāt duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyasya samudayadarśanaprahātavyasya ca sarvatragahetoḥ samudghātād dhātusamatikramāc ca nānyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2761_8: tathā hi duḥkhadarśanaprahātavyeṣu prahīṇeṣv api na tāvad asti hetudvayasamudghāto yāvat tadālaṃbanaḥ samudayadarśanaprahātavyaḥ sarvatragahetur aprahīṇo bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2761_9: bhāvanāprahātavyeṣu ca prahīṇeṣv api yāvad aṣṭāsu prakāreṣu na tāvad dhātvatikramo 'sti yāvan na navamasyāpi prakārasya prahāṇam ity ato na punar brūmaḥ.

SA01yabhkvyu:2814_16: tad duḥkham iti. sā kiṃprayojanā duḥkhahetutvenaiva tatprayojanasiddheḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2814_17: duḥkhahetuvādy āha. yadi tarhīti. yadi yad anityaṃ. tad duḥkham ity anityatvād duḥkhataḥ paśyaṃti na duḥkhahetutvād anityaduḥkhākārayoḥ kaḥ prativiśeṣaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2815_1: yathā pratikūlatvād duḥkhaṃ. tathā tat pratipādayann āha. anityaṃ tu dṛśyamānaṃ pratikūlaṃ bhavatīty anityākāro duḥkhākāram ākarṣatīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2815_2: tad uktaṃ bhavati. yad idam uktaṃ yad anityaṃ. tad duḥkham iti. nākāraikatvād evam uktaṃ. apy tv anityaṃ tat sukhaṃ paśyatāṃ pratikūlaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2816_1: idam atra duḥkhasyeti. idam atra duḥkhasya lakṣaṇam ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2816_3: aparaṃ sūtrapadaṃ. śītoṣṇādaya [Tib. 178a] iti. ādiśabdenāmlamadhurādayo gṛhyaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:2816_4: atyupayuktā atiparibhuktāḥ. akālopayuktāś ceti. tadyathā śītā hemaṃte uṣṇā gṛīṣme.
SA01yabhkvyu:2816_5: samena veti. sukhahetunā. evam īryāpathavikalpe 'pi vaktavyam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2816_6: ya eva hi śayanādaya iṣyaṃte sukhahetavaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2816_7: ta eveti sarvaṃ yāvad vyaktim āpadayaṃta iti vaktavyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2816_10: duḥkhavikalpe ca. kiṃ. sukhabuddheḥ. tathaiva nāsti sukhā vedaneti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2816_12: na hi tāvat sukham iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2816_15: aṃsād aṃsaṃ bhāraṃ saṃcārayaṃto bhāravāhakā duḥkha evāvasthite bhārātikrāmaṇe sukham iti buddhim utpādayaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2817_0: eṣa eva ca nyāya ity ācāryaḥ. anabhiprītaṃ bhavaty āryāṇām iti kāmasukhaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2817_3: tadarthaṃ darśayann āha. yā hi vedaneti vistaraḥ. pramādapadam iti. kuśalapracyutikāraṇam ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2817_9: anugrāhakasvalakṣaṇākāreṇa āryāṇām api hi sukhavedanānugrāhakebhya visaṃvādaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2817_10: yadi cāsau sukhā vedanā svenātmanānugrāhakātmanānabhipretā bhavet naiva tasyāṃ sukhāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ kasyacid rāgo bhavet.
SA01yabhkvyu:2817_12: yato vairāgyārtham iti. yataḥ kāraṇāt vairāgyārtham ākārāṃtareṇāpi doṣavatīṃ paśyeyuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2817_14: uktaṃ cedaṃ bhagavateti sthavirānandavacanam evaitat sūtrapadaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2817_15: evaṃ hi so 'prakṣyad iti. yatkiṃcid veditam. idam atra duḥkhasyeti etad ayuktarūpaṃ vacanam iti paśyaṃ sthavirānandas tad eva pṛṣṭavān.
SA01yabhkvyu:2817_16: yatkiṃcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasyeti viruddham eveti kṛtvā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2817_17: yadi tu tisro vedanā ity etad ayuktarūpam adrakṣyat.
SA01yabhkvyu:2817_18: tad evāprakṣyat kiṃ nu saṃdhāya bhagavatā bhāṣitaṃ tisro vedanā ity etad viruddham eveti kṛtvā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2817_19: bhagavān [Tib. 179a] api caivaṃ vyākariṣyad idaṃ mayā saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ tisro vedanā iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2817_20: na tv evaṃ vyākariṣyat. saṃskārānityatām ānanda saṃdhāya mayā bhāṣitaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2817_21: saṃskāravipariṇāmatāṃ. yatkiṃcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasyeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2817_22: na tv evam āha. punaś ca tisṛṇāṃ vedanānāṃ vacanāt tasmāt saṃty eva svbhāvatas tisro vedanāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2817_23: idaṃ tu saṃdhāya mayā bhāṣitaṃ yatkiṃcid veditam idam atra duḥkhasyeti vedanād ābhiprāyikam etad vākyaṃ darśayati bhagavān.
SA01yabhkvyu:2817_28: kāmaguṇā iti. iṣṭānāṃ rūpaśabdagandharasaspraṣṭavyānām iyaṃ saṃjñā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2817_30: evam upapattiṃ alpasukhāṃ bahuduḥkhām ekāṃtasukhāṃ paśyato viparyāsaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_0: lokānuvṛttyeti. cet. atha mataṃ lokasya vedanāṃ vyavasyato 'nuvṛttyā tisro vedanā iti vacanaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_1: tan na bhavati. sarvaveditaduḥkhatvasya saṃdhāya bhāṣitam iti bhagavato vacanāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_2: saṃskārānityatām ānanda mayā saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ saṃskāravipariṇāmatāṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_4: 179b] ato na lokānuvṛttyā tisro vedanā iti vacanaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_6: yathābhūtavacanāc ca. na lokānuvṛttyā tisro vedanā iti vacanaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_7: katham ity āha. yac ca sukhendriyaṃ yac ca saumanasyendriyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_8: sukhaiṣā vedanā draṣṭavyeti. vistareṇoktveti. yac ca duḥkhendriyaṃ yac ca daurmanasyendriyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_9: duḥkhaiṣā vedanā. yad upakṣendriyam. aduḥkhāsukhaiṣā vedanā ity evaṃādinā vistareṇoktvā yenemāni paṃcendriyāṇy evaṃ yathābhūtaṃ samyakprajñayā dṛṣṭānīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_12: loko 'pi ca kathaṃ duḥkhāṃ vedanāṃ trividhāṃ sukhāṃ duḥkhām aduḥkhāsukhāṃ vyavasyed duḥkhasvābhāvyena duḥkhavyavasāyasyaiva prāpteḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_14: atha mataṃ mṛduni duḥkhe sukhabuddhir adhimātre duḥkhabuddhiḥ madhya aduḥkhāsukhabuddhir iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_15: atra brūmaḥ. sukhasyāpi trividhatvād iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_17: adhimātrādisukhabuddhiḥ syād adhimātramadhyamṛduḥ sukhabuddhiḥ syād ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_21: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. adhimātram eva tad duḥkhaṃ na syād yadi tatra mṛdusukhabuddhiḥ syāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_22: mṛduni ca duḥkhe yady adhimātrasukhabuddhiḥ kathaṃ tasya duḥkhasya mṛdutvaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_23: na hi tathā vyaktasyānubhavasya mṛdutvaṃ yujyata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_27: na mṛduprakāram. ato vaktavyaṃ. tadā katamad duḥkhaṃ mṛdubhūtaṃ yatrāsya sukhabuddhir bhavatīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_28: viṣayabalād eva hi tat sukham utpadyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_30: kiṃ ca yadi mṛduni duḥkhe sukhabuddhir iti manyase.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_31: anutpannavinaṣṭe ca tasmin mṛduni duḥkha iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_32: [Tib. 180b] anutpanne vinaṣṭe ca tasmin mṛduni duḥkhe.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_41: anutpanne vinaṣṭe ca tasmin rāgaduḥkhe sutarāṃ kāmasukhaṃ syāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_42: na caivaṃ dṛṣṭam iti. kathaṃ ca nāmeti vistaraḥ. kathaṃ ca nāmaitad yokṣyate. yan mṛduni [Abhidh-k-vy_521] vedite yan mṛduni duḥkha ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_44: sukhaṃ gṛhyate. madhye punar avyakta iti. madhyaduḥkhe aduḥkhāsukhā vedanā gṛhyate ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_45: mṛduni duḥkhe tenāvyaktena bhavitavyam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_46: triṣu ceti vistaraḥ. triṣu ca dhyāneṣu prathamadvitīyatṛtīyeṣu sukhavacanāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_48: mṛduduḥkhaṃ syāt. kiṃ kāraṇaṃ. mṛduni duḥkhe sukhabuddhir iti tavābhiprāyāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_50: 181a] sūtre. madhyaṃ duḥkhaṃ syāt. kasmāt. madhye duḥkhe aduḥkhāsukham iti tavaivābhiprāyāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_51: ity ato na yujyate mṛdvādiṣu duḥkheṣu sukhādivedanāvyavasthānaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_54: rūpaṃ cen mahānāmann iti. rūpaṃ cen mahānāmann ekāṃtaduḥkham abhaviṣyat na sukhaṃ na sukhānugataṃ na saumanasyaṃ na saumanasyānugataṃ na sukhaveditaṃ hetur api na prajñāyate rūpe saṃrāgāya.
SA01yabhkvyu:2818_55: yasmāt tarhi asti rūpaṃ sukhaṃ sukhānugataṃ pūrvavad ato rūpe hetuḥ prajñāyate yad uta saṃrāgāyeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2819_1: yadi sukhahetvavyavasthānān na sukham asti vaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2819_4: katham ity āha. āśrayaviśeṣāpekṣo hīti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2819_5: yadi hi kevala eva viṣayo hetuḥ syāt syād evāvyavasthito hetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2819_6: na tu kevalo viṣayo hetuḥ. yasmād āśrayaviśeṣo 'pi hetur iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2819_7: sa evāgnir iti. tadyathā sa evāgniḥ pākyabhūtaviśeṣa [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:2819_9: abhimataudanapākahetutvāt. sa evāsvādupākahetuḥ. taddāhahetutvād ity arthaḥ. na tu yā pākyabhūtāvasthāṃ prāpya svādupākahetur āsīt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2819_10: tāṃ punaḥ prāpya paścān na hetuḥ svādupākasya tādṛśasyety arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2819_12: dhyāneṣu ca kathaṃ na vyavasthitaḥ sukhahetur iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2819_13: na hi tad eva dhyānaṃ prathamaṃ yāvat tṛtīyaṃ cirakālam api samāpannānāṃ duḥkhahetur bhavatīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2819_14: dhyānaje ca sukhe kasya pratītkāra iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2819_16: ādiśabdenedam api vaktavyaṃ. yadi duḥkhapratīkāreṣu sukhabuddhiḥ syāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2819_17: rūpaṃ cen mahānāmann ekāṃtaduḥkham abhaviṣyat na sukhaṃ na sukhānugatam ity evamādi noktaṃ syād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2819_18: sukham evotpadyata iti. sukhaiva sā vedanotpadyate. na sā duḥkhā vedanā sukhatvena kalpiteti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2819_20: sukhotpattyanukūlā. anyathā hi yady avasthāṃtarajaṃ sukham eva notpadyate yāvad asau [Abhidh-k-vy_522] tādṛśī kāyāvasthā nāṃtarīyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2819_22: aṃte kuta iti vistaraḥ. atha mataṃ pānabhojanādyaṃte kuto duḥkhabuddhiḥ syāt yadi tasyāditatprāraṃbho nāsīd iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2819_23: atra brūmaḥ. kāyapariṇāmaviśeṣāt. [Tib. 182a] kāyasya tādṛśaḥ pariṇāmaviśeṣāḥ paścād utpadyate pānādyāsevanāt yat sukhotpattyavasthāyāṃ duḥkhaṃ notpadyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2819_24: aṃte tūtpadyata iti. kim evety āha. madyādīnām aṃte mādhuryaśuktatāvad iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2819_26: yat pūrvaṃ madhuratāvasthāyāṃ mādhuryasyāvidyamānā śuktatā amlatā aṃte utpadyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2819_27: atha vā yathā madyādīnāṃ parīṇāmavīśeṣān mādhuryam eṣām ādau bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2819_28: āmlaṃ vā. tac cikitsauṣadhakṛtāt pariṇāmaviśeṣān mādhuryaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2820_0: yat tu samudayasatyaṃ. tad evocyata iti. hetubhūtāḥ śamudayasatyam iti vacamāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2822_0: iti vacanāt. śūtre hi tṛṣṇaivokteti. samudayasatyaṃ katamat. yāsau tṛṣṇā nandīrāgasahagatā tatratarābhinandinīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2822_1: vaibhāṣika āha. prādhānyād iti. anyatrānyasyāpi vacanāt. [Tib. 182b] anyatra sūtre anyasyāpi karmāvidyāder vacanād anye 'pi samudaya iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_0: āyatyāṃ paraloka ity arthaḥ. punaś coktam anyatra śūtre. yataś ca bhikṣavaḥ paṃca bījajātāny akhaṇḍāni acchidrāṇī apūtīni avātātapahatāni navāni sārāṇi sukhaśayitāni.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_2: evaṃ tāni bījāni vṛddhiṃ virūḍhin vipulatām āpadyaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_3: iti hi bhikṣava upameyaṃ kṛtā yāvad evāsyārthasya vijñaptaya itīmaṃ dṛṣṭāṃtam upanyasyedam uktaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_4: paṃca bījajātānīti bhikṣavaḥ sopādānasya vijñānasyaitad adhivacanaṃ pṛthivīdhātur iti catasṛṇāṃ vijñānasthitīnām etad adhivacanam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_5: bījaṃ punar hetuḥ. yaś ca hetuḥ. sa samudayaḥ vijñānasthitayo 'pi pratiṣṭhāhetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_6: tasmād iti. yataḥ karmādīnām api hetutvavacanāt samudayasatyatvaṃ siddhaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_7: tasmād ābhiprāyikaḥ. abhiprāye bhavaḥ abhiprāyeṇa vā dīvyatīty ābhiprāyikaḥ sūtre nirdeśaḥ tṛṣṇādhikṛtaṃ pudgalam adhikṛtya kṛta ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_8: lākṣaṇikas tv abhidharme lakṣaṇe bhavo lākṣaṇiko nirdeśo 'bhidharme.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_9: sarvaṃ sāsravaṃ vastu samudaya iti sāsravasya skaṃdhapaṃcakasya samudayasatyatvalakṣaṇayogāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_10: sa eva vaibhāṣikas tṛṣṇādīnām ābhiprāyikaṃ samudayasatyatvaṃ vivakṣur [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_11: 183a] [Abhidh-k-vy_523] āha. api tv iti vistareṇa. abhinirvṛttihetuṃ bruvatā samudayasatyaṃ tṛṣṇaivoktā sūtre.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_12: upapattyabhinirvṛttihetuṃ sahetukaṃ bruvatā yāvat karma ca tṛṣṇā cāvidyā coktā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_14: tayoḥ punas taddhetvoḥ karmatṛṣṇayor avidyā hetur ity āha.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_15: katham etad gamyate. gāthāyām upapattihetuḥ karmābhinirvṛttihetus tṛṣṇeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_16: karma hetur upapattaye tṛṣṇā hetur abhinirvṛttaya iti sūtrāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_17: sūtrāṃtare vacanād iti. sahetusapratyaya iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_18: atra sūtre krameṇa vā. kāraṇaparaṃparākrameṇa vā. gāthāyām eṣa nirdeśaḥ. karmatṛṣṇāvidyā saṃkārāṇāṃ cakṣurādīnāṃ hetur abhisaṃparāya iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_19: tad etad uktaṃ bhavati. karma hetur upapattaya iti. ato vā sūtrāt. sahetusapratyayakramasūtrād vā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_20: ayaṃ īdṛśaḥ gāthārtha iti. kathaṃ cakṣur bhikṣavaḥ sahetu sapratyayaṃ sanidānaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_21: kaś ca bhikṣavaś cakṣuṣo hetuḥ kaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_22: pratyayaḥ. kiṃ nidanaṃ. cakṣuṣo bhikṣavaḥ karma hetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_26: kaḥ pratyayaḥ. kiṃ nidānaṃ. [Tib. 183b] karmaṇo bhikṣavas tṛṣṇā hetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_27: tṛṣṇā pratyayaḥ. tṛṣṇā nidānaṃ. tṛṣṇā bhikṣavaḥ sahetukā sapratyayā sanidānā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_29: kaḥ pratyayaḥ. kiṃ nidānaṃ. tṛṣṇāyā bhikṣavo 'vidyā hetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_30: avidyā pratyayḥ. avidyā nidānaṃ. avidyāpi bhikṣavaḥ sahetukā sapratyayā sanidānā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_32: kaḥ pratyayaḥ kiṃ nidanaṃ. avidyāyā bhikṣavaḥ ayoniśomanaskāro hetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_34: bījakṣetrabhāvaṃ pratipādayatā vijñānādayo 'py uktā vijñānaṃ bījaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_36: te 'py uktaḥ samudayasatyaṃ. na kevalaṃ tṛṣṇādaya ity ābhiprāyikaḥ sūtre nirdeśa iti sādhitaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_37: sarvasya ca duḥkhasya lākṣaṇikaḥ samudayabhāva iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_39: abhedeneti. dhātugatyyonyādīnāṃ. tayor yathākramam iti. upapatteḥ karma hetur abhinirvṛttes tṛṣṇeti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_40: tadyathā bījam iti vistaraḥ. śālibījaṃ śālyaṃkuropapādanasya hetuḥ yavabījaṃ yavāṃkuropapādanasyetyādi.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_41: āpaḥ punar abhedena. yathā śālyaṃkuraprarohasya hetuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_42: evaṃ yavāṃkurasyāpītyādi. atas tāḥ sarvāṃkuraprarohamātrasya hetur iti vinā tṛṣṇayā janmābhāvād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_43: atra sādhanaṃ. hetur janmanas [Tib. 184a] tṛṣṇā. tadbhāvābhāvabhāvyabhāvitvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_44: takyathā bījam aṃkurasya. saṃtatināmanāc cety asyārthaṃ vivṛṇvann āha.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_45: yatra ca satṛṣṇeti vistaraḥ. yatra viṣaye rūpādau satṛṣṇā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_46: kā. cittasaṃtatiḥ. tatrābhīkṣṇaṃ cittasaṃtatiṃ namaṃtīṃ paśyāmaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_50: yatra ca namati. tatra ca pravartata iti vyavasyāmaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_51: sādhanaṃ cātra pravartate. punarbhave cittasaṃtatiḥ. satṛṣṇānamanāt. rūpādiviṣayavat. śuṣkamasūropasnānalepāṃgavad iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_52: masūra upasnānaṃ. tasya lepaḥ śuṣkaḥ. masūropasnānalepo 'syeti śuṣkamasūropasnānalepam aṃgaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2824_55: bhavati. eṣā yuktir iti. tṛṣṇābhinirvṛttihetur iti.
