SA01yabhkvyu:2908_1: dvitīye nirvedhabhāgīyāni. tṛtīye āryamārga iti. yas tu pūrvasmin janmani saṃbhṛtamokṣabhāgīyo bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2908_2: sa ekasminn api janmani nirvedhabhāgīyāny āryamārgaṃ cotpādayatīty avagaṃtavyaṃ bījāvaropaṇetyādi bījāvaropaṇaṃ mokṣabhāgīyotpādanaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2908_4: phalotpattir āryamārgaḥ. asyāṃ dharmatāyām iti. pravacanadharmatāyām. avatāraparipākavimuktayo bhavaṃtīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2908_5: avatāro mokṣabhāgīyena. paripāko nirvedhabhāgīyaiḥ. vimuktir āryamārgeṇeti. tatpraṇidhānaparigrahaṇād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2908_11: trikarmasvabhāvam alpakam apy etat mokṣābhilāṣabalādhānān mokṣabhāgīyam ākṣipati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2908_15: kuruṣu tāvad ubhayaṃ nāsti. apāyeṣu nirvedo 'sti prajñā nāsti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2908_17: ato manuṣyeṣv eva triṣu dvīpeṣv ākṣipyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2911_0: ity ārabhya nirvedhabhāgīyānukramaḥ. tatprasaṃgena mokṣabhāgīyopanyāsa iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2913_1: ato niṣyandena viśeṣaṇaṃ. yasyā dharmajñānaṃ niṣyaṃdaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2913_5: kārikāyāṃ tu dharmakṣāṃtir iti vacanam ekadeśagrahaṇato devadatto datta iti yathā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2913_7: samyaktavaṃ katamat. yat tat paryādāya rāgaprahāṇam iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2913_8: tatra niyamo niyāma iti. tatra samyaktve niyama ekāṃtībhāvo niyāma iti ghañi rūpaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2913_9: api tu niyama iti yamaḥ samupaniviṣu cety appratyayasya vibhāṣitatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2913_12: tad eva viparyāsasyāpakramān niyāmāvakrāṃtir ity ucyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2913_14: pradīpajātivad iti. pradīpasyeva jāter iva cety arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2913_17: tathā pṛthagjanatvavyāvartane sāmarthyam anāgatāyā dharmajñānakṣāṃter abhyupagamyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2913_18: nānyad iti. kleśaprahāṇāṃ kāritraṃ. laukikair agradharmair iti apara iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2913_20: na. taddharmatvād iti. na yuktam etal laukikair agradharmais tadvyāvartana iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2913_21: kasmāt. te 'pi hi pṛthagjanadharmāḥ. kathaṃ pṛthagjanadharmasya pṛthagjanadharmaṃ vyāvartiṣyaṃta iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2913_22: tadvirodhitvād adoṣaḥ. agradharmāṇāṃ pṛthagjanantvavirodhitvāt adoṣa eṣaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2913_25: yathā śatruskandhārūḍha eva kaścic chatruṃ ghātayet.
SA01yabhkvyu:2913_26: evaṃ kilāgradharmāḥ pṛthagjanatvaśatruskandhārūḍhās tad eva pṛthagjanatvaṃ ghātayeyur iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2914_0: ubhayair iti. laukikair agradharmaiḥ [Tib. 202b] kṣāṃtyā ca pṛthagjanatvaṃ vyāvartyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2914_3: kṣāṃter vimuktimārgeṇa. yathā hy ānaṃtaryamārgeṇa kleśaḥ prahīyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2914_4: vimuktimārgeṇa prahīṇaḥ evaṃ laukikair agradharmaiḥ pṛthagjanatvaṃ vihīyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2915_0: anāsravādhikāraḥ sarvatreti. tena tato 'traiva dharmajñānam anāsravam iti gamyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2915_1: tad duḥkhe dharmajñānam ity ucyate iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2915_2: śāstre tena nāmnā vyavahāra it darśayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2915_6: tadanvayatvād iti. taddhetukatvād ity arthaḥ. tathaivānugamād iti. yathaiva dharmajñānenānugataṃ parijñātaṃ duḥkhādisatyaṃ duḥkhādibhir ākāraiḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2915_7: tathaiva rūpārūpyāvacaraduḥkhādyanugamād anvayajñānam etad iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2916_3: darśanābhisamaya ālaṃbanābhisamayaḥ kāryābhisamayaś caivaṃ ṣoḍaśacittaka ity abhedaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_0: darśanābhisamaya iti. darśanam evābhisamayaḥ. evam ālaṃbanābhisamayaḥ kāryābhisamayaś ca.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_2: tad dhi bhikṣavo dṛṣṭaṃ. yad anāsravayā prajñayā dṛṣṭam iti vacanāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_4: ālaṃbanaṃ grahaṇaṃ tatsaṃprayuktair api vedanādibhir bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_5: apiśabdāt prajñayāpi. yasmāc cittacaittaiḥ satyāny ālaṃbyaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_8: samudayasya prahāṇaṃ. nirodhasya sākṣātkaraṇaṃ. mārgasya bhāvanaṃ. tad viprayuktair api śīlajātyādibhir bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_11: 203b] kriyate. jātyādibhir ity ādiśabdāl lakṣaṇāṃtarāṇi prāptayaś ca gṛhyaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_12: duḥkhe hīti vistaraḥ. duḥkhe hi dṛśyamāne prajñayā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_14: katham ity āha. samudayādīnāṃ samudayanirodhamārgāṇām abhisamayaḥ prahāṇasākṣātkaraṇabhāvanād yathākramaṃ prahāṇaṃ samudayasya kleśaprāpticchedāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_17: ākārabhedād iti. pratyekam eṣāṃ duḥkhādīnām ākārabhedāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_18: na ca duḥkhākāreṇa samudayādīnāṃ darśanaṃ yujyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_19: tadākārārthabhedataḥ. athāpy anātmākāreṇa sarveṣāṃ satyānāṃ darśanam iti brūyāt nikāyāṃtarīyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_20: śūnyatānātmate sarvasatyānāṃ sāmānyaṃ lakṣaṇam iti kṛtvā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_21: na tarhi satyānāṃ duḥkhādito darśanaṃ syāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_23: tathā ca saty anātmākāreṇa sarveṣāṃ darśanam iti bruvan sūtravirodhaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_24: yasmāt sūtra evam uktam āryaśrāvakasyeti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_25: atha manyase nāsti sūtravirodho yasmād abhisamayāvasthāyāh pūrvaṃ prayogāvasthāyām [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_26: 204a] āryaśrāvakasya duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhato manasikurvata ity evamādi.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_28: tac cāyuktam. anāsraveṇa manasikāreṇa saṃprayukto dharmāṇāṃ vicaya iti vacanāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_30: bhāvanāmārga evam iti ced ya āryaśrāvakasya duḥkhaṃ vā duḥkhato manasikurvata iti vistareṇa.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_31: na. yathā darśanaṃ bhāvanāt. naitad evaṃ. yathaiva hi pūrvaṃ satyānāṃ darśanaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_34: śeṣeṣu vaśitvalābhād iti. aṃtareṇa prayogaṃ samudayādidarśanasaṃmukhībhāvaśaktilābho vaśitvalābhaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_35: tasmād iti. aṃtarā tu vyutthānām asti nāstīti vicāryaṃ syād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_36: śeṣeṣu vaśitvalābhād aṃtarā vyutthānaṃ prāpnotīti doṣaḥ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_37: ubhayathāpi ca vicāryamāṇe bahūnāṃ sūtrāṇāṃ virodhaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_38: yathā ca teṣāṃ virodhaḥ. tathāgameṣu śrotavyaḥ. ekasya darśane śeṣāṇāṃ kāryābhisamayavacanād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_39: yasmād asty etat vacanaṃ. duḥkhe hi dṛśyamāne tasya trividho 'bhisamayaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_41: 204b] ato 'smābhir apy evam abhyupagamān nāsti doṣaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_42: āha. yady apy abhyupagamyata ity abhisamayaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_44: ata ucyate. darśanābhiśamayaṃ tu pratīti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_46: saṃyuktāgame paṭhyaṃte. kathaṃ. anāthapiṇḍada āha. kiṃ nu bhadaṃta caturṇām āryasatyānām anupūrvābhisamayaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_47: āhosvid ekābhisamaya iti. caturṇāṃ gṛhapate āryasatyānām anupūrvābhisamayo na tv ekābhisamayaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_48: yo gṛhapate evaṃ vaded ahaṃ [Abhidh-k-vy_544] duḥkhaṃ āryasatyam anabhisametya samudayam āryasatyam abhisameṣyāmīti vistareṇa yāvad duḥkhanirodhagāminīṃ pratipadam āryasatyam abhisameṣyāmīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_50: tat kasya hetoḥ. asthānam anavakāśo yad duḥkham āryasatyam anabhisametya samudayam āryasatyam abhisameṣyati pūrvavat.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_51: yāvan nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. sthānam etad iti pūrvavat. tadyathā gṛhapate ya evaṃ vaded ahaṃ kūṭāgārasya vā kūṭāgāraśālāyā vā vā mūlapādam apratiṣṭhāpya bhittiṃ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmi.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_55: tat kasya hetoḥ. asthānam anavakāśo yat kūṭāgārasyeti pūrvavat.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_56: yāvat sthānam etad vidyate. yan mūlapādaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya bhittiṃ pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti pūrvavat.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_57: yāvad evam eva gṛhapate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_58: yad duḥkhasatyam adṛṣṭvā samudayasatyaṃ drakṣyatīti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_59: athānyataro bhikṣur āha. kiṃ nu bhadaṃta caturṇām āryasatyānām anupūrvābhisamayaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_60: āhosvid ekābhisamaya iti. bhagavān āha. caturṇāṃ bhikṣo satyānām iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_61: pūrvavad yāvat tadyathā bhikṣo ya evaṃ vaded ahaṃ catuṣkaḍevarasya sopānasya prathamasopānakaḍevaram anabhiruhya dvitīyam abhirokṣyāmīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_64: syād vacanīyaḥ. tat kasya hetoḥ. asthānam anavakāśo yac catuṣkaḍevarasya sopānasya prathamasopānakaḍevaram anabhiruhya dvitīyakaḍevaram abhirokṣyati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_65: evaṃ yāvat tṛtīyam anabhiruhya caturtham abhirokṣyati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_68: [Tib. 205b] tathāryānanda āha. kiṃ nu bhadaṃta caturṇām āryasatyānām anupūrvābhisamayaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_69: utāho ekābhisamaya iti. pūrvasūtravat. yāvat. tadyathānanda ya evaṃ vaded ahaṃ catuṣpadikāyā niḥśreṇyāḥ prathamaṃ niḥśreṇīpadam anabhiruhya prāsādam abhirokṣyāmīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_71: vistareṇa yāvad evam evānanda ya evaṃ vaded ahaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam anabhisametya samudayasatyam abhisameṣyāmīti vistareṇa yāvan nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_72: etāni trīṇi sūtrāṇi. yo duḥkha iti vistaraḥ. atha mataṃ syād yo duḥke niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitso buddhe 'pi sa iti sūtrād ekābhisamaya iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_73: katham. aśaikṣā hi dharmā buddhaḥ. ta evāśaikṣā dharmā mārgaḥ. tasmād duḥkhābhisamayān mārgo 'pi tenābhisamito yasmād duḥkhavad buddhe 'pi niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitsa iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_75: atha vāniścayābhilāṣaḥ kāṃkṣā vimatir vicikitsā [Abhidh-k-vy_545] yathoktalakṣaṇā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_79: duḥkhe 'bhisamite buddhaviṣaye vicikitsāyā asamudācāro 'vaśyaṃprahāṇaṃ ca bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2917_80: ato yo duḥkhe niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitso buddhe 'pi.
SA01yabhkvyu:2918_0: (VI.30ab) te punaḥ ṣaḍbhūmikā ity uktaṃ prāg iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2921_0: (VI.30cd) anaṃtaryaśakyatvād iti. kṛtyāś ca śaki liṅ ceti śakyārthe kṛtyapratyayaḥ aṃtarayituṃ śakyā aṃtaryāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2921_5: tasya mārgā ānaṃtaryamārgāḥ. vimuktimārgāḥ. vimuktimārgā iti. vimuktau mārgā vimuktimārgāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2921_12: vartamānīkaraṇataḥ. yadi punar iti vistaraḥ. [Tib. 206b] yadi punar dvitīyenānaṃtaryamārgeṇaiva duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāṃtyā saha visaṃyogaprāptir utpadyeta.
SA01yabhkvyu:2921_14: yad anena kartavyaṃ. tad duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāṃtyaiva kriyetety abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2921_15: prahīṇavicikitsaṃ jñānaṃ tatraivālaṃbane kāmāvacaraduḥkhe prahīṇavicikitsaṃ jñānaṃ notpannaṃ syāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2921_16: tatra hi duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāṃtiḥ savicikitsaiva vartate vicikitsāyā aprahīṇatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2921_17: na ca tatra duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāṃtiḥ prahīṇavicikitseti śakyate vyavasthāpayituṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2922_0: kṣāṃtibhir iti vistaraḥ. kṣāṃtibhiḥ kleśaprahāṇād yo 'yaṃ sāstrapāṭhaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2922_2: samudayadharmajñānaprahatavyo nirodhadharmajñānaprahātavyo mārgadharmajñānaprahātavyaḥ duḥkhānvayajñānaprahātavyaḥ samudayānvayajñānaprahātavyo nirodhānvayajñānaprahātavyo mārgānvayajñānaprahātavyo bhāvanāprahātavyaś ca saṃyojananikāya iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2922_3: sūtre 'py uktam. iti hi bhikṣavo jñānavadhyāḥ kleśāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2922_4: vidyudupamaṃ cittam iti. tasya virodhaḥ. na hi tatra [Abhidh-k-vy_546] kṣāṃtiprahātavyaḥ saṃyojananikāya ity uktaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2922_5: na kṣāṃtīnām iti [Tib. 207a] vistaraḥ. naitad evaṃ. kasmāt. kṣāṃtīnāṃ jñānaparivāratvāt. kṣāṃtayo jñānasya parivārā ity ataḥ kṣāṃtiprahātavyaḥ saṃyojananikāyo jñānaprahātavya ucyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2922_7: yathā rājaparivārakṛtasya kasyacid arthasya rājakṛta iti vyapadeśo bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2922_8: tadvad bhāvanāprahātavyas tu saṃyojananikāyo jñānaprahātavya eva.
SA01yabhkvyu:2923_0: (VI.31ab) adṛṣṭasatyadarśanād iti jñānena katham adṛṣṭasatyadarśanaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2923_1: tad apy adṛṣṭe satyāṃtare sati bhavatīti darśanamārgāṃtarālavartijñānaṃ darśanamārgaḥ pāraṃparyam abhisaṃdhāya.
SA01yabhkvyu:2923_4: paṃcadaśakṣaṇā darśanamārgo yāvad asya pudgalasyādṛṣṭadarśanaṃ pravartate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2923_6: tasya dṛṣṭe 'pi duḥkhe adṛṣṭadarśanam asya samudaye pravartata evety āha.
SA01yabhkvyu:2923_7: bhāvanāmārga eva ṣoḍaśa kṣaṇa iti vākyādhyāhāraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2924_0: nanu ca tenāpy adṛṣṭaṃ paśyati kiṃ tad adṛṣṭam ity āha.
SA01yabhkvyu:2924_1: mārgānvayajñānakṣāṃtim iti. mārgānvayajñānakṣāṃtir ātmānaṃ virahayya śeṣam anvayajñānapakṣyaṃ mārgam ālaṃbate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2924_2: svātmani [Tib.207b] vṛttivirodhāt. tenocyate. mārgānvayajñānakṣāṃtim adṛṣṭāṃ paśyatīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2924_4: satyaṃ prati cintā dṛṣṭaṃ na dṛṣṭam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2924_5: na tu kṣaṇaṃ prati dṛṣṭaḥ kṣaṇo na veti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2924_6: kasmāt. paṃcadaśena kṣaṇena yad anvayajñānapakṣalakṣaṇaṃ satyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2924_7: tad eva ṣoḍaśenāpīti. nāsty apūrvadṛṣṭasatyadarśanam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2924_9: na hy ekakṣaṇenādṛṣṭena mārgānvayajñānakṣāṃtilakṣaṇena satyaṃ tanmārgasatyam aḍṛṣṭaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2924_10: laukikaṃ dṛṣṭāṃtam āha. yathā naikaluṅgena ekasasyaśalākayā dātreṇālūnenācchinnena kedāram alūnaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2924_11: kiṃ tarhi. lūnam evety arthaḥ. tathā hi kecit pramādād alūne 'pi ekaluṃge vaktāro bhavaṃti lūnam asmābhiḥ kedāram iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2924_12: phalatvād iti vistaraḥ. phalatvād ityadihetubhir bhāvanāmārgam eva ṣoḍaśakṣaṇaṃ sādhayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2924_18: duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ duḥkhe 'nvayajñānaṃ yāvan [Abhidh-k-vy_547] mārge 'nvayajñānam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2926_0: iti vacanāt. mārgānvayajñāne ca pūrvamārgasya pratipannakamārgasya vihāniḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2926_3: na ca darśanamārge kṣāṃtir jñānaṃ vā kiṃcit prābaṃdhikam astīty ato 'pi mārgānvayajñānaṃ bhāvanāmārga iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2926_9: tad idam aṃtarnītam abhisamīkṣya punar āha.
SA01yabhkvyu:2926_10: aparihāṇis tv iti vistaraḥ. yasmād darśanaheyānāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇaṃ mārgānvayajñānenādhārapratipakṣeṇa [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:2926_11: 208b] saṃdhāryate. yadi ca tasmāt phalamārgāt ṣoḍaśāt kṣaṇāt parihāṇiḥ syāt srotaāpattiphalāt parihāṇiḥ syāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2926_12: na ca srotaāpattiphalāt parihāṇir ity ato na tasmāt parihīyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2926_13: itara āha. ata eveti. kim ayam. aparihāṇihetur evocyate. vayam apy etam artham abhidadhmahe.
SA01yabhkvyu:2926_14: kim ayam upalabdhisamam iti cottaram udgrāhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2926_15: ācārya āha. ata eva darśanamārga iti cet.
SA01yabhkvyu:2926_16: yadi manyase yata eva darśanaheyaprahāṇasaṃdhāraṇaṃ mārgānvayajñānena.
SA01yabhkvyu:2926_17: ata eva darśanamārga iti. tan na. atiprasaṃgāt. yadi mārgānvayajñānena darśanaheyaprahāṇasaṃdhāraṇam ity ato darśanamārgaḥ syāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2926_18: evaṃ saty atiprasaṃgaḥ syāt. tasmān mārgānvayajñānāt pareṇa sarveṇa bhāvanāmārgeṇa darśanaheyaprahāṇasaṃdhāraṇam iti sarva eva darśanamārgaḥ syāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2926_19: aniṣṭaṃ caitat. ṣoḍaśa eva hi kṣaṇo darśanamārgo bhavadhir iṣyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2926_21: dvitīye tṛtīye vā divase ya utpadyate tajjātīyo viśeṣamārgasaṃgṛhītaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2926_22: tan nāsti. tato 'pi hi nāsti parihāṇiḥ. tad evaṃ saty āvaśyakāparihāṇitvaṃ yo hetur uktaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2926_25: na pūrvapakṣadūṣaṇaṃ ceti. āha. sapta jñānāni duḥkhe dharmajñānaṃ yāvan mārge dharmajñānaṃ kasmād durśanamārgo na punar aṣṭamaṃ mārge 'nvayajñānam [Abhidh-k-vy_548] ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2926_28: duḥkhe dharmajñāna utpanne yady api kāmāvacaraṃ duḥkhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2926_30: evaṃ yāvat. mārge dharmajñāna utpanne rūpārūpyapratipakṣo na tāvad dṛṣṭa iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2926_32: tadaṃtarālatvād iti. darśanamārgāṃtarālatvāt. tayor vā dvayoḥ kṣāṃtyor aṃtarālatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2927_0: (VI.31cd, 32) pūrvaṃ parapratyayena paroditena arthānusaraṇād duḥkhādisatyapratipatter ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2927_1: pūrvam iti viśeṣaṇena bhāvanākāle paropadeśanirapekṣam arthānusaraṇam iti kathitaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2927_3: so 'syāstīti dharmānusārī. dharmair anusartuṃ śīlam asyeti vā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2927_4: [Tib. 209b] pūrvaṃ svayam eva sūtrādibhir dharmair dvādaśāṃgaiḥ pravacanair arthānusaraṇāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2927_5: pūrvavad vyākhyānaṃ. yāvat paṃca prakārāḥ prahīṇā bhavaṃtīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2927_6: yāvacchabdena yady eko dvau trayaś catvāraḥ paṃca prahīṇāḥ prakārā bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2929_0: iti. dvitīye iti dvitīyanimittam ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2929_2: arvāṅ navakṣayāt. navaprakāraprahāṇād adharataḥ navaprakāraprahāṇaparihāreṇārthād uktaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2929_3: yadi tayoḥ pudgalayos tasmāt paṃcaprakāraprahāṇāt pareṇa ṣaṭ saptaṣṭau vā prakārāḥ pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa prahīṇā bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2929_5: dvitīya iti vacanāt. pratipannakāv iti cādhikārād evaṃ padārthavyavasthā labhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2930_0: (VI.33) arhattvaṃ tu na śakyam āditaḥ prāptum iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2930_1: anāgāmiphalam aprāpyādita evārhattvaṃ prāptuṃ na śakyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2930_2: kasmād ity āha. bhāvanāheyaprahāṇāt. na hi darśanamārgeṇa bhāvāgrikāṇāṃ bhāvanāheyānāṃ prahāṇam astīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2930_3: yathā darśanamārgasvabhāveṣu paṃcadaśasu kṣaṇeṣu vartamānaḥ aditas tṛtīyaphalapratipannakād [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:2930_5: ṣoḍaśe tu citta utpanne ādito 'nāgāmino 'rhan syāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2930_7: āha. yadi darśanamārgeṇa bhāvāgrikāṇāṃ bhāvanāheyānāṃ prahāṇaṃ nāstīti ato 'rhattvaṃ aśakyaṃ [Abhidh-k-vy_549] pūrvam eva.
SA01yabhkvyu:2930_8: tarhi pṛthagjanāvasthāyām eva bhāvanāmārgeṇa bhavāgravairāgyāt tatphalapratipannakaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2930_11: ata ucyate. pūrvaṃ ca bhavāgravairāgyasaṃbhavād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2930_12: na hi pūrvaṃ pṛthagjanāvasthāyāṃ laukikena mārgeṇa bhavāgravairāgyasaṃbhavaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2930_13: uparibhūmyabhāvāt. tasmād āditaḥ pratipannako 'rhaṃś ca na syād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2930_17: na tu tasya prajñā naivāsti. tayā na tu prabhāvita iti. na tan nāma labhate. prajñādhikatvena dṛṣṭiprabhāvitatvāt dṛṣṭiprāptaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2930_18: na tu tasya śraddhā nāsīti pūrvavad vācyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2930_19: apare tu punaḥ. [Tib. 210b] nairuktavidhim ālaṃbya vyācakṣate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2932_0: iti uktam. ataḥ pṛcchati kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇam iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2932_6: tāvat pratipannako nocyate. yadā prayujyate. tadā pratipannaka ity arthād uktaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2932_7: tadā hi pūrvaprahīṇakleśapratipakṣasyāpratilabdhapūrvasya tatprahāṇasya cānāsravā prāptir utpadyata iti siddhāṃtaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2932_9: ṣoḍaśe citte srotaāpanna evocyata iti vacanāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2932_12: laukikena mārgeṇa prahīṇāṣṭaprakāro 'pi ṣoḍaśe citte sakṛdāgāmy evocyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2932_13: nānāgāmiphalapratipannakaḥ. yasmāt phale phalaviśiṣṭasya mārgasya lābho nāstīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2932_14: evaṃ kāmavītarāga ūrdhvaṃ vā ṣoḍaśe citte nārhattvaphalapratipannaka ucyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2932_16: 211a] pūrvavat. yas tu tṛtīyadhyānavītarāga iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2932_17: tṛtīyadhyānavītarāgaḥ adharāṃ bhūmiṃ niśrityānāgamyaṃ dhyānāṃtaraṃ prathamaṃ dvitīyaṃ vā dhyānaṃ niśritya niyāmam avakrāmatīty asti saṃbhavaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2932_18: so 'vaśyaṃ phalaviśiṣṭaṃ mārgaṃ saṃmukhīkaroti tṛtīyadhyānasaṃgṛhītaṃ vā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2932_20: asti hi sambhāvanā yad asau phalaviśiṣṭamārgaṃ saṃmukhīkuryāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2932_21: yasmād asya tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikaḥ kleśaḥ prahīṇa iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2932_22: tena so 'vaśyaṃ phalaviśiṣṭaṃ mārgaṃ [Abhidh-k-vy_550] saṃmukhīkarotīti niyamyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2932_23: anyathā hi yadi na saṃmukhīkarotīty arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2932_24: sa tasmād ūrdhvopapannaḥ. sa āryaḥ. tasmāt tṛtīyadhyānād ūrdhvaṃ caturthe dhyāne ārūpyeṣu vā sukhendriyeṇāsamanvāgataḥ syāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2932_26: tad bhūmisaṃcārāt tyaktaṃ. yad api cānāsravaṃ. tad api. yadi na saṃmukhīkṛtaṃ syād ubhayenāpi sukhendriyenāsamanvāgataḥ syād āryāṇāṃ cordhvopapannānām avaśyaṃ sukhendriyeṇāsamanvāgama uktaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2932_30: so 'vaśyaṃ paṃcabhir upekṣājīvitamanaḥsukhasaumanasyendriyair ity evamādivacanāc ca.
SA01yabhkvyu:2932_31: [Tib. 211b] atra brūmaḥ. asty eṣa vibhāṣāyāṃ likhitapakṣaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2932_33: apara āhur iti vacanāt. yo hi caturthadhyānalābhī ṣaṇṇāṃ bhūmīnām anyatamāṃ bhūmiṃ niśritya niyāmam avakrāmati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2932_34: sa ṣaḍbhūmikenānāgāmiphalenānāgamyabhūmikena yāvac caturthadhyānabhūmikena ṣoḍaśe citte samanvāgato bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2932_35: tathā vītarāgatvāt. yas tṛtīyadhyānalābhī. sa paṃcabhūmikena. caturthadhyānabhūmikaṃ hitvā.
SA01yabhkvyu:2932_36: evaṃ yo dvitīyadhyānalābhī. sa caturbhūmikena. tṛtīyacaturthabhūmike hitvā. yas tu vītarāgaḥ prathamadhyānalābhī vā dvitīyālābhī.
SA01yabhkvyu:2932_40: sarvajaghanyo 'pi hy anāgāmy avaśyam eva tribhūmikenānāgāmiphalena samanvāgata iti varṇayaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2932_41: tasmād aparapakṣāpekṣayaivam uktam ācāryeṇeti yuktaṃ syāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2933_1: bhūyovītarāgāṇāṃ. kāmavītarāgāṇāṃ ca. tatra bhūyovītarāgo yasya saptāṣṭau vā prakārāḥ pūrvaṃ laukikena mārgeṇa prahīṇā bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2940_0: iti vacanāt. kāmadhātau nava prakārāḥ kleśā upadiṣṭāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2940_1: celād iti vastrāt. eṣa dṛṣṭāṃtayoga iti. drstāṃtayuktir dṛṣṭāṃtayogo dṛṣṭāṃtaprakāra ity apare.
SA01yabhkvyu:2940_2: [Abhidh-k-vy_551] tad evam anayā yuktyānena vā prakāreṇānyo 'pi dṛṣṭāṃto vaktavya iti sūcayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2940_3: anyathā hy eṣa dṛṣṭāṃta ity eva brūyāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2940_4: anādisaṃsāra iti. anādau saṃsāre. svahetuparaṃparayā dhyāpitā abhivardhitās tataś cādhimātrapramāṇam eteṣām ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2940_6: mūlasadharmiṇyo hi prāptayas tatprabaṃdhatvāt kleśānāṃ tṛvṛtkarṣaniṣkarṣaṇavad iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2940_7: yathā trivṛtkarṣeṇa dharaṇena subahukāle saṃvardhitānāṃ vātapittādīnāṃ doṣāṇāṃ niṣkarṣaṇaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2941_2: nātaḥ param ity arthaḥ. tena mārgeṇa nirvāṇagamanād ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2942_0: ādyamārgalābhāc cet. ādyo 'nāsravo mārgo darśanamārgas tasya lābhāc cet srotaāpannaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2942_1: aṣṭamako 'pi syāt. srotaāpattiphalapratipannako 'pi syād ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2942_2: tathā hi pratilomakrameṇārhata ārabhyāṣṭānāṃ puruṣapudgalānām arhatpratipannakādīnāṃ srotaāpattiphalapratipanno 'ṣṭamako bhavati śraddhānusārī dharmānusārī vā tasyāpy ādyamārgalābhāt so 'pi srotaāpannaḥ syāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2942_3: ādyaphalalābhāc cet. atha mataṃ apūrvaphalasya lābhāt srotaāpanna iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2942_4: bhūyovītarāgo 'pi syāt. yaḥ prahīṇaṣaṭkleśaprakāraḥ ṣoḍaśe kṣaṇe sakṛdāgāmī.
SA01yabhkvyu:2942_5: so 'pi srotaāpannaḥ syāt. tasyāpy apūrvaphalalābhāt. evaṃ kāmavītarāgo 'pi syāt. tasyāpi tad ādyaṃ phalam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2942_6: idānīṃ parihāra [Tib. 213a] ucyate. sarvaphalaprāpiṇam adhikṛtyādyaphalalābhād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2942_10: tam adhikṛtya tam abhisaṃdhāyādyaphalalābhād apūrvaphalalābhāt srotaāpanna ucyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2942_13: nāṣṭamakaḥ sa cāpi hy āryamārgasrotaāpanna iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2942_17: aṣṭamakena tu pratipannakaḥ mārga eva labdha iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2942_19: yasmāc ca tena darśanamārgaś ca sa eva bhāvanāmārgaś ca sa eva labdhaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2942_22: yasmāc cānena sakalaṃ sroto'bhisamitaṃ mārgānvayajñānakṣāṃtikṣaṇasyāpi darśanān na tv aṣṭamakena.
SA01yabhkvyu:2942_23: tasmād [Abhidh-k-vy_552] ebhiḥ kāraṇaiḥ sarvaphalaprāpy eva srotaāpanna ity ucyate nāṣṭamakaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2942_25: tadyathā loke yaḥ prakarṣeṇa bhāsaṃ karoti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2942_26: sa bhāskara ucyate. na khadyotakaḥ. [Tib. 213b] tadvat. tasmād anyān iti. tasmāt sāṃpratikād bhavād anyān.
SA01yabhkvyu:2942_28: yathā saptakasāmānyāt saptasthānakuśalo bhikṣur uktaḥ sūtre.
SA01yabhkvyu:2942_29: kathaṃ. vistaram uktvāha. kathaṃ ca bhikṣavo bhikṣuḥ saptasthānakuśalo bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2942_30: rūpaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti. rūpasamudayaṃ rūpanirodhaṃ rūpanirodhagāminīṃ pratipadaṃ rūpasyāsvādam ādīnavaṃ niḥsaraṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2942_31: evaṃ vedanāṃ saṃjñāṃ saṃskārān vijñānaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2942_32: vijñānasamudayaṃ vistareṇa yāvan niḥsaraṇaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2942_33: evam anena nyāyena paṃcasaptakāni paṃcatriṃśad iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2942_35: saptaparṇavac ca. yathā ca pattrikāyāṃ pattrikāyāṃ saptaparṇasādṛśyād anekaśatapattro 'pi san sa vṛkṣaḥ saptaparṇa ity ucyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2942_38: yadi saptakasāmānyāt saptakṛtvaḥ parama iti vyākhyāyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2943_0: yat tarhi sūtra uktaṃ. tad virudhyata ity ato 'pavyākhyānam etad ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2943_1: ekasyāṃ gatāv aṣṭamaṃ bhavaṃ nābhinirvartayatīty avirodhaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2943_3: saptakṛtvo devāṃś ca manuṣyāṃś ca saṃsṛtya saṃdhāvya [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:2943_4: 214a] duḥkhasyāṃtaṃ karotīti devamanuṣyavacanād aṃtarābhavo 'pi na syāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2943_7: yadi aṃtarābhavaiḥ saha saptabhavā gaṇyeran janmacatuṣṭayam evāsya syāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:2943_8: tad evānenāniṣṭāpattivacanena tadātmīyaṃ vyākhyānam ekasyāṃ gatāv iti samarthayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2943_9: itara āha. evam apy ūrdhvaṃsrotasa iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2943_10: yady ekasyāṃ gatāv aṣṭamaṃ bhavaṃ nābhinirvartayatīti vyākhyāpayasi.
SA01yabhkvyu:2943_11: kathaṃ tarhi ūrdhvasrotaso 'ṣṭamabhavābhinirvṛttir ekasyāṃ gatau bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2944_0: sa pluto 'rdhaplutaḥ sarvaś cyutaś cānyo bhavāgraga
SA01yabhkvyu:2945_0: iti vacanāt. sa cāpi vaktavyaḥ. bhavaprakarṣavivakṣāyāṃ tu bhavāgraparamagrahaṇam ity abhiprāyaṃ lakṣayāmaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2945_4: na tu rūpārūpyadhātvor iti. kim atra jñāpakaṃ. sūtraṃ yuktir vā. kāmadhātum adhikṛtyedam uktam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2945_6: yena codakenaivaṃ coditaṃ kim atra jñāpakaṃ sūtraṃ yuktir veti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2945_7: sa eva punar āha. iha caiva kiṃ jñāpakaṃ pratyekaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2945_9: na punar ubhayeṣv eva devamanuṣyeṣu saptakṛtva iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2945_10: tad uktaṃ bhavati. yo manuṣyeṣu dṛṣṭasatyaḥ. sa deveṣu triṣkṛtvaḥ saṃsṛtya manuṣyeṣu ca triṣkṛtva eva tato devān āgamya parinirvātīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2945_11: yo vā deveṣu dṛṣṭasatyaḥ. sa tathaiva. sa manuṣyeṣu triṣkṛtvo deveṣu ca triṣkṛtva eva saṃsṛtya tato manuṣyān āgamya parinirvātīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2945_12: evaṃ hi paṭhyate saptakṛtvo devāṃś ca manuṣyāṃś ceti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2945_13: sāmānyarūpeṇa hi paṭhyate. na pratyekam iti viśiṣya paṭhyata ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2945_14: evaṃ vaibhāṣikapakṣe saṃśayāvasthe kṛte ācāryaḥ samarthayann āha.
SA01yabhkvyu:2945_15: pratyekam api tu kāśyapīyā iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2945_16: kāśyapīyā nikāyāṃtarīyāḥ. ta evaṃ paṭhanti. saptakṛtvo devān saptakṛtvo manuṣyān iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2945_19: yad uktaṃ kim atra jñāpakaṃ sūtraṃ yuktir vā kāmadhātum adhikṛtyedam uktam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:2945_20: yac coktam iha caiva kiṃ jñāpakaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2945_22: [Tib. 215a] pratyekamarthaparigraheṇaiva hi kāmadhātvabhisaṃdhir api sūcito bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2945_23: na hi rūpārūpyadhātvoḥ saptakṛtvo devamanuṣyeṣu saṃsaraṇaṃ yujyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:2945_25: yuktir apy ata eva gamyate. yatraiva saptakṛtvobhavaparama uktaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:2945_27: nātrābhiniveṣṭavyam iti. iha caiva kiṃ jñāpakam iti. tajjātīya iti. tatprakāraḥ. yena tāvatā kālenāvaśyaṃ saṃtatiparipākān nāṣṭamaṃ bhavam abhinirvartayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:2945_28: saptapadāśīrviṣadaṣṭavat. saptapadāśīrviṣeṇa tena daṣṭo yathā saptapadāni gatvā mriyate.

SA01yabhkvyu:3001_11: tadyathāyoguḍānām iti pūrvavad yāvad ayaḥprapāṭikotplutya pṛthivyām apatitaiva nirvāyāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3001_13: etac ca sūtraṃ vistareṇa purastāl likhitam iti na punar likhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3001_20: kiṃ tarhi. abhisaṃskāreṇāpratiprasrabdhasya pūrvābhisaṃskārasya sāmarthyataḥ parinirvāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3001_21: asya hi yady api vāhī mārgo 'sti abhiyogena tu parinirvāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3001_23: anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī [Abhidh-k-vy_562] punaḥ pratiprasrabdhapūrvābhisaṃskāro 'bhisaṃskāram anaṃtareṇa parinirvātīty ayam eva eṣāṃ viśeṣo 'vagaṃtavyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3001_24: yathā tu sābhisaṃskārānabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyiṇāv apy upapadyaparinirvāyyākhyāṃ labhete.
SA01yabhkvyu:3001_25: tathā darśayann āha. sarve hy eta upapadyaparinirvāṇād upapadyaparinirvāyiṇa iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3001_27: sarveṣāṃ vā trayāṇām iti. aṃtaropapadyaparinirvāyyūrdhvasrotasām āśvanāśuciraparinirvāṇāt [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:3001_29: kaścid anāśuciraparinirvāyī. evam upapadyaparinirvāyī. ūrdhvasrotāś ceti. asmāc ca tridhābhedān navānāgāmino bhavaṃtīti sa eva saṃbaṃdho vācyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3001_31: teṣāṃ punas trayāṇām aṃtaropapadyaparinirvāyiṇoḥ ūrdhvasrotasaś ca.
SA01yabhkvyu:3001_32: navānāṃ caiṣām eva pratyekaṃ tridhābhedād yathā varṇitād viśeṣaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3001_33: karmakleśendriyaviśeṣāt. karmaṇaḥ kleśasyendriyasya ca viśeṣād bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3001_34: katham ity āha. trayāṇām iti vistaraḥ. abhinirvṛttir aṃtarābhāvaḥ abhinirvṛttivedanīyasya karmaṇa upacitatvād aṃtarāparinirvāyī.
SA01yabhkvyu:3001_36: aparaparyāyavedanīyasya karmaṇa upacitatvād ūrdhvaṃsrotā ity evaṃ tāvat teṣāṃ trayāṇāṃ karmaviśeṣād viśeṣaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3001_37: mṛdumadhyādhimātrakleśasamudācāratvād yathākramam eṣām eva kleśaviśeṣād viśeṣaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3001_38: adhimātramadhyamṛdvindriyatvāc ca yathākramam eṣām evendriyaviśeṣād viśeṣa iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3001_39: teṣām api pratyekam ata eva yathāyogaṃ viśeṣa iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3001_40: teṣām api pratyekaṃ bhinnānāṃ navānām ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3001_41: ata eva karmādiviśeṣāt [Tib. 224a] yathāyogaṃ na yathākramaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3001_42: viśeṣo 'vagaṃtavyaḥ. katham ity āha. prathamayos trikayor iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3001_46: yathākramaṃ viśeṣaḥ. na tu karmaviśeṣāt. yasmāt prathamasya trikasyābhinirvṛttivedanīyaṃ karma tulyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3001_53: yathākramam ity arthaḥ. ta ete navaprakārakleśendrigatvād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3001_55: navaprakārendriyatvāc ca. navānāgāmino bhavaṃti. karmaṇo 'grahaṇam avyapitvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3001_57: 224b] viśeṣo 'stīti. kathaṃ punar ete navaprakārakleśā bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3001_68: tathaivendriyam api triprakāram adhimātraṃ mṛdu ceti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3002_0: (VI.41) kathaṃ tarhi sūtre sapta satpuruṣagatayo deśitā iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3002_2: anupādāya ca parinirvāṇam. ity etat sarvaṃ sūtraṃ gatisūtrata ity atra pradeśe likhitam iti na punar likhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3002_3: atra ca sūtre sapta satpuruṣagatayo deśitāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3002_4: trayo 'ṃtarāparinirvāyiṇāḥ. traya upapadyaparinirvāyiṇa iti ṣaṭ gatayaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3002_9: tasyābhedanirdeśād iti. tasyordhvaṃsrotasaḥ plutādibhedānirdeśād ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3002_11: nānyāḥ śaikṣā gataya iti. na srotaāpannasakṛdāgāmigataya ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3002_12: gatir utpattiḥ saṃparāya ity ete sūtre paryāyā ucyaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:3002_13: teṣām ity anāgāmināṃ. sati ca karmaṇi vṛttiḥ prāṇātipātādyakaraṇāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3002_16: teṣāṃ tu vītarāgāṇāṃ saty eva karmaṇi vṛttir nāsati prahīṇakuśalatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3002_17: na punaḥ pratyāgatir iti. yāsu gatiṣūpapannāḥ. tatratatra caiṣām atyaṃtam anāgamanam ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3002_19: yad etat saty eva vṛttir asati cāvṛttir evāpunaḥpratyāgamanaṃ ca.
SA01yabhkvyu:3002_20: tad etat [Abhidh-k-vy_564] srotaāpanne sakṛdāgāmini ca nāstīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3003_1: pāryāyikam iti. paryāye bhavaṃ pāryāyikaṃ. kenacit prakāreṇa bhavatīty arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3003_2: katham ity āha. paṃcavidhasya pāpasyātyaṃtamakaraṇasaṃvarapratilaṃbhād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3003_4: tasya pratilaṃbhāt. na hy āryā janmāṃtare 'py etat paṃcavidhaṃ pāpam adhyācaraṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3003_8: yeṣām iti vistaraḥ. yeṣāṃ tu niḥparyāyeṇa na prakārāṃtareṇa srotaāpannasakṛdāgāmivat satpuruṣatvaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3003_11: bhāvanāprahātavyānāṃ ca kāmāvacarāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ navaprakārāṇām api prahāṇāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3003_13: sapta satpuruṣagataya ity ato 'nyeṣāṃ pāryāyikaṃ satpuruṣatvaṃ na pratiṣidhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3004_0: (VI.42) kiṃ punaḥ parivṛttajanmano 'py anāgāmina eśa bhedo 'sti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3004_2: parivṛttajanmānāgāmīyaḥ prathame janmani srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ vā prāpya dvitīye janmany anāgāmī bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3004_3: kāma iti viśeṣaṇaṃ. yasmāt rūpadhātau parivṛttajanmā kadācid ārūpyān praviśatīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3004_6: yat tarhīti vistaraḥ. śakreṇoktam itaś cyuto 'haṃ manuṣyeṣūpapanno yady arhattvaṃ prāpya na parinirvāmi.
SA01yabhkvyu:3004_7: ye te devā akaniṣṭhā iti viśrutāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3004_9: sa hi deveṣv eva srotaāpanno manuṣyāṃś cāgatya parinirvāsyāmīti vacanāt parivṛttajanmā bhavet.
SA01yabhkvyu:3004_12: tatrākaniṣṭheṣūpapattir bhaviṣyatīti prārthanāvacanād dhātvaṃtaragamanam astīti darśitaṃ bhavatīti gamyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3004_13: tat kathaṃ kāmadhātau parivṛttajanmāṃtara āryo dhātvāṃtaraṃ na gacchatīty ucyata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3004_14: sūtrārtho dṛśyate. brūyās tvaṃ. dharmalakṣaṇānabhijñatvāc chakreṇaivam uktaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3004_15: tasmād adoṣa iti. bhagavatā tarhy evaṃ śṛṇvatā kasmād asau na nivārito mā tvam eva voca ity ata ucyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3004_16: bhagavatāpy anivāraṇaṃ. saṃharṣaṇīyatvād iti. kāmaduḥkhaparityāgābhilāṣeṇa saṃharṣaṇīyam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3005_2: āśrayaviśeṣalābhāc ca. yasmāc cāśrayaviśeṣam anupahataṃ mārgasaṃmukhībhāvānukūlaṃ pratilabhate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3005_3: dṛṣyaṃte hi tīkṣṇendriyā api saṃta āśrayavaiguṇyāt guṇebhyaḥ parihīyamāṇā ity ato janmāṇtaraparivāsenendriyāṇāṃ paripakvataratvād indriyasaṃcāro nāsti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3005_4: āśrayaviśeṣalābhāc ca parihāṇir nāsty anenaiva janmāṃtaraparivāsena dhātvaṃtaragamanaṃ na bhavatīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3006_2: tasmāt kāraṇād avītarāgaḥ śaikṣaḥ srotaāpannaḥ sakṛdāgāmī ca nāṃtarāparinirvāyī bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3006_3: anuśayānāṃ ca nātimandatvāt. yasmāc cānuśayās tasya nātimandāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3006_4: ato nāṃtarāparinirvāyī bhavatīty ayam ācāryasya parihāraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3006_7: katham ity ucyate. bahu hy anena kartavyaṃ bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3006_8: akuśalāvyākṛtakleśaprahāṇam akuśalānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ avyākṛtānāṃ ca rūpārūpyāvacarāṇāṃ kleśānāṃ prahāṇam anena kartavyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3006_9: vītarāgeṇa punaḥ śaikṣeṇāvyākṛtānām eva prahāṇam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3006_11: dve vā trīṇi vā śrāmaṇyāni phalāni prāptavyāni.
SA01yabhkvyu:3006_14: srotaāpannena trīṇi sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ anāgāmiphalam arhattvaphalaṃ ca.
SA01yabhkvyu:3006_15: vītarāgeṇa punar ekam evārhattvaphalaṃ prāptavyam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3007_0: (VI.43) ākīryata iti. vyavakīryate vyatibhidyate. anāsravābhyāṃ sāsravaṃ caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ miśrīkriyata ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3009_0: vacanāt. tāsāṃ caturthaṃ dhyānam agram aṣṭāpakṣālamuktatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3009_3: aśakyaṃ tu kṣaṇavyavakiraṇam iti vistareṇa dvau hi kṣaṇāv ānaṃtaryamārgasadṛśāv iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3009_7: tīkṣṇendriyās tu śuddhāvāsopattyarthaṃ [Abhidh-k-vy_566] dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārārtham eva ca vyavakiraṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3009_8: na kleśabhīrutayā. teṣāṃ parihāṇyasaṃbhavāt. kathaṃ punaḥ kleśabhīrutayā aparihāṇyarthaṃ vyavakiraṃtīty āha.
SA01yabhkvyu:3010_3: tasya pudgalasya tāvatī śaktir ity evam upariṣṭhād api vaktavyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3010_4: dvitīyāyāṃ ṣaḍ iti. anāsravaṃ sāsravam anāsravam iti trīṇi.
SA01yabhkvyu:3010_5: punar anāsravaṃ sāsravam anāsravam ity aparāṇi trīṇīti ṣaḍ bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3010_6: evam eva ca tṛtīyāyāṃ nava caturthyāṃ dvādaśa paṃcamyāṃ paṃcadaśeti yojyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3010_7: tāsāṃ yathāsaṃkhyam iti. tāsāṃ vyavakīrṇabhāvanānāṃ yathākramaṃ paṃca śuddhāvāsāḥ phalaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3010_8: mṛdvyā bhāvanāyā avṛhāḥ phalam evaṃ yāvad adhimātratamāyā bhāvanāyā akaniṣṭhāḥ phalam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3010_11: evaṃ yāvat prajñādhikāyā bhāvanāyā akaniṣṭhāḥ phalam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3011_0: (VI.44cd) yo hi kaścid anāgāmīti. śraddhādhimukto vā dṛṣṭiprāpto vā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3011_1: kāyena sākṣātkaraṇam iti. cittābhāvāt kāyenaiva sākṣātkaroti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3011_2: kathaṃ kāyenaivety āha. kāyāśrayotpatteḥ. evaṃ tu bhavitavyam iti svamatam ācāryasya.
SA01yabhkvyu:3011_6: pratyakṣīkāro [Tib. 228b] hi sākṣātkriyeti. savijñānakāyaśāṃtipratilaṃbhāvasthāyāṃ sākṣātkriyā yujyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3011_7: savijñānakakāyaśāṃtipratilaṃbhena vā avijñānakakāyaśāṃtyavasthāyāṃ tatprāptir gamyata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3012_0: aṣṭādaśa śaikṣā ity atra sūtra iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3012_2: kati bhadaṃta dakṣiṇīyā iti. bhagavān āha. aṣṭādaśa gṛhapate śaikṣā navāśaikṣā dakṣiṇīyā iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3012_7: śraddhānusārī. dharmānusārī. śraddhādhimuktaḥ. dṛṣṭiprāptaḥ. kulaṃkulaḥ. ekavīcikaḥ. aṃtarāparinirvāyī. upapadyaparinirvāyī. sābhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī. anabhisaṃskāraparinirvāyī. ūrdhvasrotāḥ. itīme gṛhapate 'ṣṭādasa śaikṣāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3012_8: navāśaikṣāḥ katame. parihāṇadharmā. cetanādharmā. anurakṣaṇādharmā. sthitākaṃpyaḥ. prativedhanābhavyaḥ. akopyadharmā. [Tib. 229a] cetovimuktaḥ. prājñāvimuktaḥ. [Abhidh-k-vy_567] ubhayatobhāgavimuktaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3012_11: adhiśīlam adhicittam adhiprajñam iti tisraḥ śikṣā āryamārgalakṣaṇāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3012_12: tāsāṃ phalaṃ visaṃyogaḥ. tadviśeṣeṇa hi śaikṣāṇāṃ vyavasthānam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3012_14: kathaṃ punas tadviśeṣaḥ. anyādṛsyo 'nyādṛśyo 'ṣṭādaśānāṃ śaikṣāṇāṃ śikṣāḥ visaṃyogaphalaṃ ceti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3012_17: ato na tadyogān nirodhasamāpattiyogāt śaikṣaviśeṣa uktaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3012_18: yathaite 'ṣṭādaśa śaikṣāḥ. na punar asau na śaikṣaḥ. tatra yad idam ucyate. aṣṭādaśa śaikṣā ity atra sūtre kiṃ kāraṇaṃ kāyasākṣī noktaḥ śaikṣa ity evaṃ noktaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_0: ity evamādi. sūkṣmaṃ tu bhidyamānā iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_3: kiṃ kāraṇam. tadbhede hi gaṇite yathāṃtarāparinirvāyiṇa indriyādibhedād bhedaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_4: evaṃ yāvad ūrdhvasrotasa iti sukham atideśaṃ kariṣyāmīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_5: bhūmibhedāś catvāra iti. te evāṃtarāparinirvāyiṇaḥ. bhūmayaś catvāri dhyānāni. rūpopagānām anāgāmināṃ vivakṣitatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_6: tatra prathame dhyāne 'ṃtarāparinirvāyī yāvac caturtha iti catvāraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_8: ta eva parihāṇadharmā cetanādharmā anurakṣaṇādharmā sthitākaṃpyaḥ prativedhanābhavyaḥ akopyadharmā ceti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_11: bahirdeśakanayenāpi sthānāṃtaratve tatrāryo notpadyata ity agaṇanaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_15: katham iti pratipādayati. rūpadhātan [Tib. 230a] sakalabandhana iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_16: rūpadhātau prathame dhyāne sakalabandhana ekaprakāravītarāgo yāvad aṣṭaprakāravītarāga iti nava.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_17: dvitīye 'pi nava sakalabandhano yāvad aṣṭaprakāravītarāga iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_18: tathā tṛtīye nava. tathā caturthe naveti. catvāro navakāḥ ṣaṭtriṃśad bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_25: tathā ca sati sthānāṃtaragotravairāgyendriyabhedād iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_26: sthānāṃtarāṇāṃ gotrāṇāṃ vairāgyāṇām indriyāṇāṃ ca bhedāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_27: dvānavatīni dvānavatyadhikāni paṃcaviṃśatiśatāni bhavaṃti teṣām aṃtarāparinirvāyiṇāṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_29: ekasmiṃ sthāne. tadyathā brahmapurohite ṣaṭ gotrāṇi parihāṇadharmādibhedāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_32: tadyathā brahmapurohitāt. [Tib. 230b] ṣaṇṇavakāni gotraṣaṭ pudgalanavakagrahaṇāc catuḥpaṃcāśat.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_33: ṣoḍaśa catuḥpaṃcāśatkāni. ṣoḍaśasthānāṃtaragrahaṇāt. catuḥṣaṣṭyādi. catuḥṣaṣṭyadhikāni aṣṭau śatāni.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_35: ity evaṃ kṛtvā. kiṃ dvānavatīni paṃcaviṃśatiśatāni bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_36: yena nyāyena sakalabandhano yāvad aṣṭaprakāravītarāga iti nava pudgalā vyavasthāpitāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_37: taṃ nyāyaṃ darśayann āhayo hy adhare dhyāna iti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_38: yo hy adhare dhyāne prathame yāvat tṛtīye navaprakāravītarāgaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_39: sa uttare dhyāne dvitīye yāvac caturthe sakalabandhana ity uktaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_40: kasmād ity āha. samagaṇanārtham iti. caturṣu dhyāneṣu navanava yathā syur iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_42: prathame dhyāne daśa syuḥ sakalabandhano yāvan navaprakāravītarāga iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_43: dvitīye nava ekaprakāravītarāgo yāvan navaprakāravītarāga iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_44: evaṃ tṛtīye nava caturthe tv aṣṭau syuḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_46: navaprakāravītarāgasyārūpyasakalabandhanatvād ity uktaṃ evaṃ yāvad ūrdhvasrotasa iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_49: 231a] pratyekaṃ dvānavatīni paṃcaviṃśatiśatāni bhavaṃtīty abhisamasya punaḥ paṃcābhedāṃś catvāriṃśadūnāni trayodaśasahasrāṇy anāgāmināṃ bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_50: ārūpyagais tu sahopapadyādicaturbhedabhinnair atitarāṃ bahavo bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3015_51: anayā tu vartanyā gamyata eveti na likhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3016_0: iti. ābhavāgrād āṣṭau prakārān kṣiṇotīty ābhavāgrāṣṭabhāgakṣid ābhavāgrāṣṭaprakārakṣayakṛd ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3016_5: evam ayaṃ samādhiḥ sarvam anuśayaṃ bhinattīti sāmarthyāt vajra upamā asyeti vajropamaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3016_7: traidhātukān [Abhidh-k-vy_569] darśanaprahātavyān bhāvanāprahatavyāṃś ca kāmāvacarān yāvad bhāvāgrikān aṣṭau prakārān.
SA01yabhkvyu:3016_8: yadi sarvān na bhinatti kasmāt sarvānuśayabhedīty ucyata ity āha.
SA01yabhkvyu:3017_2: 231b] catvāri dhyānāni trīṃś cārūpyān bhavāgravarjyān niśrityārhattvaprāptir ity ata evaṃ pratanyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3017_4: bhāvāgrikaduḥkhālaṃbanānvayajñānākāraiś caturbhiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāro bhāvāgrikasamudayālaṃbanānvayajñānākaraiḥ caturbhir aparaiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāra ity aṣṭau.
SA01yabhkvyu:3017_5: evam eva nirodhamārgadharmajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktā aṣṭāv iti vaktavyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3018_0: dharmajñānaṃ nirodhe yan mārge vā bhāvanāpathe
SA01yabhkvyu:3019_0: iti siddhāṃtāt tayor evehopanyāso na duḥkhasamudayadharmajñānayor grahaṇaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3019_1: evaṃ yāvad iti. yāvacchabdena yathā prathamadhyānanirodhālaṃbanākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3019_3: mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāra ity atra pratibhūmimārgālaṃbanānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāraḥ catvāra iti nocyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3019_5: aviśiṣṭo hy anvayajñānapakṣo mārgaḥ pratipakṣabhāvenānyonyahetukaś ca mārga iti samastam evālaṃbyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3019_6: [Tib. 232a] na nirodhavad ity ataś catvāra eva mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktā iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3019_9: atha vā jñānānām ākārāṇām ālaṃbanānāṃ ca tribhedena bhinnāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3019_12: dvāpaṃcāśad iti. ādito dvyaṣṭāv iti ṣoḍaśa. prathamadhyānanirodhālaṃbanāś catvāro yāvan mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāra iti navacatuṣkāṇi ṣaṭtriṃśat.
SA01yabhkvyu:3019_13: ṣoḍaśa ca ṣaṭtriṃśac ca dvāpaṃcāśad bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3019_18: kathaṃ kṛtvā. dhyānāṃtarasaṃgṛhītā bhāvāgrikaduḥkhasamudayānvayajñānākāraiḥ [Abhidh-k-vy_570] saṃprayuktā aṣṭau.
SA01yabhkvyu:3019_20: 232b] saṃprayuktā aṣṭau. nirodhānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāḥ prathamadhyānanirodhālaṃbanāś catvāraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3019_30: bhavāgra āryamārgo nāstīti tatsaṃgṛhītā na saṃtīti na ciṃtyaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:3019_34: tasmān nirodhamārgadharmajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktā aṣṭau na bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3019_36: nirodhānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś caturdhyānanirodhālaṃbanāḥ ṣoḍaśa punar na bhavaṃtīty aṣṭāviṃśatir bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3019_44: ākiṃcanyāyatanasaṃgṛhītā vijñānānaṃtyāyatananirodhālaṃbanān apy aparān apanīya viṃśatir iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3019_45: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ svabhūmyūrdhvabhūmikanirodham evālaṃbaṃta ārūpyā nādhobhūmikaṃ dhyānavat.
SA01yabhkvyu:3019_46: na hy adhobhūmikaṃ duḥkham anālaṃbya tannirodhaḥ śakyam ālaṃbituṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3021_0: ity etat kāraṇaṃ. dhyānānāṃ tu samastālocanatvān na pratiṣedhaḥ. vakṣyati hi
SA01yabhkvyu:3023_0: iti. atha kasmān nirodham evālaṃbaṃte na punar duḥkhaṃ samudayaṃ vā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3023_2: tasya hi bhāvāgrika eva navamaḥ prakāro vajropamavadhyo 'vaśiṣṭa iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3025_0: iti vacanāt. sarvaṃ hi mārgānvayajñānaṃ navabhūmikānvayajñānapakṣālaṃbanam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_0: yeṣāṃ tv iti vistaraḥ. yeṣām ābhidhārmikānāṃ mārgānvayajñānam api na kevalanirodhānvayajñānam ekaikabhūmipratipakṣālaṃbanam iṣṭaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_1: teṣām aṣṭāviṃśatim adhikān prakṣipya anāgamyasaṃgṛhītā aśītir vajropamā bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_2: kathaṃ kṛtvā. pūrvakāḥ kṛtsnasyānvayajñānapakṣyasyālaṃbanā mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_5: evaṃ yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanapratipakṣālaṃbanā mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāra ity evam aṣṭāviṃśatir adhikā bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_6: evam aṣṭāviṃśatim adhikān prakṣipya dvāpaṃcāśad aśītir bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_7: kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇaṃ bhavāgrapratipakṣālaṃbanā mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāro na gaṇyaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_13: apare punar vyācakṣate. yeṣāṃ tu mārgānvayajñānam apy ekaikabhūmipratipakṣālaṃbanam [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_14: 234a] iṣṭaṃ. yathā nirodhānvayajñānam iṣṭam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_18: evaṃ yāvad bhavāgranirodhālaṃbanāś catvāra iti dvātriṃśad bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_19: evaṃ mārgānvayajñānākārair api saṃprayuktās tathaiva dvātriṃśad iti kṛtvā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_20: aṣṭāviṃśatim adhikān prakṣipyānāmyasaṃgṛhītā aśītir vajropamā bhavaṃtīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_21: teṣāṃ hi ye hi kṛtsnasyānvayajñānapakṣasyālaṃbanān mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāś catvāras te na saṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_22: bhavāgrapratipakṣālaṃbanās tu tatsthāne bhavaṃtīty ato aśītir vajropamā bhavaṃtīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_24: aṣṭāviṃśatim adhikān prakṣipya dhyānāṃtarasaṃgṛhītā aśītir vajropamā bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_25: yathā dhyānāṃtarasaṃgṛhītāḥ. evaṃ prathamadvitīyatṛtīyacaturthadhyānasaṃgṛhītā pratidhyānam aśītir vajropamā bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_26: ākāśānaṃtyāyatanādiṣv iti. bhavāgravarjyeṣu triṣv ārūpyeṣu yathākramaṃ catvāriṃśat dvātriṃśac caturviṃśatiś ca bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_27: kathaṃ kṛtvā. [Tib. 234b] ākāśānaṃtyāyatane tāvad aṣṭāviṃśatyāṃ vajropameṣv ākāśānaṃtyāyatanapratipakṣālaṃbanān [Abhidh-k-vy_572] mārgānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktāṃś caturaḥ prakṣipya yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanapratipakṣālaṃbanāṃś catura iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_29: evaṃ caturviṃśatyāṃ vijñānāyatanapratipakṣālaṃbanāṃś caturaḥ prakṣipyākiṃcanyāyatanapratipakṣālaṃbanāṃś caturaḥ prakṣipya dvātriṃśad bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_30: evaṃ viṃśatyām ākiṃcanyāyatanapratipakṣālaṃbanāṃś caturaḥ prakṣipya caturviṃśatir bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_31: āha. nanv apadiṣṭam adhobhūmipratipakṣālaṃbanaṃ tu bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_32: tasyānyonyahetutvād iti. atha kasmāt svabhūmyūrdhvabhūmipratipakṣālambanā evoktā ākāśānaṃtyāyatanādisaṃgṛhītāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_34: atrocyate. aviśeṣya navabhūmikam anvayajñānapakṣaṃ mārgam adhobhūmipratipakṣālaṃbanaṃ bhavatīty uktaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_38: na viśeṣasvarūpeṇa. svabhūmyūrdhvabhūmyālaṃbanaṃ tu viśeṣarūpeṇāpi bhavatīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_43: apare tv evaṃ vyācakṣate. bhāvāgrikaduḥkhasamudayānvayajñānākāraiḥ saṃprayuktā aṣṭāu.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_45: evaṃ yāvad bhāvāgrikanirodhālaṃbanāś catvāra iti ṣoḍaśa.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_47: evaṃ yāvad bhavāgrapratipakṣālaṃbanāś catvāra iti ṣoḍaśa.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_48: ta ete dviṣoḍaśa pūrvoktāś cāṣṭāv iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3026_54: bhavāgrasyāpi hi te 'dhobhūmikaṃ pratipakṣamārgam ācakṣata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3027_1: kathaṃ. ye tāvad aṣṭau sarvaprathamā uktāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3027_7: evaṃ bhāvāgrikasamudayālaṃbanānāṃ caturṇāṃ pratyekaṃ ṣaḍgotrabhedāt ṣoḍhābhedaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3027_9: yathā caiṣām aṣṭānāṃ gotrendriyabhedāt pratyekaṃ ṣoḍhā tridhā ca bhedaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3027_10: evaṃ sarveṣām anāgāmyasaṃgṛhītānāṃ jñānākārālaṃbanabhedabhinnānāṃ yāvad ākiṃcanyāyatanasaṃgṛhītānāṃ gotrendriyabhedād bhedaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3027_11: anayā vartanyā yojyaḥ. evaṃ vā yojyaḥ. prathame pakṣe dvāpaṃcāśad anāgāmyasaṃgṛhītāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3027_12: yāvad viṃśatir ākiṃcanyāyatanasaṃgṛhītā ity abhisamasya caturaśītir uttarāṇi trīṇi śatāni vajropamānāṃ bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3027_13: tāni ṣaḍguṇīkṛtya triguṇīkṛtya ca ṣaṭsahasrāṇi navaśatāni dvādaśottarāṇi bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3027_18: daśasahasrāṇi aṣṭaṣaṣṭyuttarāṇi ca trīṇi śatāni vajropamānāṃ [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:3028_0: ata eva tat kṣayajñānam iti. kuta ity āha. sarvāsravakṣayaprāptisahajatvāt prathamata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3028_1: yasmāt sarvāsravakṣayaprāptyā saha jātaṃ tatprathamato jñānaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3028_6: ata eva sa iti. svarthaparisamāpteḥ. sa parārthakaraṇārhattvād arhan.
SA01yabhkvyu:3028_9: sarāgāḥ pṛthagjanaśaikṣāḥ teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ pūjām arhatīty arhan.
SA01yabhkvyu:3028_10: siddhaṃ bhavatīti. kiṃ siddhaṃ bhavatīty āha. anye sapta pūrvoktāḥ pudgalāḥ śaikṣā iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3028_11: trayaḥ phalasthāś catvāraś ca pratipannakā uktāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3028_12: asāv evāśaikṣa ity avadhāraṇād etadanye āryāḥ śaikṣā iti siddhaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3029_0: kena te śaikṣā iti. kena kāraṇena te sapta pudgalāḥ śaikṣā ity ucyaṃta ity āha.
SA01yabhkvyu:3029_4: kva śikṣaṇaśīlāḥ. śikṣātraye. [Tib. 236b] kiṃ śikṣātrayam. adhiśīlam adhicittam adhiprajñaṃ ca.
SA01yabhkvyu:3029_5: kiṃsvabhāvās tā ity āha. tāḥ punaḥ śīlasamādhiprajñāsvabhāvā iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3029_6: śīle śīkṣā adhiśīlam evaṃ yāvat prajñāyāṃ śikṣety adhiprajñam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3029_8: śikṣākriyāṇāṃ tv avyatirekāc chīlādisvabhāvāḥ śikṣā iti vyācaṣṭe.
SA01yabhkvyu:3029_11: na. yathābhūtaṃsatyāprajñānāt. naitad evaṃ. kasmāt. yathābhūtaṃ satyānāṃ duḥkhādīnāṃ aprajñānād anavabodhāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3029_12: tad dhi bhikṣavo [Abhidh-k-vy_574] dṛṣṭaṃ yad āryayā prajñayeti vacanāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3029_13: tathā hi sūtre adhiśīlam adhicittaṃ vā śikṣāṃ vistareṇoktvāha.
SA01yabhkvyu:3029_14: adhiprajñaṃ śikṣā katamā. idaṃ duḥkham āryasatyam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3029_15: ayaṃ duḥkhasamudayaḥ. ayaṃ duḥkhanirodhaḥ. iyaṃ duḥkhanirodhagāminī pratipad āryasatyam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3029_16: yathābhūtasatyaprajñānāt. yatra ca śikṣitāḥ śīlādiṣu. tatra punar aparaśikṣaṇāt. prātimokṣasaṃvaraparityāgataḥ uṣmagatādiparihāṇitaś cāryaḥ punar yady api kiṃcit parityajati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3029_17: na tu sarvaṃ. [Tib. 237a] na hy āryasya kadācid api śikṣātrayaṃ nāstīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3029_18: prakṛtistha ārya iti. asamāhitāvasthā sattvānāṃ prakṛtiḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3029_20: na śikṣaṇaśīla iti. na śaikṣaḥ syād ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3029_21: āśayata iti chandataḥ. sthitādhvagavat. adhvaga ucyate yo 'dhvānaṃ gacchati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3029_23: gamanāśasyāparityāgāt. tadvat. prāptyanuṣaṃgataś ca. śīlasamādhiprajñānāṃ ca prāptayaḥ prakṛtisthasyāpy anuṣajyaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:3031_0: nirvāṇaṃ kasmān na śaikṣaṃ. yac chaikṣeṇa prāptam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3032_0: prathamaḥ pratipannaka iti. darśanamārgasthaḥ. śeṣāṇām iti vistaraḥ. śeṣāṇāṃ pratipannakānāṃ sakṛdāgāmyanāgāmyarhattvaphalapratipannakānāṃ triphalasthāvyatirekāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3032_10: kiṃ tarhi. tadvyatiriktau. tathā ca sati dravyataḥ sapta bhavaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3032_11: srotaāpattisakṛdāgāmyanāgāmiphalapratipannakās trayaś catvāraś ca phalasthā ity arhattvaphalapratipannaka eko 'nāgāmiphalasthān na vyatirikta ity avagaṃtavyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3035_0: iti vacanāt. tatkleśānuśayitatvād iti yasmāt tadbhūmikaḥ kleśas tatra laukike [Abhidh-k-vy_575] mārge ālaṃbanato 'nuśayitaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3035_1: yo hi kleśa iti vistareṇa sādharmyavaidharmyadṛṣṭāṃtaṃ darśayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3035_2: yo yadbhūmiko mārgaḥ. na sa tadbhūmikakleśapratipakṣaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3035_5: laukikenāpi vairāgyam iti. uparibhūmisāmaṃtakena. lokottareṇāpīti. tatpratipakṣeṇa svādharabhūmikenānāsraveṇa mārgeṇa.
SA01yabhkvyu:3037_1: laukikena mārgeṇa vairāgyaṃ gacchataḥ pratiprakāraṃ viśaṃyogaprāptayaḥ sāsravo 'nāsravaś cotpadyaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:3038_0: dhyānaṃ niśrityeti. yasmāc chaikṣaḥ ṣaḍ bhūmīr niśrityendriyāṇi saṃcarati. nārūpyam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3039_0: aśaikṣo nava niśritya bhūmīḥ śaikṣas tu ṣaḍ
SA01yabhkvyu:3040_0: iti vacanāt tenāha. yo dhyānaṃ niśrityendriyāṇi saṃcarati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3040_1: sa kṛtsnapūrvamārgatyāgād ārūpyamārgāṇāṃ mṛdvindriyasaṃgṛhītānāṃ pūrvalabdhānāṃ tyāgāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3041_0: sa viśeṣaṃ phalaṃ tyaktvā phalm āproti vardhayann
SA01yabhkvyu:3042_1: ayaṃ cāparo doṣaḥ. tyakte ca tasminn ūrdhvabhūmikleśavisaṃyoge [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:3042_2: 238b] taiḥ kleśair ūrdhvabhūmikaiḥ samanvāgataḥ syād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3044_2: ūrdhvaṃ jāta ūrdhvajātaḥ. bhavāgrārdhavimuktaś cordhvajātaś ca bhavāgrārdhavimuktordhvajātau.
SA01yabhkvyu:3044_6: tam arthaṃ vivṛṇvann āha. asatyām iti vistaraḥ. asatyām api tasya pudgalasya laukikyāṃ visaṃyogaprāptau.
SA01yabhkvyu:3044_7: na taiḥ kleśaiḥ samanvāgamaḥ syāt tadyathā bhavāgrārdhaprakāravimuktasyeti vistaraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3044_10: lokottarā ca tadvisaṃyogaprāptir dhyānaṃ niśrityendriyasaṃcāreṇa tyaktā syāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3044_11: na ca punas tair bhāvāgrikakleśaprakāraiḥ samanvāgamo bhavatīty abhyupagamyate bhavadbhiḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3044_12: tadvad asya syāt. yathā ca pṛthagjanasya prathamadhyānabhūmer ūrdhvaṃ jātasya dvitīyadhyānādyupapannasya.
SA01yabhkvyu:3047_0: iti niyamāt tyāgo bhavati. tasmān na punas taiḥ kāmāvacaraiḥ [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:3047_3: pṛthagjanasyetigrahaṇaṃ. yasmād āryasya laukikena mārgeṇa kāmadhātor ūrdhvaṃ vā vairagyaṃ gacchataḥ kleśavisaṃyogaprāptir laukikī lokottarā ca bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3047_5: tasyāḥ prathamadhyānabhūmer ūrdhvajātasya bhūmisaṃcāreṇa tyāgo bhavati na lokottarāyāḥ.

SA01yabhkvyu:3219_17: yathā hi viṣakāṇḍaviddhasya mṛtasya viṣaṃ sarvam aṃgam abhivyāpya vraṇadeśa eva maraṇakāle 'vatiṣṭhate nānyatra.
SA01yabhkvyu:3219_18: tadvad asya yoginaḥ praheya eva bhāvāgrikaskaṃdhalakṣaṇe jñānam avatiṣṭhate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3221_1: na duḥkhajñānādibhyaḥ. anyākāratvāt. anāsravaṃ hi paracittajñānaṃ mārgākāram eva mārgajñānatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3221_2: yat tu sāsravaṃ. tal laukikākāraṃ sarāgam [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:3221_13: duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiṃ dharmajñānaṃ ceti saṃbhavaṃ praty evam ucyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3221_14: kadācid dhi prayogavaśād duḥkhe 'nvayajñānakṣāntiṃ duḥkhe 'nvayajñānaṃ ca jñātuṃ saṃbhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3221_16: dharmajñānapakṣau dvau kṣaṇau jñātvānvayajñānapakṣaṃ pareṇa cittaṃ jñāsyāmīti prayogaṃ kṛtvā samudayānvayajñānam aṣṭamaṃ saṃbhāvayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3221_19: 278b] paracittam. ato yāvat sa tatra prayogam ārabhate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3221_20: tāvad ayaṃ ṣoḍaśaṃ cittam anuprāpto bhavatīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3221_21: aṃtarā na jānāti. prathamadvitīyapaṃcadaśān iti etān eva trīn jānāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3221_22: kathaṃ. duḥkhe dharmajñānakṣāntiṃ dharmajñānaṃ ca jñātvā prayogāntaraṃ ca kṛtvā paṃcadaśakṣaṇaṃ mārgānvayajñānakṣāntiṃ jānātīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3222_2: idaṃ ca saṃvṛtyākāraṃ duḥkhaṃ me parijñātam ity evamādyākāratvād ataḥ pṛcchati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3222_4: tasya saṃvṛtijñānadvayasya tatpṛṣṭhalabdhasya viśeṣeṇa duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ yāvan me mārgo bhāvita iti jānāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3222_5: duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ na punaḥ parijñeyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3222_6: yāvan mārgo me bhāvito na punar bhāvayitavyaḥ iti ca jānātīty evaṃrūpeṇa tayor anāsravayoḥ kṣayānutpādajñānayor viśeṣaḥ śāstre jñāpito darśitaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3222_7: ata eva tad upādāyety uktaṃ. tad upādāyeti pūrvīkṛtya tat puraskṛtyety arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3222_8: niṣyaṃdane tayor nirvikalpayor viśeṣo 'numīyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3223_0: anāsraveṇāpy evaṃ jānātīti. ṣoḍaśākāravyatirikto 'sty anāsrava ākāraḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3223_2: yadi tad upādāya yaj jñānaṃ darśanam iti śāstravacanena duḥkhaparijñānādisaṃvṛtijñānaphalam [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:3225_0: iti na dṛṣṭir iti. tad virudhyate. tenāha. darśanavacanaṃ tu bhāṣyākṣepād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3225_1: yad etac chāstre vacanaṃ yaj jñānaṃ darśanam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3225_2: bhāṣyākṣepād bhavati. duḥkhajñānādiṣu hi jñānaṃ darśanaṃ vidyā buddhir bodhir iti paṭhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3225_5: na dṛṣṭisvabhāve ity arthaḥ. pratyakṣavṛttitvād veti. pratyakṣā vṛttir asya jñānadvayasya.
SA01yabhkvyu:3225_6: tad iyaṃ pratyakṣavṛttiḥ. tadbhāvat. anayor darśanavacanaṃ. na hy etajjñānadvaye ānumānikavad āgāmikavad vā parokṣavṛttiḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3225_8: tadyathā cakṣurvijñānaṃ. tadsādharmyād etad api jñānadvayaṃ darśanam ity uktam.
SA01yabhkvyu:3225_9: ata evoktam iti. ata eva pratyakṣavṛttitvād uktaṃ śāstre yat tāvaj jñānaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3225_10: darśanam api tat. syāt tu darśanaṃ na jñānam aṣṭāv ābhisamayāntikāḥ kṣāntayaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3225_11: tad idam uktaṃ bhavati darśanatvam anayor iṣyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3226_0: tatreti teṣu daśasu jñāneṣu saṃvṛtijñānaṃ saṃvṛtijñānam eva svabhāvasaṃgrahataḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3226_4: nānāsravo bhāga iti. dharmajñānaṃ daśasu jñāneṣv ekaṃ jñānaṃ dharmajñānam eva.
SA01yabhkvyu:3226_7: tasya yo dharmajñānabhāgaḥ. tad dharmajñānam. evaṃ samudayajñāsya yāvad anutpādajñānasya dharmānvayajñānasvabhāvasya yo dharmajñānabhāgaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3226_8: tad dharmajñānaṃ. na tv anvayajñānabhāga iti. paracittajñānasya tu dharmānvayamārgasaṃvṛtijñānasvabhāvasya dharmajñānabhāgo dharmajñānam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3226_10: saptānāṃ ca bhāgaḥ. teṣām eva duḥkhajñānādīnām yo 'nvayajñānabhāgaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3226_11: tad anvayajñānam iti yojyaṃ. duḥkhajñānaṃ daśasu jñāneṣv ekaṃ jñānaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3226_12: tad eva duḥkhajñānaṃ. caturṇāṃ ca bhāgo dharmānvayakṣayānutpādajñānānām.
SA01yabhkvyu:3226_13: etāni hi dharmajñānādīni catvāri catuḥsatyālaṃbanāni bhavanti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3226_15: tad duḥkhajñānaṃ. nānyo bhāgaḥ. ity evaṃ samudayanirodhajñāne [Abhidh-k-vy_616] yojye pratyekam.
SA01yabhkvyu:3226_17: caturṇāṃ ca bhāgo dharmānvayakṣayānutpādajñānānāṃ yaḥ samudayālaṃbanabhāgo nirodhālaṃbanabhāgo vā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3226_23: ya eṣāṃ mārgajñānabhāgaḥ. tan mārgajñānaṃ netara iti. paravittajñānaṃ daśasu jñāneṣv ekaṃ jñānaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3226_25: etāni hi catvāri jñānāni paracittāparacittajñānaṃ svabhāvāni bhāvaṃti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3226_27: tat paracittajñānaṃ. netara iti. kṣayajñānaṃ daśasu jñāneṣv ekaṃ jñānaṃ tad eva kṣayajñānaṃ svabhāvasaṃgrahataḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3226_29: kṣayajñānaṃ duḥkhaṃ me parijñātam ity evamādyākārajñānaniṣyandaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3226_35: tad duḥkhajñānaṃ yāvan mārgajñānaṃ vā bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3226_37: tat kṣayajñānaṃ netara iti. ṣaṇṇāṃ bhāga ity ucyate. [Tib. 280b] evam anutpādajñānaṃ daśasu jñāneṣv ekaṃ jñānaṃ tad evānutpādajñānaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3226_39: duḥkhaṃ me parijñātaṃ na punaḥ parijñeyam ity evamādyākāraniṣyandaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3228_1: ākāraś cākāragocaraṃ. ākārākāragocaram. tasmāt. svabhāvataḥ saṃvṛtijñānam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3228_2: svabhāvena svabhāvataḥ. saṃvṛtijñānaṃ. kasmād ity āha. apramārthajñānatvād iti. kāmadhātupratipakṣo dharmajñānaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3228_4: tathā hi śāstra uktaṃ. dharmajñānaṃ katamat. kāmapratisaṃyukteṣu saṃskāreṣu yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3228_5: kāmapratisaṃyuktānāṃ [Abhidh-k-vy_617] saṃskārāṇāṃ hetau yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3228_6: kāmapratisaṃyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nirodhe yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ kāmapratisaṃyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ prahāṇāya mārge yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3228_7: idam ucyate dharmajñānam. api khalu dharmajñāne dharmajñānabhūmau ca yad anāsravaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3228_8: idam ucyate dharmajñānam. anvayajñānaṃ katamat. rūpārūpyapratisaṃyukteṣu saṃskāreṣu yad anāsravaṃ jñānam.
SA01yabhkvyu:3228_11: rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ nirodhe yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3228_12: rūpārūpyapratisaṃyuktānāṃ saṃskārāṇāṃ prahāṇāya mārge yad anāsravaṃ jñānam.
SA01yabhkvyu:3228_13: idam ucyate anvayajñānaṃ. api khalv anvayajñāne anvayajñānabhūmau ca yad anāsravaṃ jñānam.
SA01yabhkvyu:3228_16: ākārata eva nālaṃbanataḥ paṃcopādānaskaṃdhalakṣaṇatvena tayor abhedāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3228_17: tathā hi śāstra uktaṃ. duḥkhajñānaṃ katamat. paṃcopādānaskaṃdhān anityato duḥkhataḥ śunyato 'nātmataś ca manasikurvato yad anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3228_18: idam ucyate duḥkhajñānaṃ. samudayajñānaṃ katamat. sāsravaṃ hetukaṃ hetutaḥ samudayataḥ prabhavataḥ pratyayataś ca manasikurvato yad anāsravaṃ jñānam.
SA01yabhkvyu:3228_19: idam ucyate samudayajñānaṃ. ākārālaṃbanato nirodhamārgajñāne iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3228_21: tathā hi śāstra uktaṃ. nirodhajñānaṃ katamat. nirodhaṃ nirodhataḥ śāntataḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3228_22: praṇītato niḥsaraṇataś ca manasikurvato yad anāsravaṃ jñānam.
SA01yabhkvyu:3228_24: mārgajñānaṃ katamat. mārgaṃ mārgato nyāyataḥ pratipattito nairyāṇikataś ca manasikurvato yad anāsravaṃ jñānam.
SA01yabhkvyu:3228_25: idam ucyate mārgajñānam iti. prathamata [Tib. 281b] iti grahaṇam anutpādajñānaviśeṣaṇārthaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3228_27: sarvānāsravahetukatvād iti. prathamotpannāni daśa jñānāny adhikṛtya sabhāgahetunā sarvānāsravahetukam anutpādajñānaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3228_29: na hy anutpādajñānam asya hetur bhavati viśiṣṭatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3229_1: sakalasya kāmadhātor darśanabhāvanāprahātavyasaṃgṛhītasya paṃcaprakārasya sakalaṃ dhārmajñānaṃ darśanabhāvanāmārgasaṃgṛhītaṃ caturāryasatyālaṃbanaṃ pratipakṣa iti kṛtvā kāmadhātor eva pratipakṣo dharmajñānam ity uktam.
SA01yabhkvyu:3229_2: api tv asti saṃbhavo yad rūpārūpyadhātor api dharmajñānaṃ pratipakṣaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3229_3: katamat tad dharmajñānaṃ. yan nirodhe mārge ca dharmajñānaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3229_5: tāv adharāv api na hinau vyavasthāpyete.
SA01yabhkvyu:3229_7: na tad ālambanaṃ dharmajñānaṃ rūpārūpyadhātupratipakṣa ity avagaṃtavyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3231_1: anvayajñānaṃ tarhi nirodhamārgālaṃbanabhāvanāmārgasaṃgṛhītaṃ kasmāt tridhātupratipakṣo na bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3231_3: 282a] pūrvatarajito bhavati. tataḥ paścād anvayam utpadyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3231_4: tataḥ kāmadhātor jitatvān na tat kāmadhātupratipakṣa iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3231_5: dharmajñānaṃ tu rūpārūpyadhātor ajitatvāt pratipakṣo yujyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3231_7: śāntanairyāṇikatāsābhāgāt. na hi kāmāvacarasaṃskārāṇāṃ. nirodhāt pratipakṣād vā rūpārūpyāvacarasaṃskārāṇāṃ nirodhasya pratipakṣasya vāsti kaścid viśeṣaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3231_8: sarvo hi nirodhaḥ kuśalo 'saṃskṛto mārgaś ca nairyāṇikaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3232_0: (VII.10-12ab) sarvatheti. bhāvanāmārgasaṃgṛhītam api. tān purastād iti. tān anityādīn ākārān ūrdhvaṃ vyākhyāsyāmaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3232_3: ādiśabdena bhuṃkṣva tiṣṭha gacchety evam ākāraṃ ca.
SA01yabhkvyu:3233_0: ubhayam api tv iti. sāsravānāsravaṃ. yat tarhīti vistaraḥ. rāgasya ca cittasya ca yugapadgrahaṇam ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3233_1: sūtraṃ punar evaṃ paṭhyate. sarāgaṃ cittaṃ sarāgaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3233_2: vigatarāgaṃ cittaṃ vigatarāgaṃ cittam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3233_3: yathā sarāgaṃ vigatarāgam. evaṃ sadveṣaṃ vigatadveṣaṃ samohaṃ vigatamohaṃ saṃkṣiptaṃ vikṣiptaṃ līnaṃ pragṛhītam uddhatam [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:3233_4: 282b] anuddhatam avyupaśāntaṃ bhāvitam avimuktaṃ vimuktam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānātīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3233_7: tadvat. kathaṃ. yathā yadā vastram iti paricchinnākāraṃ vijñānam utpadyate na tadā malaṃ gṛhṇāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3233_8: yadā ca malam iti paricchinnākāraṃ vijñānam utpadyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3234_6: yat kliṣṭam avyākṛtaṃ kuśalaṃ ca laukikaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3235_0: tad evam ubhayam apy etat sarāgam evoktaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3235_1: āha. kiṃ punaḥ kāraṇam ekīyamatena rāgapratipakṣo vigatarāgam ity ucyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3235_2: yatas ta āhuḥ. yadi hi rāgeṇāsaṃprayuktaṃ vigatarāgaṃ syād anyakleśasaṃprayuktam api.
SA01yabhkvyu:3235_3: dveṣādisaṃprayuktam api. syāt vigatarāgaṃ. [Tib. 283a] tad api hi rāgeṇāsaṃprayuktaṃ saṃprayuktam api.
SA01yabhkvyu:3235_4: na ca sūtre dveṣādisaṃprayuktaṃ vigatarāgam ity uktaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3235_7: teṣām ayam adoṣaḥ. na hi rāgapratipakṣo dveṣādibhiḥ saṃprayujyata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3236_0: evaṃ tarhīti vistaraḥ. yadi rāgasaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ sarāgaṃ rāgapratipakṣo vigatarāgaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3236_5: evamādīti. ādiśabdena sadveṣaṃ samoham iti tulyaprasaṃgo yojyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3236_6: katham. atra tu sūtre dveṣasaṃprayuktaṃ cittaṃ sadveṣaṃ dveṣapratipakṣo vigatadveṣam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3236_9: evaṃ tarhi tad [Tib. 283b] apratipakṣaś cittam akliṣṭaṃ naiva sadveṣaṃ syāt na vigatadveṣam.
SA01yabhkvyu:3236_10: ity evaṃ samohaṃ cittaṃ vigatamoham iti vaktavyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3236_13: ābhidhārmikāḥ. evaṃ yāvat samohaṃ vigatamohaṃ ceti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3236_14: tasmād dveṣasaṃyuktatayāpi sadveṣaṃ mohasaṃyuktatayāpi samoham atra sūtre eṣṭavyam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3237_0: ālaṃbanābhisaṃkṣepād iti. kuśalaṃ cittaṃ vikṣepeṇa na saṃprayujyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3238_0: saṃkṣiptaṃ vikṣiptaṃ ca syāt. kliṣṭamiddhasaṃprayogād iti. dvividhaṃ middhaṃ. kliṣṭam akliṣṭaṃ ca. tad eva hi cittaṃ kliṣṭaṃ middhasaṃprayuktam iti saṃkṣiptaṃ syād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3238_1: kliṣṭam iti ca vikṣiptaṃ syād iti sāṃkaryadoṣaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3238_2: sāstravirodhaś ceti. kathaṃ. saṃkṣiptaṃ cittaṃ yathābhūtaṃ saṃprajānāti vistareṇa yathā vṛttau.
SA01yabhkvyu:3238_3: teṣām anvayajñānaṃ tāvat saṃkṣiptacittālaṃbanaṃ na saṃbhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3238_11: ye tu varṇayanti saṃkṣiptaṃ cittaṃ kuśam ālaṃbanābhisaṃkṣepād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3238_13: tad akliṣṭena middhena na saṃprayujyata iti saṃkṣiptaṃ vikṣiptaṃ ca na prāpnoti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3238_14: nāpi śāstravirodhaḥ. kuśalaṃ traidhātukasaṃgṛhītam asaṃgṛhītaṃ ca saṃkṣiptaṃ cittaṃ tajjñānaṃ catvāri jñānānīti siddhaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3239_2: tadviparyayād iti. vyavadānamahadbhir niṣevitatvād ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3239_3: mūlādīnaṃ balāntānāṃ alpabahutvam ekaikasya mūlasyālpabahutvād yathākramaṃ parīttaṃ ca veditavyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3239_4: katham ity āha. kliṣṭaṃ hi [Tib. 284b] dvābhyām akuśalamūlābhyāṃ samūlaṃ mohena lobhadveṣayoś cānyatareṇa.
SA01yabhkvyu:3239_8: kliṣṭajātīyasyānāgatasya bhāvanāyāḥ pratilaṃbhasyābhāvāt kuśalasaṃskṛtā dharmā bhāvayitavyā iti nyāyāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3239_17: nanu ca kuśalam api durbalam ekena mithyādṛṣṭikṣaṇena kuśalapaṃcaskaṃdhasamudghātāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3239_18: na tad atyaṃtam ucchidyate punaḥ pratisaṃdhānāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3239_19: duḥkhadharmajñānakṣāṃtya tu daśānām anuśayānām atyaṃtasamuccheda iti tasād apīty apiśabdena pūrvoktād apīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3239_23: vyupaśāntaṃ kuśalaṃ tatpratipakṣatvād iti kleśasaṃprayogāsaṃprayogato vā tad avyupaśāntaṃ vyupaśāntaṃ ca bhavati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3239_28: te eva bhāvane. tābhyām abhāvitatvāt abhāvitaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3239_29: na hi kliṣṭaṃ kuśalavad anāgataṃ bhāvyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3241_0: iti. tābhyām iti pratilambhaniṣevaṇābhyām ity arthaḥ.

SA01yabhkvyu:3292_4: phalaprāptiḥ. yathā darśanamārgeṇa srotaāpattiphalaṃ vā sakṛdāgāmyanāgāmiphalaṃ vā prāpyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3292_5: evam anenāpy ānantaryamārgeṇa śaikṣasya śaikṣendriyottāpanāyāṃ tīkṣṇendriyasaṃgṛhītāni saṃskṛtāni srotaāpattiphalādīni prāpyaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:3292_6: darśanamārge cānantaryamārgāvasthāyāṃ na saṃvṛtijñānabhāvanāsti evam ihāpi.
SA01yabhkvyu:3292_7: ity evaṃ darśanamārgasādṛśyād ānantaryamārge na saṃvṛtijñānasya bhāvanā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3297_1: tasyāpy ante vimuktimārge daśānāṃ bhāvaneti vacanāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3297_3: sarve ca vītarāgasyānāgāminaḥ prayogaviśeṣamārgāḥ śeṣās teṣāṃ bhāvanāyām avacanāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3299_0: kathaṃ punaḥ evam aviśeṣite viśeṣapratipattir labhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3299_6: anutpādajñānaṃ hitvā. yady akopyadharmā [Tib. 302a] daśa tad eva prakṣipya.
SA01yabhkvyu:3299_7: aṣṭau nava ceti. samayavimuktasyāṣṭau akopyadharmaṇo nava paracittajñānaṃ hitvā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3301_15: dhyānabhūmikeṣv eva prayogavimuktiviśeṣamārgeṣu saṃvṛtijñānam anāgataṃ bhāvyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3301_16: yat tatsaṃgṛhītaṃ paracittajñānaṃ ca viśiṣṭam eva bhāvyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3301_19: teṣu hi nirvebhabhāgīyeṣu paracittajñānaṃ na bhāvyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3301_20: kiṃ kāraṇam ity āha. darśanamārgaparivāratvād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3301_22: tathā tatparivāre 'pi na bhāvyata ity abhiprāyaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3301_23: anyatreti vistaraḥ. pṛthagjanasyaivānyatrāpūrvamārgalābhe kāmatridhyānavairāgye 'ntyavimuktimārgān hitvā yaḥ prayogānantaryavimuktimārgalābhaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3302_0: (VII.31, 32) atha kasmin mārga iti laukike lokottare vā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3302_1: yadbhūmiko mārga iti. anāgamyādikaḥ sāsravo 'nāsravo vā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3302_2: yāṃ ca bhūmiṃ prathamato labhata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3302_3: vairāgyataḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ yāvad bhavāgraṃ tadbhūmikam ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3302_4: kathaṃ kṛtvā. yady anāgamyabhūmisaṃniśrayeṇa hi laukikena mārgeṇa kāmadhātuvairāgyāt prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ labhate anāgmyabhūmikaṃ sāmantakasvabhāvaṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikaṃ ca maulasvabhāvaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3302_6: evaṃ dvitīyadhyānasāmantakasaṃniśrayeṇa prathamadhyānavairāgyāt dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ labhate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3302_8: evaṃ yāvad yadi naivasaṃjñāsaṃjñāyatanasāmantakasaṃniśrayeṇākiṃcanyāyatanavairāgyād bhavāgraṃ labhata iti vistareṇa yojyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3302_12: yadāpi maulaprathamadhyānabhūmikasaṃniśrayeṇa prathamadhyānavairāyānāsravsaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ labhate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3302_13: tadāpi prathamadhyānaprathamaprakārapratipakṣabhūtaṃ yāvan navamapratipakṣabhūtaṃ dvitīyadhyānasāmantakasaṃgṛhītaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ labhate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3302_14: sā hi prathamato bhūmis tadā labhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3302_15: navame tu vimuktimārge mauladvitīyasaṃgṛhītam api saṃvṛtijñānam anāgataṃ bhāvyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3302_16: evam anāsravadhyānāntarabhūmisaṃniśrayeṇa yāvad anāsravākiṃcanyāyatanabhūmisaṃniśrayeṇa saṃvṛtijñānabhāvanā yojya.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_0: 'nāsravajñānaṃ. katham iti vṛttyā vyācaṣṭe. yadbhūmivairāgyāyāpi hi na kevalaṃ yadbhūmika ity apiśabdaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_3: yāṃ ca bhūmiṃ labhate vairāgyata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_4: uparibhūmikaṃ. tadbhūmikāny adhobhūmikāni vānāsravāṇi bhāvanāṃ gacchanti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_5: tadyathā dvitīyam anāsravaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya tṛtīyadhyānavairāgyaṃ [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_6: 304a] karoti. yadbhūmiko mārgo dvitīyadhyānabhūmikas tadbhūmikam anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvanāṃ gacchati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_7: yasyāś ca bhūmervairāgyaṃ karoti tṛtīyāyā bhūmes tadbhūmikaṃ tṛtīyadhyānabhūmikaṃ navame vimuktimārge 'nāsravaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvanāṃ gacchati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_8: adhobhūmikaṃ ca prathamadhyānabhūmikam anāgamyabhūmikaṃ vānāsravaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvanāṃ gacchati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_9: adhobhūmikam api hi tatprayogamārgādikaṃ saṃbhavāmi tajjātīyam iti bhāvanāṃ gacchati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_10: atha tu tṛtīyadhyānasāmantakaṃ niśritya dvitīyadhyānavairāgyaṃ karoti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_11: tatrāṣṭāsv ānantaryamārgeṣu vimuktimārge ca tasya sāmantakasya sāsravatvāt tadbhūmikam anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ na bhāvanāṃ gacchati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_12: abhāvāt. adhobhūmikaṃ tu tajjātīyaṃ dvitīyadhyānabhūmikaṃ dhyānāntarabhūmikaṃ prathamadhyānabhūmikam anāgamyabhūmikaṃ ca tajjātīyam anāsravaṃ jñānaṃ bhāvanāṃ gacchati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_13: evam anyatrāpi yojyam eṣā dig iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_14: sāsravāś ca kṣayajñāna iti. anāsravāś ceti caśabdaḥ. yān guṇān arhadbhūtvā saṃmukhīkuryāt te sāsravās tasyām avasthāyāṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_15: bhāvanāṃ gacchaṃti. apramāṇavimokṣādaya iti. ādiśabdenābhibhvāyatanakṛtsnāyatanādayo gṛhyante.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_21: yathāsau rajjvā nipīḍya baddhā [Abhidh-k-vy_639] peḍā rajjūcchedād ucchvasatīva.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_22: evaṃ yathoktā aśubhādayo guṇā vajropamena samādhinā kleśaprāptirajjūcchedād aśailṣasaṃtāne vartsyanta ucchvasantīva.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_27: svacittaiśvaryam ity arthaḥ. tatprāptasyārhataḥ prāptibhiḥ prābhṛtasthānīyābhiḥ sarveṣāṃ kuśalānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ pratyudgamanānte guṇā bhāvanāṃ gacchanti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_28: ādhirājye prāptau kasyacid rājādhirājasya prābhṛtena vastrādinā viṣayāṇāṃ janapadānāṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_29: yathā pratyudgamanaṃ. tadvat tad eva kleśaprāptirajjūcchede sati svaprāptilābhāt ucchvasantīva guṇā uttaptatarāṇāṃ teṣāṃ prāptir utpadyata ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_30: kāmadhātāv arhattvaprāptāv evāśubhādayo yathāsaṃbhavaṃ śrutacintābhāvanāmayās traidhātukā bhāvanāṃ gacchanti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_32: [Tib. 305a] evaṃ bhūmito 'pi boddhavyaṃ naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanopapannasyārhattvaprāptau tadbhūmikā eva ity avagaṃtavyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_34: yad vihīnaṃ punar labhyate saṃmukhīkriyate saṃsārocitaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_35: na tad anāgataṃ bhāvyate. bhāvitotsṛṣṭatvāt saṃsāre. yad evātra dhyānāpramāṇādyanucitaṃ saṃsāre viśiṣṭām anāsravāṇuguṇaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_36: tat saṃmukhībhāve tajjātīyam evānāgataṃ viśiṣṭaṃ bhāvyata iyt ācāryo darśayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_38: labdhapūrvaṃ na bhāvyate. yat pratilabdhavihīnaṃ punar labhyate na tad bhāvyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_39: arthād gamyate yad alabdhapūrvaṃ labhyate tad bhāvyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_40: yatnābhimukhīkaraṇāt. apratiprasrabdho hi mārgo yatnenābhimukhīkriyata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_43: bhāvitapratiprasrabdhatvāt kṛtakṛtyadattaphalatvāc ca vegahīna iti tatsaṃmukhībhāvad anāgato na bhāvyata iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_44: yo 'nāgato yatnena janyate. sa bhāvyata ity abhiprāyaḥ. tad evaṃ sati yad uktaṃ saṃvṛtijñānaṃ tāvad iti vistareṇa.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_45: tad āryasaṃtānapatitam eva gṛhyate saṃsārānucitatvād iti ācāryavasumitreṇātra likhitam.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_46: atra kila vaibhāṣikā āhuḥ. naitad evaṃ. [Tib. 305b] kutaḥ. yasmād alabdham eva tad bhavati tyaktatvāt.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_47: tasmād bhāvitotsṛṣṭasyāpi punarlābhe bhavaty eva bhāvaneti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_48: kathaṃ tad apūrvaṃ bhavati yāvatā labdhapūrvam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_49: na hy evaṃvidhaṃ loke pūrvaṃ prasiddham iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_50: apare punar vyācakṣate. ekaṃ janmedam adhikṛyoktam na janmāntaraṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_51: yad vihīnam asminn eva janmani punar labhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3312_52: na tad bhāvyate. bhāvitotsṛṣṭatvāt. janmāntare tu yal labhyate. tad bhāvyate. na labhyate [Abhidh-k-vy_640] vismṛtabhāvanatvād iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3313_0: (VII.33) caturvidhā hi bhāvaneti. pratilambha eva bhāvanā pratilambhabhāvana.
SA01yabhkvyu:3313_2: evaṃ niṣevaṇam eva pratipakṣa eva vinirdhāvanam eva bhāvāneti vaktavyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3313_3: kiṃ niṣevaṇaṃ. kiṃ ca yāvad vinirdhāvanam iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3313_4: niṣevaṇaṃ punaḥpunaḥsaṃmukhīkaraṇaṃ pratipakṣo mārgo yathoktaṃ sūtre.
SA01yabhkvyu:3313_8: tathā hy uktaṃ bhāvitakāyo bhikṣur ity ucyate bhāvitacitto bhāvitaśīlaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3313_9: katḥaṃ bhāvitakāyo bhavati. kāyād vigatarāgo vigataspṛho vigatapipāso vigatapremā vigataniyaṃtiḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3313_13: anāgatānām eketi. pratilambhabhāvanā. pratyutpannānām ubhe iti. pratilambhaniṣevaṇabhāvane. tad evam iti vistaraḥ. yasmāt pratilambhaniṣevaṇabhāvane kuśalasaṃskṛtānām ity aviśeṣeṇoktaṃ sāsravāṇām anāsravaṇāṃ ca.
SA01yabhkvyu:3313_14: pratipakṣavinirdhāvanabhāvane ca sāsravāṇāṃ dharmāṇām ity aviśeṣeṇoktaṃ kliṣṭānām akliṣṭānāṃ ca.
SA01yabhkvyu:3313_15: tasmād evam itthaṃ kuśalasāsravāṇāṃ catasro bhāvanā bhavanti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3313_18: ye tarhi na kuśalasāsravāḥ ye saṃskṛtā ye 'nāsravā ye ca kliṣṭāvyākṛtāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3313_19: teṣāṃ kati bhāvanā ity āhānāsravāṇāṃ dve iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3313_20: pratilambhaniṣevaṇabhāvane. kliṣṭāvyākṛtānāṃ ca. kiṃ dve bhāvane bhavataḥ. pratipakṣavinirdhāvanabhāvane iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3314_1: kāyasyottareti. vibhāvanabhāvanā. tat punar bhāvanādvayam āgamena yathākramaṃ darśayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3314_6: te tv iti vistaraḥ. te tu saṃvaravibhāvanabhāvane pratipakṣanirdhāvanabhāvanāntarbhūte yathākramam ubhayam ubhayatrāntarbhūtam ity api na virudhyate.
SA01yabhkvyu:3315_0: (VII.34ab) sāmānyena sarveṣām iti. śrāvakapratyekabuddhasamyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ kṣayajñānakṣaṇe guṇabhāvanoktā
SA01yabhkvyu:3317_0: iti vacanāt. daśa balānīti vistaraḥ. ete balādyā mahākaruṇāntā aṣṭādaśāveṇikā vaibhāṣikair vyavasthāpyaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:3317_1: balādivyatiriktān kecid anyān aṣṭādaśāveṇikān [Abhidh-k-vy_641] buddhadharmān varṇayanti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3317_3: nāsti ravitaṃ. nāsti dravatā. nāsti nānātvasaṃjñā. nāsty avyākṛtaṃ manaḥ. nāsty apratisaṃkhyāyopekṣā. nāsty atīteṣu pratihataṃ jñānadarśanaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3317_9: nāsti chaṃdahāniḥ. nāsti vīryahāniḥ. nāsti smṛtihāniḥ. nāsti samādhihāniḥ. [Tib. 307a] nāsti prajñāhāniḥ. nāsti vimuktijñanadarśanahānir iti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3317_11: dravatā krīḍābhiprāyatā. nānātvasaṃjñā sukhaduḥkhāduḥkhāsukheṣu viṣayeṣu rāgadveṣamohato nānātvasaṃjñā.
SA01yabhkvyu:3317_12: śeṣaṃ sugamaṃ. daśa balāni. sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ. karmavipākajñānabalaṃ. dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattijñānabalaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3317_15: cyutyupapattijñānabalaṃ. āsravakṣayajñānabalaṃ ca. sūtraṃ tu daśāyuṣmantas tathāgatabalāni.
SA01yabhkvyu:3317_16: katamāni daśa. ihāyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ sthānaṃ ca sthānato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3317_18: yena balena samanvāgatas tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha udāram ārṣabhasthānaṃ pratijānāti brāhmaṃ cakraṃ pravartayati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3317_21: 307b] sthānato hetuto vastuto vipākataś ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3317_25: yena baleneti pūrvavat. punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgato dhyānavimokṣasamādhisamāpattīnāṃ saṃkleśavyavadānavyavasthānaviśuddhiṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3317_27: punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ indriyaparāparatāṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3317_30: yena baleneti pūrvavat. punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgato nānāvimuktikaṃ lokam anekavimuktikam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3317_33: yena baleneti pūrvavat. punar aparam āyuṣmaṃtas tathāgto nānādhātukaṃ anekadhātukam iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3317_35: 308a] pūrvavat. idaṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ tathāgatabalaṃ. yena baleneti pūrvavat. punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ sarvatragāminīṃ pratipadaṃ yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3317_38: yena baleneti pūrvavat. punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgato 'nekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsam anusmarati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3317_39: tadyathaikām api jātiṃ dve tisraś catasraḥ paṃca ṣaṭ saptāṣṭau nava daśa viṃśatiṃ yāvad anekān api saṃvartavivartakalpān anusmarati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3317_41: yatrāham āsa evaṃnāmā evaṃjātya evaṃgotra evamāhāra evaṃsukhaduḥkhapratisaṃvedī evaṃ dīrghāyur evaṃcirasthitikaḥ evamāyuṣparyantaḥ so 'haṃ tasmāt sthānāc cyuto 'mutropapannaḥ tasmād api cyuta ihopapannaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3317_42: iti sākāraṃ sanidānaṃ soddeśam anekavidhaṃ pūrvanivāsam anusmarati.
SA01yabhkvyu:3317_44: idam aṣṭamāṃ tathāgatabalaṃ. yena baleneti pūrvavat. punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgato divyena cakṣuṣā viśuddhenātikrāṃtamānuṣyakeṇa sattvān paśyati cyavanān apy upapadyamānān api suvarṇān durvarṇān durbalān hīnān praṇītān sugatim api gacchato durgatim api yathākarmopagān sattvān [Tib.
SA01yabhkvyu:3317_45: 308b] yathābhūtaṃ prajānāty amī bhavantaḥ kāyaduścaritena smanvāgatā vāṅmanoduścaritena samanvagatāḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3317_46: āryāṇām apavādakāḥ mithyādṛṣṭayo mithyādṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetos taddhetuṃ tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt paraṃ maraṇād apāyadurgativinipāte narakeṣūpapadyaṃte.
SA01yabhkvyu:3317_47: amī punar bhavantaḥ sattvāḥ kāyasucaritena samanvāgatāḥ vāṅmanaḥsucaritena samanvāgatāḥ āryāṇām anapavādakāḥ samyagdṛṣṭayaḥ samyagdṛṣṭikarmadharmasamādānahetos taddhetuṃ tatpratyayaṃ kāyasya bhedāt sugatan svargaloke deveṣūpapadyante.
SA01yabhkvyu:3317_50: yena baleneti pūrvavat. punar aparam āyuṣmantas tathāgataḥ āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñāya sākṣātkṛtvopasaṃpadya prativedayate kṣīṇā me jātir uṣitaṃ brahmacaryaṃ kṛtaṃ karaṇīyaṃ nāparam asmād bhavaṃ prajānāmīti.
SA01yabhkvyu:3318_4: kathaṃ kṛtvā. sthānāsthānaṃ samāsena saṃskṛtaṃ cāsaṃskṛtaṃ ca tad api saṃskṛtam aṣṭadhā bhettavyaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3318_7: kuśalāvyākṛtabhedāt. tatra saṃvṛtijñānabalasya daśāpi dharmā viṣayaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3318_8: [Abhidh-k-vy_643] daśasv api dharmeṣu tasya vṛttir ity arthaḥ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3318_9: dharmajñānasya paṃca. kāmāvacarānāsravāś catvāraḥ kuśalaṃ cāsaṃkṛtaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3318_10: anvayajñānasya sapta. rūpārūpyāvacarānāsravāḥ ṣaṭ kuśalaṃ cāsaṃskṛtaṃ.
SA01yabhkvyu:3318_16: avyākṛtam asaṃskṛtaṃ muktvā. evaṃ kṛtvā sthānāsthānajñānabalaṃ daśa jñānāni.
